title: Compromís, PP e independientes arrebatan la alcaldía de Sueca (Valencia) al PSPV
creator: C. Aparicio
content: Compromís, el Partido Popular y la formación independiente Sueca per Davant han arrebatado este miércoles la alcaldía de Sueca (Valencia ) al socialista Dimas Vázquez , y han situado en este cargo a Julián Sáez , de Sueca per Davant. La corporación municipal ha debatido y votado, en un pleno extraordinario, la moción de censura presentada a finales de julio y que ha salido adelante con los apoyos de los siete concejales de Compromís, los tres de Sueca per Davant y uno del PP , frente a la oposición de los ocho ediles del PSPV y de los otros dos concejales del PP. La moción de censura se justifica por "la falta transparencia y la pésima gestión de los recursos económicos " en esta localidad de 28.000 habitantes de La Ribera Baixa, y por "la falta de comunicación y perdida confianza en el equipo de gobierno" local, según sus proponentes. El Gobierno local de Sueca estaba formado hasta hace poco por los socialistas y Sueca per Davant , si bien recientemente el hasta ahora alcalde, Dimas Vázquez (PSPV-PSOE) , retiró las competencias a los ediles de la formación independiente. El nuevo alcalde, Julián Sáez , ha defendido antes de la votación que la moción de censura es "un procedimiento totalmente legal, democrático y ético", y se ha comprometido a dar ejemplo con una política de contención del gasto, que incluye una "bajada considerable" de sueldo. El...

title: Maryland man's five chilling words after slaughtering ex in front of their 1-year-old son
creator: Mataeo Smith
content: A man who was sentenced to tried to fool police by stabbing himself in the neck and asking "Why? What did I do?" Ruben Gilbert of Prince George's County was found guilty of for butchering Michelle Dudley with a knife at their apartment in Laurel in January 2023. “He truly, truly took a beautiful soul, a beautiful soul,” said her sister, Monica Dudley. Monica said the pair's 1-year-old son was in the apartment as his father . Michelle was able to briefly escape the apartment and seek help, according to charging documents. Neighbors said her body was pouring blood as she pleaded for assistance. Witnesses told investigators that Gilbert bizarrely stabbed himself in the neck and exclaimed "Why? What did I do?" Monica lamented the mental trauma that will likely torment the youngster in the years to come. “It’s always going to be an unimaginable pain,” she said. “There’s going to forever be a void.” On Monday, the killer dad was sentenced to 38 years in prison for the bloody murder and an additional three years on a weapon charge. “When you lose someone in the degree that we lost my sister, you’re always going to feel no amount of justice is going to be enough, but I do feel that every year that was handed down to Mr. Gilbert was fair,” Monica said. Monica added that her sister issued a protective order against her former lover. “Brings me comfort knowing that now that he is...

title: Mars to boost snack portfolio in mega $36 billion deal for Pringles maker Kellanova
content: Family-owned candy giant Mars is buying Cheez-It maker Kellanova in a nearly $36 billion deal, bringing together consumer food brands from M&M’s and Snickers to Pringles and Pop-Tarts in one of the biggest deals in the industry. Mars said on Wednesday it will pay $83.50 per share for Kellanova, representing about 33 per cent premium to its closing price on August 2 before Reuters first reported that Mars was exploring a deal for the Pringles maker. The US packaged food sector is seeing robust dealmaking as companies seek scale to weather the impact of consumers shifting to cheaper private label brands due to rising prices. Investors are also worried of a decline in sales from the greater adoption of weight-loss drugs such as Ozempic and Wegovy that could curb appetite and lead to feelings of fullness. Mars said it plans bolster its snacking division, invest locally and introduce more healthier options through the deal, as the category is “attractive and durable”. The company has a 4.54 per cent share of the US snacking market, while Kellanova holds about 3.9 per cent, according to data from GlobalData, well behind market leader PepsiCo. The acquisition, which dwarfs Mars’ $23 billion takeover of Wrigley in 2008, is also not expected to face too many antitrust roadblocks due to the limited overlap in the offerings of the two companies, legal experts had told Reuters. After the...

title: Indian cricket team: Former South Africa pacer Morkel appointed as bowling coach
content: Former South Africa pacer Morne Morkel was on Wednesday appointed as the bowling coach of the Indian team. "South African pacer Morne Morkel appointed as new bowling coach of team India", Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) Secretary Jay Shah told ANI. India and Karnataka bowler Vinay Kumar was also reported to be in contention to replace Mhambrey as team India's bowling coach. But Morkel has been appointed ahead of him. Stay up to date with the latest news. Follow KT on WhatsApp Channels. Morkel has previously worked with head coach Gautam Gambhir with Lucknow Super Giants in the Indian Premier League. Morkel also served as the bowling coach of India's arch-rival Pakistan. He was appointed in June 2023 and left after the conclusion of the ODI World Cup in November last year. But he left six weeks before his contract was meant to expire. During his playing days, the 39-year-old was one of the tearaways in South Africa's star-studded pace bowling line-up. He made 86 Test appearances for the Proteas and claimed 309 wickets at an average of 27.7. In the ODI format, Morkel played 117 matches and scythed 188 wickets at an average of 25.3. In the shortest format of the sport, he made 44 appearances and claimed 47 scalps to his name at an average of 25.3.

दिल्ली में बंटी-बबली गैंग: चोरी और लूटपाट करने वाले पति और पत्नी दबोचे गए, दोनों के खिलाफ पहले से कई मामले दर्ज
content: Delhi Crime News दिल्ली पुलिस ने दंपती को गिरफ्तार किया है। दोनों चोरी और लूट की वारदात को अंजाम देते थे। दोनों बंटी-बबली बनकर चोरियों को अंजाम देते थे। इनके खिलाफ पहले से ही कई आपराधिक मामले दर्ज हैं। इन दोनों को लोगों ने पहले से ही संदिग्ध होने पर गिरफ्तार कर लिया था। सूचना के बाद मौके पर पुलिस पहुंची थी। जागरण संवाददाता, नई दिल्ली। उत्तरी जिले की बाड़ा हिंदू राव पुलिस की टीम ने बंटी-बबली की तर्ज पर लूटपाट करने वाले दंपती को गिरफ्तार किया है। चोरी का मोबाइल बरामद करते हुए आरोपियों को रंगे हाथ पुलिस ने गिरफ्तार किया है। पुरुष आरोपी का दिल्ली के विभिन्न पुलिस थानों में दर्ज डकैती, झपटमारी, नाइट सेंधमारी, चोट, चोरी और आर्म्स एक्ट के 30 आपराधिक मामलों में संलिप्त पाया गया है, जबकि उसकी पत्नी भी विभिन्न पुलिस थानों में दर्ज सात आपराधिक मामलों में संलिप्त पाई गई। लोगों ने ही दोनों को पकड़ा उत्तरी जिले के डीसीपी के मुताबिक, सोमवार को बाड़ा हिंदू राव के गली भौजी में चोर को पकड़ने के संबंध में जानकारी मिली थी। पुलिस टीम मौके पर पहुंची और देखा कि पुरुष और एक महिला संदिग्धों को लोगों ने पकड़ा है। उन्हें पुलिस हिरासत में लिया गया और पूछताछ की गई। बंटी-बबली गैंग की तर्ज पर चोरी पूछताछ में उनकी पहचान दक्षिणपुरी के गौरव उर्फ बकरा और पत्नी वंदना उर्फ बॉबी के रूप में हुई। उन्होंने कबूल किया कि वे बंटी-बबली गैंग की तर्ज पर लूट, झपटमारी और चोरी की वारदातों को अंजाम दे रहे थे। तलाशी लेने पर उनके कब्जे से चोरी किया गया मोबाइल फोन बरामद किया गया। पुलिस ने दोनों को अदालत में पेश किया जहां से...

title: Zapotlanejo: Inundaciones causan emergencia en el municipio este miércoles
content: Una lluvia intensa azotó al municipio de Zapotlanejo, Jalisco, y provocó inundaciones severas en la cabecera municipal y otras delegaciones . Las imágenes comienzan a circular en redes sociales y muestran la magnitud de la tragedia . Según los primeros reportes en medios de comunicación, lo que provocó las inundaciones por las calles del municipio fue el desbordamiento de una presa y del Río La Peñita, aunque la información no está oficializada por el momento . Lo que sí muestran los videos es el poder que tuvo el agua que fue capaz de arrastrar vehículos . De acuerdo a algunos señalamientos, se decía que una persona también fue arrastrada la crecida. El hecho fue confirmado más tarde por Protección Civil y el alcalde de Zapotlanejo, que mencionó la muerte del hombre . Pobladores han comentado que el agua registró el nivel de entre metro y medio y dos metros de altura . En breve, más información... * * * Mantente al día con las noticias, únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp * * * OA

title: STIŽE NOVA POMOĆ DRŽAVE ZA MLADE! Ko dobija tačno 5.000 dinara, a ko više i za koje profile tačno važi ova prijava
content: " Država je odlučila da podrži mlade koji se školuju po dualnom modelu obrazovanja, upravo za one profile za koje smo procenili da su deficitarni, zajedno sa našim partnerima, Nacionalnom službom za zapošljavanje i Privrednom komorom Srbije", rekla je ona. Navela je da je prva dva konkursa raspisala Kancelarija za dualno obrazovanje i da je prvi konkurs namenjen učenicima koji su se upisali na profile za dualno obrazovanje u deficitarnim zanimanjima i koji će imati pravo da ostvare stipendiju u trajanju od 9 meseci svake godine za vreme svog formalnog školovanja, u iznosu od 5.000 dinara. "Oni će po prvi put kao mladi ljudi sa 15,16 godina, kada se upišu na svoje školovanje, imati priliku da otvore svoje račune u Poštanskoj štedionici i da vide neku valorizaciju svoje posvećenosti u procesu učenja kroz rad i u kompanijama. Da mogu da preko one zagarantovane sume koju dobijaju od privrednika u iznosu od 70 odsto od minimalne cene rada, ostvaruju svakog meseca i 5.000 dinara stipendije koju finansira država, odnosno Vlada Republike Srbije", rekla je Grujuć. title: Veridix AI, člen Emmes Group, predstavuje nové možnosti digitalizácie protokolov
content: Digitalizácia protokolov extrahuje štruktúrované dátové prvky z neštruktúrovaného textu Automatizuje budovanie študijných databáz a skracuje tak čas potrebný na budovanie až o 30 % Nasadené v rámci 40 štúdijných projektov v portfóliu CRO Emmes V budúcnosti umožní automatizovanú konštrukciu eCRF ROCKVILLE, Md. , 14. augusta 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Veridix AI, člen skupiny Emmes Group, organizácia zmluvného výskumu (CRO) s podporou špeciálnych technológií a umelej inteligencie, dnes oznámila uvedenie nových možností digitalizácie protokolov. Táto pokročilá funkcia kladie základy pre urýchlenie procesu budovania klinických štúdií až o 30 %. Tento nový prístup, vytvorený v rámci jednotnej eklinickej platformy od Veridix AI, Advantage eClinical Cloud, využíva techniky spracovania prirodzeného jazyka (NLP) v kombinácii s AI na digitalizáciu protokolov klinických skúšok do štruktúrovaných dátových prvkov, ako sú rozvrhy návštev, kohorty a eCRF. Prístup trénovaný a optimalizovaný podľa predchádzajúcich klinických údajov umožňuje automatické generovanie rozvrhov návštev a poskytuje zoznam predpovedaných eCRF s presnosťou viac ako 82 %. Procesy klinických skúšok dlho narúšali pomalé, manuálne a chybové procesy. To sa týka aj preskúmania protokolu na určenie prvkov potrebných na zostavenie...

title: Boulos se esquiva sobre Moraes, e Nunes diz que Judiciário não pode ser pêndulo
creator: Carolina Linhares, Joelmir Tavares
content: O prefeito de São Paulo , Ricardo Nunes (MDB), afirmou ver com preocupação a revelação da Folha de que o gabinete de Alexandre de Moraes no STF ordenou de forma não oficial a produção de relatórios pela Justiça Eleitoral para embasar decisões do próprio ministro contra bolsonaristas no inquérito das fake news . Nunes, que concorre à reeleição com o apoio de Jair Bolsonaro ( PL ), disse que o Judiciário não pode ser "pêndulo" e que cabem esclarecimentos. "O fortalecimento e a consolidação da democracia necessariamente precisa passar por um Judiciário que não faça pêndulo, que não penda nem para um lado e nem para outro. Portanto, o que a gente espera é que a maior corte do nosso pais possa trazer à sociedade um esclarecimento", disse nesta quarta-feira (14), antes do debate realizado pelo jornal O Estado de S. Paulo, pelo portal Terra e pela Faap. Principal adversário de Nunes na corrida, o deputado federal Guilherme Boulos ( PSOL ) disse não ter lido as reportagens e, portanto, não quis comentar. "Eu estava no Jaraguá e em Taipas, eu estava focado na campanha aqui em São Paulo. Não tive nem a oportunidade, para ser franco de ler a matéria e ouvir os áudios", afirmou. Pablo Marçal (PRTB), que flerta com o bolsonarismo, afirmou, sem apresentar evidências ou provas, que a crítica sobre a atuação de Alexandre de Moraes tem o apoio do...

title: Kangana Ranaut would love to direct and produce a film with Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan for THIS reason
Sudan's SPLM-N rebel group declares famine in its territory
content: DUBAI (Reuters) - A rebel group controlling Sudan's Nuba Mountains and parts of Blue Nile state said on Wednesday that the local population was experiencing a hunger catastrophe. The Sudan People's Liberation Movement-North (SPLM-N) said that 20% of families were suffering severe food shortages, while 30% of children suffered from malnutrition. An Arabic version of the statement described the situation as a famine. It said the parties involved in Sudan's civil war and a poor harvest were to blame for the crisis. The situation in the two regions was "the most severe compared to other states," the SPLM-N said. "The little foodstock that the host community has been able to produce is being shared and rapidly depleted." Some 3.9 million people live in the two territories under SPLM-N control, a number that swelled after people from other parts of the country were displaced by the fighting. The ongoing war between Sudan's army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) has plunged half the population of about 50 million into food insecurity and created the world's largest humanitarian crisis. Across the country, some 756,000 people face catastrophic hunger, the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification, a global hunger monitor, said in June. Both the army and the RSF are accused of blocking aid from reaching targeted areas, and of damaging the infrastructure and markets...

title: เกือบไม่มีวันนี้ "ข้าวฟ่าง" เผยตอนเด็กเป็นนักฟุตบอล-ฟุตซอล บอกพ่อเงินไม่ใช่ปัญหา สร้างบ้านให้แน่
content: "ธีรพงศ์ ศิลาชัย" เล่าชีวิตตอนเด็กเคยเป็นนักฟุตบอล และนักฟุตซอล มาก่อน ก่อนท้ายที่สุดจะเลือกยกน้ําหนัก พร้อมบอกพ่อเงินไม่ใช่ปัญหา สร้างบ้านให้แน่ วันที่ 14 ส.ค. 67 "ข้าวฟ่าง" ธีรพงศ์ ศิลาชัย เจ้าของเหรียญเงินยกน้ําหนัก โอลิมปิก 2024 เล่าชีวิตตอนเด็กเคยเป็นนักฟุตบอล และนักฟุตซอล มาก่อน ก่อนท้ายที่สุดจะเลือกมุ่งหน้าเข้าหา เส้นทางการเป็นนักกีฬายกน้ําหนัก พร้อมบอกพ่อเรื่องเงินไม่ใช่ปัญหา สร้างบ้านให้ตามที่สัญญาไว้อย่างแน่นอน ทั้งนี้ "ข้าวฟ่าง" ธีรพงศ์ ศิลาชัย ออกมาเล่าว่า "ตอนเด็กเราเห็นชีวิตที่ลําบาก เราก็คิดว่าเมื่อเราโตขึ้นเราจะต้องไม่ลําบากแบบนี้ โดยที่คนรอบข้างต้องมีคุณภาพชีวิตที่ดีขึ้นด้วย นั่นทําให้เรามีความฝันที่อยากจะติดทีมชาติ ตั้งแต่ ป.1 ซึ่งหลังจากนั้นเราก็ทุ่มเทกับกีฬาอย่างเดียว ตอนแรกเป็นนักฟุตบอลโรงเรียน และฟุตซอล มาก่อน โดยเล่นในตําแหน่งกองหน้า แต่จริงๆ ได้ทุกตําแหน่งทุกอย่าง (ยิ้ม) แต่ตอนนี้เดาะบอลยังไม่ได้เลย (หัวเราะ) นอกจากนี้ "ข้าวฟ่าง" ธีรพงศ์ ศิลาชัย ยังบอกพ่อถึงการสร้างบ้านใหม่อีกด้วยว่า "เรื่องบ้านก็แล้วแต่ที่พ่อชอบเลย อยากได้ตรงไหน อยากได้แบบไหน ขอให้บอกมาได้เลย เรื่องเงินไม่ต้องห่วง ไม่ใช่ปัญหา"

title: I Dibala blizu odlaska u Saudijsku Arabiju
content: Posle dve sezone koliko je proveo u ekipi Rome, Dibala je dobio ponudu Al Kvadsijah, a prema najavama pregovori ove dve ekipe oko Argentinca su u završnoj fazi. Međutim tek treba da se dogovore oko plaćanja obeštećenja, koje za Dibalu iznosi 12 miliona evra. Ukoliko se ovaj transfer obistini, Dibala bi napustio Rim, gde je uprkos čestim povredama koji su ga često odstanile sa terena u karijeri. 🚨🇸🇦 Saudi side Al Qadsiah are closing in on agreement with Paulo Dybala on three year contract. title: AMD 锐龙 R9 9900X 及 9950X 处理器上架京东:3399~4899 元,明晚开卖
content: IT之家 8 月 14 日消息,随着 AMD 锐龙 9 系列处理器解禁,R9 9900X 以及 R9 9950X 两款处理器现已上架并开启预约,8 月 15 日 21:00 正式开售。 锐龙 9000 系列是继锐龙 7000“Raphael”和锐龙 8000“Hawk Point”系列之后,AM5 插槽的第三个系列;配备最多两个 Zen5 小芯片,每个小芯片最多有 8 个核心,最高 16 个内核和 32 线程,与锐龙 7000 系列类似,该系列处理器继续支持 SMT(同时多线程), 号称拥有 16% 的 IPC 提升 。 根据 AMD 官方测试,与英特尔酷睿 i9-14900K 相比,旗舰 16 核 Ryzen 9 9950X 在游戏中的速度 快 4% 到 23% 。在生产力测试中,9950X 显示出更大的优势,比 i9-14900K 快 7% 至 56%。 根据 IT之家测试 ,锐龙 9 9900X 处理器在 CPU-Z 自带的基准测试中单线程和多线程上的提升约为 12.9% 和 8%;在 CineBench R23 中的单线程和多线程上提升约为 10.1% 和 16.3%。 目前,AMD 电脑官方自营旗舰店已经上架了多个搭载锐龙 9000 系列处理器的主机产品,感兴趣的用户可以关注一下: 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: Erster Haftbefehl im Zusammenhang mit den Sprengungen der Nord Stream-Pipeline erlassen
What Did Brad Pitt Say About Retiring?
creator: Disheeta Maheshwari
content: What Did Brad Pitt Say About Retiring? By stirred retirement rumors in 2022 after saying in a GQ interview that he was on the “last legs” of his acting career. This led many to speculate that he was ready to leave Hollywood behind. Now fans are curious to know whether Brad Pitt is . Here is everything to know whether is retiring. Is Brad Pitt retiring? In a cover story with George Clooney, Pitt clarified his earlier remarks. The actor said that while he feels his career is naturally slowing down, he isn’t planning to retire anytime soon. Reflecting on his earlier “last legs” comment, Pitt explained that he was referring to the different phases of his life and career. He compared his journey to the changing seasons, from the excitement of his early days to the responsibilities and opportunities that came with success. Now, as he looks ahead, Pitt is more focused on enjoying life, cherishing his loved ones, and contemplating how he wants to spend his remaining years in the industry. Pitt also shared how observing his aging parents and the enduring creativity of figures like architect Frank Gehry has influenced his perspective. The actor said, “I see my parents are very — I see just what George was explaining. In your 80s, the body becomes more frail. And yet I look at Frank Gehry. He’s just the loveliest man. And he’s 95 and still making great art and he’s got a beautiful...

title: Сестра Майкла Джексона рассказала о связи со Стиви Уандером
creator: Андрей Шеньшаков
content: Сестра Майкла Джексона Джанет рассказала, что состоит в родстве с другими известными личностями. Об этом певица сообщила в интервью испанскому изданию Marca. По словам певицы, об их родстве знают немногие. «Стиви Уандер наш кузен по материнской линии. Как и Трейси Чепмен, как и Сэмюэль Л. Джексон» — заявила она. Ранее Джанет Джексон рассказала о том, что могла сыграть в кино культовую роль.

title: 上月通膨率跌破3%!美股道瓊早盤平盤震盪 台積電ADR跌逾1%
content: 在美國上月 通膨 率跌破3%的鼓舞下, 美股 三大 指數 14日早盤小幅開高後陷入震盪, 台積電 ADR開低走低。 道瓊工業指數早盤漲0.07%、標普500指數漲0.1%、那斯達克指數漲0.15%、費城 半導體 指數漲0.2%、台積電ADR跌逾1%、輝達漲1%,之後翻黑。 美國勞工部統計局14日公布,7月消費者物價指數( CPI )年增率為低於預期的2.9%,下探2021年來低點,也比6月的3%進一步減速;月增率則為0.2%,符合市場預期。扣除糧食與能源的核心通膨指數為月升0.2%,同樣符合預期。 摩根士丹利E-Trade交易與投資執行董事拉金說,這項通膨數據的冷卻程度,或許不如昨日的生產者物價指數(PPI),但不會影響大局,「如今最重大的問題是, 聯準會 ( Fed )下月的降息幅度究竟是1碼還是2碼?」 根據芝商所FedWatch指數,Fed在下月18日政策會議後,降息1碼或2碼的機率為五五波。拉金表示,若未來五周多數數據皆指向經濟放緩,Fed可能更激進降息。 目前美股三大指數已高於8月2日收盤時的水準,也就是8月5日全球股災的前一個交易日。

title: Negro Tulio, de los Chone Killer, daba órdenes desde la cárcel a los funcionarios de Durán para cometer delitos como narcotráfico, tráfico de armas y explosivos
creator: Carolina Pimentel
content: El 30 de mayo pasado se detuvo en Panamá a Julio Alberto M. A., alias Negro Tulio , señalado como cabecilla de Chone Killers, y días después llegó a Guayaquil, donde le dictaron prisión preventiva por varios asesinatos y fue encarcelado en La Roca. La Policía detectó que desde esa cárcel de máxima seguridad seguía dando órdenes y tenía nexos con funcionarios de Durán. Este objetivo de alto valor incluso seguía reclutando a funcionarios del Municipio, del Cuerpo de Bomberos y de la Agencia de Tránsito de Durán (ATD), así lo indicó el general Freddy Sarzosa, director de Investigaciones de la Policía. Él estuvo la madrugada de este miércoles, 14 de agosto, en el cantón ferroviario en medio de la intervención de las oficinas. Se detuvo en total a 23 personas, entre funcionarios y civiles. En esta lista también consta alias Negro Tulio, quien ya estaba preso. A los capturados se los llevó al Cuartel Modelo de Guayaquil, entre ellos están seis mujeres y un hombre con uniforme de bombero. El general Sarzosa anunció que se ha descubierto que las entidades públicas allanadas prestaban sus servicios de manera ilícita a la organización delictiva Chone Killers. El jefe policial indicó que el Cuerpo de Bomberos de Durán era la fachada para el tráfico de drogas y que se usaban los carros de la institución para el traslado del alcaloide, de armas y...

title: The cheap, unprocessed longevity smoothie a Blue Zone nutrition expert makes every morning
creator: hbrueck@businessinsider.com (Hilary Brueck)
content: Breakfast smoothies are a hit with many longevity experts. A Blue Zone doctor shared one of the simplest recipes: a blend of leftover nuts and fruit. His technique takes minutes and doesn't involve any expensive powders or green drinks. Dr. Joan Sabate views breakfast as a daily opportunity to fuel up on some of the most important nutrient-dense food groups that support healthy longevity. His strategy is dirt cheap, too. Sabate, a healthy eating expert so esteemed in nutrition circles that he was tapped to develop the federal diet recommendations that are now in use across the US, says it needn't be time-consuming or expensive to enjoy a healthy breakfast. He lives in America's only longevity Blue Zone , where healthy eating is made easy by a mix of religious habits and local regulations that support consistent nutrition and exercise routines. At home with his wife of 45 years, Sabate has developed a trick for making effortless, nutrient-dense breakfast smoothies. His "fruit shake," as he calls it, involves a few leftovers plus protein and healthy fats that keep him going for hours. "What we have is basically a simple meal," Sabate, a professor of nutrition and epidemiology at Loma Linda University School of Public Health in California, told Business Insider. "It is not sophisticated — we don't eat ultra-processed foods ." A blender full of fruit and nuts is his longevity...

title: Geçmişe yolculuk: Oylum Höyük kazıları devam ediyor
content: Suriye sınırının sıfır noktasındaki Oylum Höyük'te, Kültür ve Turizm Bakanlığı, Kilis Valiliği, Gaziantep Üniversitesi ve GAP Bölge Kalkınma İdaresi Başkanı işbirliğiyle başlatılan kazı çalışmalarında Gaziantep Üniversitesi Arkeoloji Bölümü Başkanı Prof. Dr. Atilla Engin başkanlığında 35 kişilik ekip yer alıyor. Prof. Dr. Engin, gazetecilere, höyükteki kazıların 35 yıla yakın süredir kesintisiz devam ettiğini söyledi. Oylum Höyük'ün Güneydoğu Anadolu Bölgesi’nin en uzun soluklu kazı projesi olduğunu belirten Engin, şöyle konuştu: "Kazı çalışmalarında özellikle bölge arkeolojisine ışık tutan çok önemli bilgiler elde ediliyor. Kültür ve Turizm Bakanlığı ile Gaziantep Üniversitesi adına yürütülen bu çalışmalar, Cumhurbaşkanlığı kararı ile yapılan bir kazı. 12 aylık kazı projesi kapsamında çalışmalar devam etmekte. Oylum Höyük, Kilis bölgesinin en önemli kültür varlıklarının başında gelmekte." Kazılarda gün yüzüne çıkarın eserlerle Kilis turizmine katkı sunmayı amaçladıklarını anlatan Engin, şunları kaydetti: "Oylum Höyük Kazı Projesi ile höyük ve 200 metre güneybatısında açığa çıkartılan ve bir açık hava müzesi haline getirilen Oylum Höyük Bazilikasının çeşitli uygulama çalışmalarını gerçekleştireceğiz ve amacımız özellikle bu iki kültür varlığını turizm cazibe merkezi haline getirmek....

content: İzmir'in Buca ilçesinde kaldırımda beklerken otomobilden açılan ateşte Yusuf Demir'in (17) öldürülmesine ilişkin davada tutuklu sanık Hasan Tımarlı (52) ile maktulün yakınları arasında gerginlik çıktı. Hasan Tırmalı'nın "Izdırap yaşıyorum. Merhametli bir insan, bu yaşta bir çocuğun ölümüne nasıl üzülmez?" deyince, Yusuf Demir'in babası Nurettin Demir, masadaki pet su şişesini sanığa fırlattı. Kısa gerginliğin ardından duruşmada sükunet sağlanırken, Hasan Tırmarlı'nın oğlu diğer tutuklu sanık Hakan Berke Tımarlı (23), "Babamın silah taşıdığını bilmiyordum yoksa tepki gösterirdim" dedi. Demir, başına isabet eden kurşunla yığılırken, otomobil hızla uzaklaştı. Otomobille Buca Seyfi Demirsoy Hastanesi'ne kaldırılan Demir, kurtarılamadı. title: Tom Cruise is very ‘irritated’ by Nicole Kidman's constant ranting about their...

There were ideas [Kubrick] was interested in. He’d ask a lot of questions. But he had a strong sense of the story he was telling. I do remember him saying, ‘Triangles are hard. You have to tread carefully when it’s a triangle.’ Because one person could feel ganged up on. But he was aware of that and knew how to manage us.” She also told the New York Times in October 2020 while addressing the same film, “We were happily married through that.” The...

title: પાર્ટીશન ડિઝાસ્ટર મેમોરિયલ ડે:પાર્ટીશન હોરર્સ મેમોરિયલ ડે નિમિત્તે વડોદરા મંડળના 6 રેલવે સ્ટેશનો પર ફોટો પ્રદર્શનનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું
content: રંગબેરંગી રોશનીથી વડોદરા, એકતાનગર, પ્રતાપનગર, ડભોઈ અને ગોધરા સ્ટેશનો અને ડીઆરએમ ઓફિસો અને નેશનલ ઈન્સ્ટિટ્યૂટ ઓફ ઈન્ડિયન રેલવે (NAIR)ને શણગારવામાં આવ્યા છે. પશ્ચિમ રેલ્વેના વડોદરા ડિવિઝનમાં, 14મી ઓગસ્ટને લોકોના સંઘર્ષ અને બલિદાનની યાદમાં "પાર્ટીશન ડિઝ ઇતિહાસની અદમ્ય હકીકતો પ્રદર્શિત કરવામાં આવી આ દરમિયાન વડોદરા ડિવિઝનના વડોદરા, પ્રતાપનગર, એકતાનગર, ગોધરા, ભરૂચ અને આણંદ સ્ટેશન અને પ્રતાપનગર સ્થિત ડીઆરએમ ઓફિસ ખાતે ફોટો પ્રદર્શનનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું. આ દિવસ દેશના તે લોકોના સંઘર્ષ અને બલિદાનની યાદમાં ઉજવવામાં આવે છે. જેમણે નફરત અને હિંસાથી પોતાનો જીવ ગુમાવ્યો હતો. આ ફોટો પ્રદર્શનમાં, દેશના વિભાજન દરમિયાન જે લાખો લોકોની હૃદયદ્રાવક પીડા સહન કરવા પડ્યા હતા તેમની અને વેદનાને ઉજાગર કરવા માટે ઇતિહાસની અદમ્ય હકીકતો પ્રદર્શિત કરવામાં આવી છે. NAIR ખાતે આકર્ષક રોશની કરવામાં આવી હતી આ પ્રદર્શન માનવ વસ્તીના સૌથી મોટા વિનાશને સમર્પિત છે. પાછલી સદીમાં તે વિસ્થાપનની યાદ અપાવે છે. જેમાં મોટી સંખ્યામાં લોકોએ પોતાનો જીવ ગુમાવ્યો હતો. આ સ્ટેશનો પર મોટી સંખ્યામાં લોકોએ આ પ્રદર્શનની મુલાકાત લીધી હતી. રંગબેરંગી રોશનીથી સુશોભિત સ્ટેશન હર ઘર તિરંગા અભિયાન અંતર્ગત વડોદરા મંડળના વડોદરા, એકતાનગર, પ્રતાપનગર, ડભોઇ અને ગોધરા સ્ટેશન, ડીઆરએમ ઓફિસ અને નેશનલ ઇન્સ્ટિટ્યૂટ ઓફ ઇન્ડિયન રેલવે (એનએઆઇઆર) ખાતે આકર્ષક રોશની કરવામાં આવી હતી.

"모텔 가도 성관계 안했어요" 주장에, 법원 "불륜이다" 판결
creator: 임재환 기자 rehwan@imaeil.com
content: 법원 자료사진. 매일신문 DB 성관계를 하지 않았더라도 모텔에 함께 투숙하고 드라이브를 했다면 불륜으로 볼 수 있다는 법원 판결이 14일 나왔다. 이날 법조계에 따르면 서울북부지법은 A씨가 자신의 배우자와 내연관계인 B씨를 상대로 낸 손해배상 청구 소송에서 원고 일부승소 판결했다. 재판부는 "B씨는 A씨에게 위자료 1천500만원을 지급하라"고 판시했다. A씨가 당초 청구한 3천만원 중 절반만 손해배상 책임을 인정한 것이다. 연극배우인 B씨는 A씨의 배우자인 C씨와 같은 공연에 출연하면서 가까워졌다. 이들은 함께 드라이브를 갔다 오거나 모텔에 투숙하기도 했다. A씨는 B씨를 상대로 정신적 손해배상을 청구했다. B씨가 자신의 배우자와 부정행위를 저질러 부부 공동생활이 침해됐고 정신적으로 고통받았다는 이유였다. 이에 B씨는 C씨와 교제한 사실이 없고 연극 선후배 사이로 고민을 상담한 사이일 뿐이라고 반박했다. 술에 만취해 잠시 모텔에 들어간 사실은 있었으나 성관계는 하지 않았다고 주장했다. 그러나 법원은 B씨와 C씨 사이의 부정행위가 있었던 것으로 판단했다. 대법원은 간통에 이르지 않았더라도 부부의 정조의무에 충실하지 않은 일체의 부정한 행위를 '배우자의 부정행위'로 본다. 실제로 B씨는 C씨에게 메시지를 주고받으면서 "보고 싶다"고 표현하기도 했다. 또 B씨가 "우리 무슨 사이야"라고 묻는 질문에 C씨가 "불륜"이라고 답한...

title: Mental health after the Olympics: why so many athletes struggle to adapt to normal life after big competitions
creator: Juan González-Hernández, Professor and Researcher on Personality, Sport and Health Psychology, Universidad de Granada
content: “It’s like I’ve got no strength left at all. Right now I can’t even summon the energy to drink a glass of water, it’s like I’ve been hollowed out from the inside. We spend so much time and energy preparing for glory, but now that I’m living with it I just feel weak and helpless.” Anonymous sportsperson, weeks after competing in the Olympic Games. Every athlete constructs their self-image through experiences, values and perceptions related to the intensity of their training and the level of their achievements . The value they attach to their expectations, efforts and suffering significantly influences their behaviour, motivation, memories and wellbeing. But with the 2024 Olympic Games at an end, many of them will be struggling to find meaning beyond the realms of competition, with serious mental health consequences for some. Mental dedication: a full-time job According to data published by the International Olympic Committee in 2023 , 33.6% of elite athletes suffer from anxiety and depression, and when their career ends, 26.4% experience severe mental health problems. Athletes identify so strongly with their work and goals (whether they achieve them or not), and dedicate so much effort to training that they often overlook or justify the downsides: detachment from loved ones and close friends, difficulty maintaining a social life , and constant pressure to perform at the highest...

title: Багатодітна мати на Буковині садила на ланцюг 10-річного сина: поліція проводить розслідування
creator: Українська правда
content: Жителька Чернівецького району прив’язувала 10-річного сина ланцюгом за ногу. Вона утримувала його у дворі, "щоб не втікав". Наразі дитину забрали у матері та доставили в лікарню, повідомили у Нацполіції Чернівецької області. До правоохоронців звернулася староста Старостинського округу, яка помітила прив’язаного ланцюгом хлопчика, коли проходила повз будинок. 34-річна жінка має шістьох дітей – 3, 4, 6, 7 та 10 років, також 14-річну донечку, яка постійно проживає з бабусею. Чоловік багатодітної сім'ї загинув, тож мати виховує малечу самостійно, розповіла речниця Нацполіції Чернівецької області Кароліна Маришева у коментарі для "УП.Життя". Вона додала, що жінка раніше не мала проблем із правоохоронцями чи соціальними службами. Свої дії багатодітна мати назвала методом виховання, бо її малолітній син бешкетував та втікав з дому. Наразі поліцейські забрали усіх дітей від матері та з'ясовують деталі інциденту. У цей час сини проживатимуть у бабусі та дідуся. Правоохоронці відкрили кримінальне провадження за статтею катування. Санкція статті передбачає позбавлення волі на строк від 3 до 6 років.

title: Udruženju "Čep za hendikep" potrebna pomoć svih nas: Za 12 godina kupili su 130 pomagala za osobe sa invaliditetom, pomozimo im da ova lepa priča NE STANE
content: Ako imate naviku da plastične čepove sa praznih flaša odmah odvajate i čuvate ne bi li ih ubacili u kutiju sa oznakom "Čep za hendikep", onda znate koliko veliku stvar činite i pomažete pomenutom udruženju da nastavi svoju misiju na kojoj se nalazi već 12 godina.

title: Virgil van Dijk makes Premier League title prediction with Liverpool promise
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Chris McKenna)
content: Virgil van Dijk insists Liverpool have to learn from the mistakes of last season if they’re to challenge for the trophies again. The Reds may have a new head coach in Arne Slot but the club captain is looking to build on last campaign Jurgen Klopp’s side lifted the Carabao Cup last February and, at one stage, had the chance of a quadruple. But they lost in the FA Cup to bitter rivals Manchester United in the quarter-finals before a surprise exit in the Europa League to eventual winners Atalanta in the last eight. Then Manchester City and Arsenal pushed ahead of them in the Premier League title race. Now they’ve had a reset with a new boss and coaching staff but Van Dijk is hoping the experience of last term will help this group of players. When asked on the areas the team need to improve, Van Dijk told ESPN: “It’s difficult to give an answer to that because there are so many things that play a part. “Obviously two other teams were just more consistent, they were better in dealing with the situation, they had more quality at the time. And we were maybe a little bit too inexperienced. We had a little bit of injuries, we were not good enough, maybe the nerves kicked in. “That’s definitely something we have to learn. But I can’t really put it on one particular thing that went wrong and why we couldn’t compete until the last day. But I think everyone had to reflect, had to think...

title: நீண்ட நேரம் உட்கார்ந்திருந்தால் கால்கள் வீங்குகிறதா? இதெல்லாம் தான் காரணங்கள்..
content: நீண்ட நேரம் உட்காரும் போது பலருக்கு பாதங்களில் வீக்கம் ஏற்படுகிறது. கால்களின் செல்கள் மற்றும் திசுக்களில் அதிகப்படியான திரவம் குவிந்து அசௌகரியம், வலியை ஏற்படுத்துவதுடன் அது நடப்பதிலும் சிரமத்தை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது. இது நீரிழிவு அல்லது இதய நோய் போன்ற முக்கிய உடல்நலப் பிரச்சினைகளின் அறிகுறியாகவும் இருக்கலாம். எனவே, கால்கள் வீங்கியிருந்தால் புறக்கணிக்கக் கூடாது. நீண்ட நேரம் உட்கார்ந்திருக்கும் போது உங்கள் கால்கள் ஏன் வீங்குகிறது என்று இந்த பதிவில் பார்க்கலாம். புவியீர்ப்பு நீங்கள் நீண்ட நேரம் உட்காரும் போது, ​​ஈர்ப்பு விசையானது உங்கள் இரத்தத்தை உங்கள் கீழ் முனைகளுக்கு, குறிப்பாக உங்கள் கால்களில் பாய்ச்சலாம். இது இரத்த நாளங்களுக்குள் அழுத்தத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும், இதனால் கால்களை சுற்றியுள்ள செல்கள் மற்றும் திசுக்களில் திரவங்களை வெளியேற்றும். இது இறுதியில் வீக்கம் அல்லது எடிமாவை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது. மோசமான சுழற்சி நீங்கள் நீண்ட நேரம் உட்காரும்போது, இரத்தம் இதயத்திற்குத் திரும்பும் விதத்தைப் பாதிக்கலாம். இந்த மோசமான சுழற்சி உங்கள் கால்கள் மற்றும் கால்களின் நரம்புகளில் இரத்தம் குவிந்து, அதன் மூலம், நரம்புகளுக்குள் அழுத்தம் அதிகரிப்பதால் வீக்கம் ஏற்படுகிறது. அதிகப்படியான உப்பு உணவில் அதிக உப்பை சேர்த்துக் கொள்வது உடலில் நீர் தேக்கத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும், இது உடலில் வீக்கத்தை மோசமாக்கும். நீங்கள் நீண்ட நேரம் உட்காரும் போது, ​​அது திரவ சமநிலையை நிர்வகிக்கும் உங்கள் உடலின் திறனை பாதிக்கிறது, இதனால் உடலில் வீக்கம் ஏற்படுகிறது. இதய நிலைமைகள் இதய செயலிழப்பு போன்ற இதய நோய்கள் இதயத்தின் இரத்த...

title: Photos: Lamb of God and Mastodon celebrate 20th anniversary of seminal albums by playing them in full
creator: Alyssa Goelzer
content: MOORHEAD — A night of heavy metal rang across Bluestem Amphitheater on Tuesday, Aug. 13, when Lamb of God and Mastodon thundered into town. The two acts are both celebrating the 20th anniversary of seminal albums and played them in full. Lamb of God, of Richmond, Virginia, began in 2000 and released “Ashes of the Wake” in 2004. The disc includes “Laid to Rest,” “Omerta” and “Now You’ve Got Something to Die For.” Mastodon’s epic “Leviathan” from that same year is concept album based on the novel, “Moby Dick” and includes the tracks “Blood and Thunder” and “Iron Tusk.” British metalcore band Malevolence opened the show, followed by Kerry King, founding guitarist of the thrash metal band Slayer, which performed a farewell tour to Fargo in 2019 .

title: Fuerte temporal en Formentera: un pescador desaparecido y nueve tripulantes de un velero heridos tras chocar contra las rocas
creator: Ricardo F. Colmenero
content: El temporal que está atravesando la Península se ha dejado sentir con fuerza en Baleares y, en concreto, en la isla de Formentera, donde Salvamento Marítimo busca a un pescador desaparecido, y nueve personas han resultado heridas, dos de ellas de gravedad, después de que su velero chocara contra las rocas en Cala Saona. Sobre las 10.54 horas los servicios de emergencia recibieron la alerta del accidente del velero, y los bomberos de la isla fueron los encargados de rescatar a los ocupantes, todos ellos de nacionalidad italiana, accediendo al barco desde las rocas. Los heridos han sido evacuados en ambulancias al hospital de la isla. Los más graves, un hombre que ha sufrido un traumatismo en la mano con amputación de un dedo , y una mujer que ha sufrido un traumatismo grave en una pierna. El resto sufrieron heridas y contusiones de diversa consideración. Mientras tanto, medios marítimos y aéreos buscan a un pescador que salió a pescar en solitario a bordo de un llaüt por la zona de La Mola, después de que sus familiares alertaran de su desaparición. Decenas de embarcaciones han acabado varadas, hundidas o estampadas contra las rocas en diversos puntos de Baleares, pero especialmente en Formentera. Por la mañana se registraron vientos de hasta 50 nudos que provocaron el cierre del puerto de la Savina, y la suspensión de las comunicaciones entre las islas de Ibiza...

title: Bengaluru: 1 Dead, Another Injured In Suspected Pressure Cooker Blast; NIA At Scene
content: A man died and another was injured in a suspected pressure cooker blast in Bengaluru on Tuesday, police said today. Published: August 14, 2024 7:17 PM IST By t: A man was killed while another sustained critical injuries in a suspected pressure cooker blast in Puttenahalli area of Bengaluru. According to the police, the incident took place on Tuesday when the two men were cooking rice at their residence in Puttenahalli. “Two men staying in a house on the terrace of a building were preparing rice in a cooker when the lid of the vessel blew up resulting in burn injuries to both of them,” police said in a statement issued Wednesday. They said the duo were rushed to a hospital where one of them succumbed to his injuries on Wednesday morning while the other person is under treatment. The two men were identified as Sameer and Mohsin, both Uttar Pradesh residents, who were working as barbers in Bengaluru, the police said. A senior police officer said nothing suspicious was found during investigation and it was merely a cooking mishap. “All experts were consulted and a detailed investigation was done. There was no chemical or any suspicious object found. It was an incident of cooking mishap,” he said. However, a team of National Investigation Agency (NIA) sleuths arrived at the scene on Wednesday to cross examine the incident. “There is no evidence of the use of explosives or...

title: एटा में विभाजन की विभीषिका पर गोष्ठी का आयोजन:मंत्री बोले- विभाजन के दौरान लाखों लोगों ने जान गंवाई, धार्मिक आधार पर विभाजन कांग्रेस की देन
content: एटा के ग्रीन गार्डन में भारतीय जनता पार्टी ने विभाजन की विभीषिका पर गोष्ठी का आयोजन किया गया। इस कार्यक्रम में मुख्य अतिथि के रूप में उत्तर प्रदेश सरकार के बेसिक शिक्षा मंत्री संदीप सिंह ने शिरकत की। कार्यक्रम में विधायक मारहरा वीरेंद्र लोधी, एमएलसी बेसिक शिक्षा मंत्री संदीप सिंह ने विभाजन की विभीषिका पर कहा कि 15 अगस्त 1947 को भारत आजाद हुआ, लेकिन देश को विभाजन की विभीषिका का भी सामना करना पड़ा। विभाजन के दौरान लाखों लोगों ने अपनी जान गंवाई और यह धार्मिक आधार पर विभाजन कांग्रेस सरकार की देन था। कांग्रेस ने भारत को धार्मिक उन्माद में धकेल दिया और इस विभाजन के दौरान पाकिस्तान से आई रेल गाड़ियों में यात्रियों की जगह लाशें थीं। वर्तमान में भी विपक्ष लोगों को भ्रमित करने का काम कर रहा है, यह चिंता का विषय है। विधायक वीरेंद्र लोधी ने कहा कि आज के दिन भारत का धार्मिक आधार पर दो टुकड़े किए गए। पाकिस्तान से भारत आने वाले लोगों को अत्यधिक कष्ट सहन करना पड़ा। उन्होंने वर्तमान स्थिति पर चिंता व्यक्त करते हुए कहा कि आज भी कुछ ताकतें लोगों को गुमराह करने की कोशिश कर रही हैं और सभी को इन ताकतों से सतर्क रहना चाहिए। एमएलसी आशीष यादव ने कहा कि भारत और पाकिस्तान के बीच धर्म के नाम पर किया गया बटवारा कुछ देश विरोधी ताकतों की चाल थी। विभाजन के दौरान लाखों लोगों की हत्या की गई, उनके प्रतिष्ठान लूटे गए और महिलाओं और बेटियों के साथ अत्यधिक दुर्व्यवहार किया गया। इस दौरान भाजपा के जिला अध्यक्ष संदीप जैन और अन्य पार्टी पदाधिकारी भी उपस्थित रहे।उन्होंने विभाजन की विभीषिका को याद करते हुए एकजुटता और...

title: चंदौली पुलिस ने हिस्ट्रीशीटरों की जांच के लिए चलाया अ​भियान:124 चि​न्हित अपरा​धियों का हुआ सत्यापन, पुलिस ने 15 अगस्त के मद्देनजर किया जांच
content: चंदौली के वि​भिन्न थाने की पुलिस टीम ने बुधवार को हिस्ट्रीशीटरों की जांच के लिए अ​भियान चलाया। इस दौरान पुलिस के द्वारा सत्यापन के दौरान 124 हिस्ट्रीशीटरों की जांच किया। जांच के दौरान सभी संदिग्ध लोग अपने घरों पर मिले। इस दौरान पुलिस कर्मियों ने लोगो दरअसल, एसपी आदित्य लांग्हे अपराध और अपरा​धियों की गतिवि​धियों पर लगाम लगाने के लिए काफी सतर्क नजर आ रहे हैं। ऐसे में बुधवार की शाम को अपरा​धियों और चि​न्हित हिस्ट्रीशीटरों की जांच तथा सत्यापन के लिए पुलिस के द्वारा अ​भियान चलाया गया। आपराधिक गतिविधियों में संलिप्त न होने की दी हिदायत इस दौरान कुल 124 हिस्ट्रीशीटरों का सत्यापन किया गया। जिसमें सदर कोतवाली क्षेत्र में 10, सैयदराजा में सात, कन्दवा में सात, सकलडीहा में 12, बलुआ में 15, अलीनगर में एक, मुगलसराय में 18, बबुरी में 10, चकिया में 16, शहाबगंज में 10, इलिया से 6, नौगढ़ में 10, चकरघट्टा में दो हिस्ट्रीशीटरों के निवास पर जाकर पुलिस कर्मियों ने सत्यापन किया । इस दौरान पुलिस टीम ने हिस्ट्रीशीटरों को आपराधिक गतिविधियों में संलिप्त न होने की हिदायत दी। चेताया कि किसी प्रकार की आपराधिक संलिप्तता पाये जाने पर विधिक कार्रवाई की जाएगी। एसपी आदित्य लांग्हे ने बताया कि हिस्ट्रीशीटरों के सत्यापन के लिए अ​भियान चलाया गया। इस अ​भियान में 124 हिस्ट्रीशीटरों का सत्यापन किया गया हैं। इन सभी को आम नागरिकों की तरह जीवन यापन करने का सुझाव दिया गया हैं।

title: Indian shuttlers target 10 medals at Paris Paralympics
content: LUCKNOW: Badminton World Federation suspending Tokyo Paralympics badminton gold medallist Pramod Bhagat for 18 months after three whereabouts failures may have surprised many, but the other 13 shuttlers bound for the Paris Paralympics were prepared for the announcement since June. Despite the setback, chief national coach of the India para badminton team for Paris, Gaurav Khanna, sounded confident about Indian shuttlers winning 10 medals in this edition of the Paralympics, starting on August 28. “We were aware of action against Bhagat and even BWF had mentioned it clearly in June itself, so we planned our training, etc., accordingly. Bhagat’s absence won’t make any difference to India’s plan. I am sure of India para shuttlers winning 10 medals this time, including three gold medals,” Gaurav Khanna said on Wednesday at the team’s national camp here. India won four medals in badminton – two gold, 1 silver, 1 bronze – on the game’s debut at Tokyo. Since then, Indian players have made their presence felt at international level, winning almost 500 medals, including 18 medals at the World Championships (3 gold, 4 silver, 11 bronze) and 21 medals at the Asian Para Games (4 gold, 4 silver, 13 bronze). “We started from scratch almost three years before the Tokyo Paralympics with no hope of medals. Today we can proudly say that our shuttlers have won more than 1000 medals at the...

title: ファナックの株式を1年前に100株買った人は「いくら」儲かった(or損した)?株価の推移を振り返る【2024年8月14日】(LIMO)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/14(水) 22:47 配信 写真:LIMO [リーモ] 本記事ではファナック の株価について解説します。2024年8月14日時点における過去1年間の株価データをもとにしたリターンや株価推移など、今後の投資判断に役立つ情報をお届けします。 ◆【グラフ】ファナックの株価はどう推移した?1年間の株価の流れをチェック ※リターンなど%表記のものは小数第三位を四捨五入した結果を表示しています。※編集部注:外部配信先ではハイパーリンクや図表などの画像を全部閲覧できない場合があります。その際はLIMO内でご確認ください。 2024年8月14日時点、ファナックの株価(調整後終値)は4030円となっています。また、1年前(2023年8月14日)の株価は4102円です。仮に、2023年8月14日時点でファナックの株を取得していた場合、リターンは▲1.76%となります。1単元(100株)取得した場合のキャピタルゲインによる儲けは▲7200円です。※リターン計算において配当、株主優待は考慮していません ファナックの株価は過去1年間で以下の通りに推移しています。※株価チャートは配信先によっては表示されていない可能性があるため、ご覧になりたい場合はLIMOにて記事をご参照ください。過去1年間における株価の最高価格と最低価格は次のようになりました。 ・最高価格:4703円 ・最低価格:3645円仮に最低価格および最高価格で売買できた場合、過去1年間で実現できた最高リターンは+29.03%です。 過去1年間、ファナックの株価が対前日比で最も上昇した(もしくは最も下落率が低かった)のは2024年8月6日でした。変化率は対前日比+7.61%です。また、最も下落した(もしくは最も上昇率が低かった)のは2024年8月5日でした。変化率は対前日比▲9.51%です。 株を購入するには証券口座を開設する必要があります。証券口座は銀行や証券会社などで開設できますが、なかでもおすすめなのはネット証券です。ネット証券はオンライン専門の証券会社です。口座開設から実際の購入まですべてオンラインで完結するので、店舗や人件費のコストがかからない分安く取引できる傾向にあります。 久保田 雅大 【厚生年金】8月15日の年金支給日に「30万円(月額15万円)」が振り込まれる人の現役時代の年収はいくら? 夫が亡くなってから息子夫婦と同居しています。息子の管理で年金「12万円」のうち「5万円」をもらっているのですが、自分で管理した方がよいでしょうか? 「助けてェ...」新幹線&山手線“運休の可能性”に悲鳴 台風接近でJR東日本「行程変更して」 高速道路走行中に、飛び石で「フロントガラス」にヒビが! 修理代が“9万円”かかるけど、等級が下がっても「自動車保険」を使うべき? プリウスを例に解説 なぜホンダの「ハイブリッド車」立ち往生多発?...

title: Харрис хочет дистанцироваться от непопулярных мер Байдена, пишут СМИ
content: МОСКВА, 14 авг - РИА Новости. Вице-президент США и кандидат на пост главы государства Камала Харрис желает дистанцироваться от действующего президента Джо Байдена по ряду вопросов, для которых он предлагал непопулярные решения, сообщает портал Axios со ссылкой на ее советников. "Ее советники (говорят - ред.) об этом в частном порядке: она хочет размежеваться с Байденом по вопросам, в которых он непопулярен. Первый из них - повышение цен... Она хочет быть не-Байденом в вопросе инфляции.., предлагая более ясные и более насущные решения... Она также хочет явным образом отступиться от зачастую старомодных взглядов Байдена на демократию и другие вопросы", - говорится в публикации портала. Как отмечает Axios, Харрис желает предстать демократом другого рода, нежели Байден. По мнению источников, она хочет, чтобы ее воспринимали как проводника перемен в президентской гонке. При этом, по мнению Харрис, она может подавать себя избирателю, не опасаясь "переобуваний", так как избиратель якобы мало о ней знает. По данным портала, она собирается отказаться от некоторых "более либеральных" взглядов, которых придерживалась ранее под предлогом, что годы в Белом доме поменяли ее мировоззрение. Выборы президента США состоятся 5 ноября. От Республиканской партии на пост главы государства официально выдвинут Дональд Трамп . От демократов в выборах планирует участвовать действующая...

title: Hora y fecha del partido de vuelta de los octavos de final de la Copa Libertadores entre Junior FC vs. Colo Colo
creator: Camilo Zabaleta
content: El camino de Colo Colo y Junior en la Copa Libertadores se complicó para los colombianos tras su derrota por mínima diferencia en el primer encuentro de los octavos de final. El equipo chileno se impuso 1-0 gracias a un gol de Vicente Pizarro a los 75 minutos, celebrado en el estadio Monumental de Santiago de Chile. Junior, que desperdició dos claras oportunidades de gol durante el primer tiempo, debe ahora ganar por dos goles en casa, en Barranquilla, para alcanzar los cuartos de final sin necesidad de penaltis. En caso de que el marcador sea favorable por un solo gol, el pase a la siguiente ronda se decidirá desde el punto penal. Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . El partido de vuelta está programado para el martes 20 de agosto a las 7:30 de la noche, en el estadio Metropolitano de Barranquilla. Este será el cuarto partido como local del conjunto dirigido por Arturo Reyes en esta edición 2024 de la Copa Libertadores. Los anteriores encuentros disputados en casa terminaron en empates contra Universitario, Liga de Quito y Botafogo durante la fase de grupos, dejando claro que Junior está obligado a vencer para poder permanecer en el torneo. title: La matriz de Foxconn gana 1.604 millones de euros hasta junio, un 25% más
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Hon Hai Precision Industry, matriz de Foxconn Technology Group, la compañía taiwanesa responsable del ensamblaje de gran parte de los iPhone que se venden en todo el mundo, registró unos beneficios netos atribuidos de 57.100 millones de dólares taiwaneses (1.604 millones de euros) durante el primer semestre de 2024, un 25% más. La facturación se situó en los 2,875 billones de dólares taiwaneses (80.781 millones de euros), mientras que el beneficio operativo alcanzó los 81.400 millones de dólares taiwaneses (2.287 millones de euros). Estas cifras fueron un 4% y un 14% superiores, respectivamente, a las que se obtuvieron doce meses atrás. Ya en el segundo trimestre, las ganancias de Hon Hai ascendieron a 35.000 millones de dólares taiwaneses (983,4 millones de euros), un 6% más, al tiempo que la facturación subió un 19%, hasta los 1,55 billones de dólares taiwaneses (43.551 millones de euros). De cara al tercer trimestre, que la compañía considera su "tradicional temporada alta", se producirá un "crecimiento significativo" tanto en términos intertrimestrales como interanuales. Ya para el conjunto del ejercicio, Hon Hai mantiene sus estimaciones de un "crecimiento considerable" gracias a la fuerte demanda de servidores de IA [inteligencia artificial], pero ha asegurado que se ha reforzado la capacidad de previsión. Nuevo Temas Relacionados

title: Amazon Fire Stick and Roku fans can unlock ‘secret’ Disney streaming service that’s totally free with dozens of channels
creator: Sean Keach
content: YOUR Amazon Fire Stick or Roku TV may be hiding a "secret" free streaming service from Disney. The easy-to-miss offering has been quietly growing – and now serves up dozens of channels. Streaming fans will be very familiar with Disney+, which costs at least $7.99 a month. But you may have missed the fact that Disney has been very silently adding free channels to its ABC app. The service now has 23 live TV channels available at no cost. It's available as a channel on Roku TV, as well as a Fire Stick app available on the official Amazon app store. Read more on Roku Disney announced that it was growing its selection of free channels via ABC back on December 26, 2023. The streaming giant describes them as "unlocked channels" because they don't cost a fee. Disney said: "How would you like instant access to 24/7 streaming channels with great shows, movies and specials that are ALWAYS ON? "We're talking all-day entertainment with no sign-in needed thanks to our growing selection of Unlocked Channels which now includes the all-new "Secrets of the Zoo" and "Car Chases" live streaming channels." Most read in News Tech The good news is that there's no need to sign in or create an account. But if you do make an account then you can sync your viewing across other devices like your iPhone or Android . Some of the free "unlocked" channels include: 20/20 ABC NEWS LIVE CAR CHASES ESPN8: THE...

title: Olympian Dominique Dawes Calls Jordan Chiles Medal Drama 'Unfortunate'
creator: Paige Strout
content: Olympic gymnast Dominique Dawes is weighing in on Jordan Chiles ‘ bronze medal drama after the Paris Games . “The sport of gymnastics is a subjective sport, and if you could get human error out of it, then you won’t run into these situations whatsoever,” Dawes, 47, said in an interview with TMZ published on Wednesday, August 14. “My final Olympic Games, which was in 2000, we as a team, we ended up competing and doing the best job that we could. We ended up getting fourth place, and then, 10 years later, we were awarded an Olympic bronze medal because a Chinese gymnast was found to be underage. And so, you do have these type[s] of situations that do occur.” Dawes competed at three Olympic Games throughout her career, earning bronze in the team all-arounds in Barcelona in 1992 and Sydney in 2000, as well as winning a team gold in Atlanta in 1996. Similar to Chiles, 23, Dawes scored an individual bronze medal in the floor exercise final at the Atlanta Games. “They’re completely outside of the control of some of these athletes, and you just learn to — I’m not gonna say roll with it — but you learn to make sure it doesn’t break you,” Dawes said of the scoring and medal process. “You learn from it, and you keep moving forward.” Dawes is one of the latest public figures to share her thoughts on the controversy surrounding Chiles’ win. title: کفپوش اپوکسی چیست / مزایا و معایب
content: به گزارش ایسنا به نقل از بساپلیمر، تا انتهای این مطلب با ما همراه باشید تا به صورت کامل با کفپوش‌های اپوکسی آشنا شوید و بتوانید برای برطرف کردن نیاز خود نسبت به تهیه کفپوش بهترین انتخاب را داشته باشید. البته ذکر این نکته که کفپوش اپوکسی خود زیر مجموعه‌ای از کفپوش‌های رزینی است خالی از لطف نیست. به عبارت دیگر علاوه بر کفپوش‌های اپوکسی، کفپوش پلی یورتان، آکریلات و انواع دیگر کفپوش رزینی وجود دارند که پرداختن به آن ها در این مقاله نمی‌گنجد و ما قصد داریم درباره کفپوش‌های اپوکسی که یکی از رایج‌ترین انواع کفپوش رزینی است صحبت کنیم.پس تا پایان این مقاله با ما همراه باشید. برای تهیه کفپوش اپوکسی به سایت زیر مراجعه کنید. https://basapolymer.com/ اگر می‌خواهید سطحی صاف، یکپارچه و بدون درز داشته باشید کفپوش اپوکسی می‌تواند بهترین انتخاب باشد. مهمترین ویژگی در و داروسازی میزان یکپارچگی آن است. علاوه بر این‌ کفپوش اپوکسی به دلیل تولید و اجرا در انواع رنگ‌های مختلف دست شما را برای انتخاب باز می‌گزارد و بسته به سلیقه و طراحی محیط خود، می‌توانید رنگ موردنظر را انتخاب کنید. یکی از مهمترین خصوصیات کفپوش اپوکسی که باعث استقبال بی نظیر از آن شده است، طول عمر و مقاومت بسیار زیاد آن است. به طوری که در کاربری و محیط هایی که از تجهیزات سنگین استفاده می‌شود و ترافیک بسیار زیاد است از کفپوش اپوکسی استفاده می‌کنند. قابلیت ترمیم یکی دیگر از مزیت‌های کفپوش اپوکسی است. اگر بخواهید برای بتن، سرامیک و کفپوش‌های دیگر عملیات ترمیم انجام دهید با هزینه و مشکلات متعددی مواجه می‌شوید در حالی که ترمیم در...

title: তত্ত্বাবধায়ক প্রকৌশলী বরখাস্ত, মেয়রের সহকারীর পদত্যাগ
creator: নিজস্ব প্রতিবেদক
content: বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের দাবির মুখে বরখাস্ত করা হয়েছে চট্টগ্রাম সিটি করপোরেশনের তত্ত্বাবধায়ক প্রকৌশলী (বিদ্যুৎ) ঝুলন কুমার দাশকে। একই দিন চট্টগ্রাম সিটি করপোরেশনের মেয়র মো. রেজাউল করিম চৌধুরীর ব্যক্তিগত সহকারী হোসেন আওরঙ্গজেব পদত্যাগ করেছেন। আজ বুধবার বিকেলে চট্টগ্রাম সিটি করপোরেশনের প্রধান নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তা শেখ মুহম্মদ তৌহিদুল ইসলামের সঙ্গে দেখা করে এই দুজনের বিরুদ্ধে অভিযোগ দেন বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের সমন্বয়কেরা। নগরের টাইগারপাসে সিটি করপোরেশনের অস্থায়ী প্রধান কার্যালয়ে প্রধান নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তার কার্যালয়ে যান নেতারা। তাঁরা সিটি করপোরেশনের বিভিন্ন কর্মকর্তা-কর্মচারীর বিরুদ্ধে নানা অভিযোগ এবং সিটি করপোরেশনের কার্যক্রমের ব্যাপারে মতামত উত্থাপন করেন। এ সময় সিটি করপোরেশনের সচিব আশরাফুল আমিন ও প্রধান পরিচ্ছন্নতা কর্মকর্তা কমান্ডার লতিফুল হক কাজমী উপস্থিত ছিলেন। বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের দাবি ও অভিযোগ তদন্ত করার জন্য তিন সদস্যর কমিটি গঠনের সিদ্ধান্ত নিয়েছে সিটি করপোরেশন। কমিটির প্রধান করা হয়েছে সিটি করপোরেশনের প্রধান পরিচ্ছন্নতা কর্মকর্তা কমান্ডার লতিফুল হক কাজমীকে। বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের নেতারা অভিযোগ করেন, আন্দোলন চলাকালে ৩ থেকে ৫ আগস্ট চট্টগ্রাম নগরের সব সড়কবাতি বন্ধ রাখা হয়। সড়কবাতি বন্ধ রেখে রাতের আঁধারে ছাত্র-জনতার ওপর নির্মমভাবে অত্যাচার-নির্যাতন চালানো হয়। গুলিও করা হয়। এতে মৃত্যুর ঘটনা ঘটে। সিটি করপোরেশনের তত্ত্বাবধায়ক প্রকৌশলী (বিদ্যুৎ) ঝুলন কুমার দাশের নির্দেশে সড়কবাতি বন্ধ করা হয়। এ জন্য তাঁকে বরখাস্ত...

title: 354 पैसेंजर के साथ लंदन जा रहे एयर इंडिया विमान को अचानक क्‍यों लौटाया वापस, फ्लाइट में ऐसा क्‍या हुआ?
content: मुंबई: लंदन जा रहा एयर इंडिया का एक विमान वापस मुंबई लौट आया। रास्ते में आई कुछ तकनीकी समस्या के कारण इसे वापस लौटाया गया। एक सूत्र ने यह जानकारी दी। सूत्र के मुताबिक एयर इंडिया के इस विमान ने बुधवार सुबह यहां से उड़ान भरी थी। विमान में 354 लोग सवार थे। लेकिन, रास्ते में पायलट की ओर से विमान के केबिन में दबाव संबंधी कुछ तकनीकी समस्या बताए जाने के बाद विमान को शहर वापस लाया गया। सूत्र ने बताया कि विमान ने सुरक्षित लैंडिंग की। सूत्र ने कहा, ‘बुधवार सुबह यहां से रवाना हुआ एयर इंडिया का विमान एआई-129 शहर वापस लौट आया। पायलट ने बोइंग-777 विमान के केबिन में दबाव संबंधी समस्या की सूचना दी थी।’ सुबह रवाना हुआ था व‍िमान विमान सुबह 8.36 बजे मुंबई से रवाना हुआ था और पूर्वाह्न लगभग 11.30 बजे शहर वापस लौट आया। इस बीच एयर इंडिया ने एक बयान जारी कर कहा, ‘मुंबई से लंदन जा रहा विमान तकनीकी खराबी के कारण वापस मुंबई लौट आया। एहतियातन जांच के लिए विमान को सुरक्षित तरीके से मुंबई में उतारा गया।’ एयरलाइन ने दी यात्र‍ियों को यह सुव‍िधा एयरलाइन ने यह भी बताया कि उसने यात्रियों को उनके गंतव्य तक पहुंचाने के लिए पहले ही वैकल्पिक व्यवस्था कर ली है। एयर इंडिया ने कहा कि उसने यात्रियों की इच्छा के अनुसार टिकट रद्द करने पर पूरी धनराशि वापस करने और किसी अन्य तारीख पर टिकट रीशेड्यूल करने की पेशकश की है। कई यात्री इस बात से निराश जरूर हुए कि उन्‍हें वापस लौटना पड़ा। लेकिन, उन्‍हें इस बात का संतोष है कि वे सभी सुरक्षित हैं। कई यात्रियों ने एयरलाइन की ओर से पेशकश का फायदा उठाया है।

title: Rangers could face Ange Postecoglou reunion or mouthwatering Man Utd Battle of Britain in Europa League draw
creator: reporters@dailyrecord.co.uk (Alan Galindo)
content: Philippe Clement's men are out of the Champions League but are guaranteed Europa League league phase football. Get the latest Rangers news from Record Sport with our daily newsletter. We have more newsletters Get the latest Rangers news from Record Sport with our daily newsletter. We have more newsletters Rangers have dropped into the Europa League proper after defeat to Dynamo Kyiv - and will be top seeds in the second tier competition. Philippe Clement's men lost out in the Champions League third qualifying round with the ten men Light Blues going down 2-0 on the night to lose the tie 3-1 on aggregate at their temporary Hampden home. The men from Govan had the parachute of dropping into the Europa League regardless of elimination at this stage or in the play-off round with Kyiv the ones now facing Salzburg in a huge two-legged showdown to reach the big time and land the financial windfall that comes with it. But it is not all lost for Rangers on the European front and the fans could yet be paired with a familiar face. Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou leads Tottenham into the competition this season and due to the new format, even thought the Light Blues are in pot one they could come up against their old nemesis. It also means a potential date with Manchester United in what would prove to be mouthwatering Battle of Britain showdowns. Like the newly revamped Champions League, the...

title: U.S. inflation slows to 3-year low. Can the Fed cut rates now?
content: Year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, the latest sign that the worst price spike in four decades is fading and setting up the Federal Reserve for an interest rate cut in September. Wednesday’s report from the Labor Department showed that consumer prices rose just 0.2 per cent from June to July after dropping slightly the previous month for the first time in four years. Measured from a year earlier, prices rose 2.9 per cent, down from three per cent in June. It was the mildest year-over-year inflation figure since March 2021. The government said nearly all the increase in the monthly inflation figure reflected higher rental prices and other housing costs, a trend that, according to real-time data, is easing. Inflation has taken a central role in the presidential election, with former President Donald Trump blaming the Biden administration’s energy policies for the price increases. Vice President Kamala Harris on Saturday said she would soon unveil new proposals to “bring down costs and also strengthen the economy overall.” In July, grocery prices rose just 0.1 per cent and are a scant 1.1 per cent higher than they were a year earlier, a much slower pace of growth than in previous years. Yet many Americans are still struggling with food prices, which remain 21% above where they were three years ago, though average wages have also...

Su declaración comenzó pasadas las 9.30 y en la sala también están presentes los principales acusados, Fernando Sabag Montiel , Brenda Uliarte y Nicolás Carrizo . Tuvo prime-time durante 22 días cuando acusó de corrupción, no a mí, al peronismo. Eso motivó manifestaciones en la puerta de mi casa que finalmente concluyó con el tiro fallido, con la bala que no salió”. “Sería muy ingenuo considerar que las tres personas que están sentadas ahí (por Sabag Montiel, Uliarte y Carrizo) fueron los que idearon esto... Son los autores materiales”. “Lo que digita a los medios hegemónicos de comunicación y al poder judicial es, arriba, el poder económico concentrado. title: Barrick Q2 Pleases, But Keep An Eye On Costs, Consider Hedging
S.C. Supreme Court will take on Murdaugh jury tampering appeal
creator: Jessica Schladebeck
content: The South Carolina Supreme Court will consider whether disgraced legal scion Alex Murdaugh will receive a new trial for the murder of his wife and son. The decision, handed down on Tuesday, means the state’s five justices will take over one of Murdaugh’s two appeals, specifically, whether the jury was prejudiced during his six-week murder trial last year, the Post and Courier reported. Murdaugh’s attorneys have said he was denied a fair trial due to jury tampering carried out by former Colleton County court clerk Becky Hill. She swayed the jury, they argued, by urging them against deliberating for a long time and asking them about the case before deliberations — all of it part of a bid to profit from a book she wrote about the legal proceedings. The book, “Behind the Doors of Justice: The Murdaugh Murders,” was eventually pulled from publication after she admitted to plagiarizing a section , according to WCSC. The South Carolina Law Enforcement Division has since opened an investigation into Hill over allegations that she used her elected position for personal gain. “The trial court abused its discretion when finding that the jury’s verdict was not affected by Ms. Hill’s tampering despite a juror’s uncontradicted testimony that her verdict was affected,” the defense said. “And the trial court erred when it held that deliberate jury tampering by a state official seeking a...

Feminicidio en Chorrillos: atrapan a sujeto que huyó luego de asesinar a su expareja dentro de una pollería
creator: Bibiana Guardamino Soto
content: Un nuevo feminicidio enluta al país. Esta vez, un hombre fue capturado en Chorrillos tras el asesinato de una mujer en un restaurante conocido como La Posada , ubicado en el cruce de las avenidas Defensores del Morro y Ricardo Treneman . Minutos después del crimen, las autoridades lograron detener al principal sospechoso, Juan Carlos Alcorta . El hombre de 28 años fue arrestado en una barbería de la avenida Sandoval . El ataque dejó en la orfandad a los dos hijos de la víctima. Feminicidio en pollería de Chorrillos Según informó Latina , el feminicidio ocurrió cuando Alcorta ingresó a la pollería y atacó a la mujer con un cuchillo. Fuentes cercanas a la familia revelaron que él era la expareja de la víctima y que decidió buscarla en su lugar de trabajo, en el que la ciudadana laboraba desde hace aproximadamente un mes y medio, después de que ella terminó la relación que mantenían. Los compañeros de trabajo de la fallecida presenciaron el ataque, que ocurrió a plena luz del día en uno de los distritos más poblados de Lima. La presencia de testigos facilitó el rápido actuar de la Policía Nacional del Perú y agentes del serenazgo local, quienes comenzaron una intensa persecución que culminó con la captura del responsable. La detención de Alcorta se produjo en una barbería en la avenida Sandoval , a pocas cuadras del lugar del crimen. En el momento...

title: These stretchy 'jelly batteries' could be implanted into humans to power implants and wearables
content: The research team behind the new "jelly batteries" say they can mould to human tissue, making them "promising for future use in biomedical implants". Researchers at the University of Cambridge say they have successfully developed a "game-changing" battery that could be used in our bodies to power soft robotics and wearable devices. It marks the latest stride in flexible electrically conductive hydrogel materials being used for bioelectronic applications. "Electronics as we know like our phones and our computers are very rigid, whereas our body is mostly water, it's very soft,” Stephen O'Neil, a PhD researcher at the University of Cambridge and the first author of the study, said. "What we tried to do is make electronics soft and stretchy to be able to interface either inside our body or on our skin, and the way we did this was we made hydrogel materials that are ionically conductive". Made of a series of hydrogels layered to make an electric current, the batteries look like jelly-like strips. According to the researchers, the new battery was inspired by electric eels which stun their prey with electrocytes, their modified muscle cells. While hydrogels have been used in the body to provide electricity before, this is the first time they have been given a stretchable property, according to the Cambridge researcher team. Hydrogels are ideal candidates for soft robotics and...

title: ABD'de mortgage başvurularında artış yaşandı
content: Mortgage Bankalar Birliği (MBA), 9 Ağustos ile sona eren haftaya ilişkin mortgage verilerini açıkladı.Buna göre, mortgage başvuruları geçen hafta önceki haftaya kıyasla yüzde 16,8'lik artış görüldü. Bu dönemde konut satın almaya yönelik başvurular yüzde 3 ve yeniden finansman başvuruları yüzde 35 arttı. Ülkede, 30 yıl vadeli mortgage için ortalama faiz oranı, geçen hafta Mayıs 2023'ten bu yana en düşük seviye olan yüzde 6,55'ten 6,54'e geriledi. Aynı dönemde 15 yıl vadeli mortgage için ortalama faiz oranı da yüzde 6,03'ten 5,96'ya indi. MBA Başkan Yardımcısı ve Yardımcı Başekonomisti Joel Kan, 30 ve 15 yıl vadeli mortgage için ortalama faiz oranlarının art arda iki haftadır düştüğünü ve daha yüksek faiz oranlarına sahip borçluların fırsatı değerlendirmesiyle yeniden finansman başvurularında güçlü bir artış yaşandığını belirtti. Kan, konut satın almaya yönelik mortgage başvurularında kaydedilen artışın da potansiyel konut alıcılarının piyasaya yavaş yavaş yeniden girdiğini gösterdiğini aktardı. Kaynak: AA

title: Two men deny assaulting police officers during Whitehall disorder
creator: George Lithgow
content: Two men have denied assaulting police officers during an anti-immigration demonstration in central London last month. Craig Tunmore, 37, of Sutton , denied assaulting two officers during the disorder near Downing Street in Whitehall . Tunmore is said to have punched an officer in the back and elbowed another in the face. The officers were trying to “hold a cordon” when the alleged assaults occurred, Westminster Magistrates’ Court heard. Tunmore faces two charges of assault by beating of an emergency worker. Danny Fournier, 41, denied striking a female officer “to the back of the head twice”. “Luckily”, the officer was wearing a helmet, the court heard. But Fournier, of Lambeth , south London, admitted threatening behaviour by striking out at another officer during the anti-immigration demonstration, the court was told. Police arrested 121 people following violent disorder outside Downing Street on Wednesday July 31, two days after a stabbing at a dance studio in Southport. Bottles and cans were thrown at police and flares were launched at the statue of Sir Winston Churchill in Parliament Square. Tunmore and Fournier were both granted conditional bail to appear at Southwark Crown Court on September 11. They are prohibited from entering the City of Westminster during that time.

title: Prime IV Hydration & Wellness Ranks No. 875 on the 2024 Inc. 5000

title: Intento de envenenamiento en refugio para perros ancianos horroriza y conmociona a sus voluntarios
creator: Luis A. Flores
content: Los voluntarios de Vintage Pet Rescue (VPR), un refugio para perros ancianos basado en Rhode Island, Estados Unidos, están horrorizados luego de que a finales de julio encontraran “múltiples porciones” de veneno para ratas en la parte superior de las vallas que mantienen a salvo a las mascotas bajo su cuidado. Fueron puestas ahí con la intención de que caigan hasta los patios donde juegan y conviven los animales mayores, según reportaron los miembros de VPR en redes sociales. Su día no acabó ahí, pues, “desafortunadamente”, encontraron a Bug , uno de los perros del refugio, masticando uno de los trozos. La mascota fue trasladada de inmediato al veterinario. Durante la emergencia, los voluntarios buscaron más porciones de veneno que pudieran estar sobre el patio . Aunque Bug sobrevivió y no sufrió ningún problema grave que pusiera su vida en riesgo, si necesitará medicamentos durante las próximas 3 semanas. El horrible intento de envenenamiento “No puedo expresar con palabras lo molestos que estamos por esto. ¿Quién le haría algo así a un perro anciano rescatado? Sinceramente, estamos sorprendidos por este nivel de maldad”, escribió una de las empleadas de la organización en Facebook . Se llenó un informe policial y revisaron las imágenes que pudieron captar las cámaras de vigilancia con el objetivo de hallar a los culpables. Kristen Peralta, fundadora de...

title: Mini-Hippo aus Berlin hat einen Namen
content: Mehr als 20.000 Vorschläge aus aller Welt waren beim Berliner Zoo eingegangen. Nun ist die Entscheidung gefallen: Das kleine Zwergflusspferd heißt Toni. Pate ist der Fußballspieler Antonio Rüdiger.

title: Gov’t Denies Allegations of Selling State Lands, Calls Claims False – Jinapor
creator: News Ghana
content: The Ministry of Lands and Natural Resources has strongly refuted claims that the Akufo-Addo-Bawumia administration is selling state lands to cronies. During a press briefing on Wednesday, August 14, Samuel Abu Jinapor, the Minister for Lands and Natural Resources, dismissed the allegations as baseless and surprising. The accusations, which surfaced in a recent report, claimed that the Akufo-Addo-Bawumia administration is selling state lands to cronies. Jinapor addressed specific concerns about properties such as a parcel of land at Cantonment and the W.E.B. DuBois Centre, clarifying that the current government did not sell these lands. He expressed disbelief at the accusations and pointed out inconsistencies in the claims. Jinapor explained that the Cantonment bungalows were sold to Frimps Oil Company Limited on July 13, 2015, following approval from the then-Minister for Lands and Natural Resources, Nii Osah Mills. He noted that it was perplexing for those involved in the original sale to now accuse the Akufo-Addo administration of state capture. Concerning the W.E.B. DuBois Centre, Jinapor referred to a detailed press release dated July 16, 2024, which was issued by the Lands Commission, the body responsible for managing public lands and maintaining records of land transactions. The press release stated that the Lands Commission has no pending application for the transfer of...

title: PREOBRAŽENJE TAČKA PRELOMA - DA LI SE "LUCIFER" PREDAJE NA OVAJ DATUM? Meteorolog najavio veliki obrt vremena - KIŠA SVE IZVESNIJA
content: Avgustovski toplotni talas u Srbiji počeo je, a prema najavama Republičkog hidrometeorološkog zavoda Srbije trajaće do nedelje, 18. avgusta kada stiže osveženje takozvani "Lucifer killer", ubica ovog paklenog toplotnog talasa. Osveženje na Preobraženje Meteorolog amater Ivan Ristić je ove prognoze objavio juče na njegovom Fejsbuku, kako navodi nakon što ćemo se pet dana pržiti na paklenih 40 stepeni Celzijusovih stiže nam osveženje. - Odavno nisam video kišu u mom modelu, posle 5 dana sa maksimalnim temperaturama oko 40 stepeni stiže osveženje u nedelju i ponedeljak, 18. i 19. avgusta prema večerašnjem IRIE modelu. Ako ništa drugo makar da vidimo kišu na mapama valjda će se nešto slično i desiti malo da se osvežimo - objavio je on. Kako Ristić navodi, u prognozi EMCWF, na Preobraženje, 19. avgusta pašće puno kiše, što je ističe, "malo nestvarno kao i uvek, ali nikad se ne zna možda se i ostvari ovaj put". Stiže spas - "Lucifer ubica" - "Lucifer killer" stiže u nedelju popodne i ponedeljak, još malo izdržite. Ovaj produženi afrički toplotni talas, koji je danima i danima držao našu zemlju kao taoca, izgleda konačno ima kraj. Pravi nokaut - navodi on. Napominje da ovo ne bi trebalo da obeshrabri ljubitelje užarenog sunca. - Kao što se često dešava, preterano produženi toplotni talasi ne donose korist samo turistima i...
