title: موسسه خیریه نیوزیلندی ناخواسته آب‌نبات‌های ۶۰۰ دلاری «شیشه» بین نیازمندان توزیع کرد
content: موسسه «خیریه شهر اوکلند» روز چهارشنبه اعلام کرد که برای ردیابی این آب‌نبات‌ها که در واقع تکه‌های جامد متامفتامین در پوشش آب‌نبات بودند، شروع به تماس با ۴۰۰ نفر از دریافت‌کنندگان کرده‌اند. مقامات نیوزیلند نیز گفتند که سه نفر پس از مصرف این آب‌نبات‌ها در بیمارستان تحت درمان قرار گرفتند و هم اکنون مرخص شده‌اند. به گفته بنیاد مواد مخدر نیوزیلند - یک سازمان کنترل و سیاست‌گذاری مواد مخدر - که برای اولین بار این آب نبات‌ها را آزمایش کرد، مقدار مت‌آمفتامین در هر یک از این آب‌نبات‌ها تا ۳۰۰ برابر دُز معمول مصرف است و این یعنی اینکه هر کدام از آن‌ها عملا می‌تواند کشنده باشد. سخنگوی این بنیاد گفت که جاسازی مواد مخدر در پوشش کالاهایی که شک‌برانگیز نیستند، روش رایج قاچاق برون مرزی است و بعید نیست که تعداد بیشتری از این آب‌نبات‌ها در سراسر نیوزیلند توزیع شده باشد. آب‌نبات‌هایی به قیمت ۱۰۰۰ دلار نیوزیلند سخنگوی بنیاد مواد مخدر نیوزیلند خاطرنشان کرد که هر یک از این آب نبات‌های حاوی شیشه، در داد و ستدهای خیابانی ۱۰۰۰ دلار نیوزیلند (معادل ۶۰۸ دلار آمریکا) معامله می‌شود که نشان می‌دهد اهدای آن‌ها توسط این فرد ناشناس احتمالا تصادفی بوده است نه اینکه قصد آسیب عمدی را داشته باشد. سربازرس گلن بالدوین اظهار داشت که «برداشت اولیه» آن‌ها این بود که این حادثه احتمالاً یک نقشه ناموفق واردات بوده است، اگرچه دامنه کامل و جزئیات عملیات نامشخص است. وی خاطرنشان کرد: ماموران تاکنون ۱۶ عدد از این آب‌نبات‌ها را کشف کرده‌اند، اما تعداد کل آن‌ها مشخص نیست. هلن رابینسون، عضو موسسه «خیریه شهر...

title: One Step Away From The Biggest Oil Shock In History
creator: Tyler Durden
content: Authored by Nick Giambruno via InternationalMan.com, The Strait of Hormuz is a narrow strip of water that links the Persian Gulf to the rest of the world. It’s the world’s single-most important energy corridor, and there’s no alternative route. Five of the world’s top 10 oil-producing countries—Saudi Arabia, Iran, Iraq, United Arab Emirates, and Kuwait—border the Persian Gulf, as does Qatar, the world’s largest liquefied natural gas (LNG) exporter. The Strait of Hormuz is their only sea route to the open ocean... and world markets. At its narrowest point, the space available for shipping lanes is just 3.2 kilometers wide. According to the US Energy Information Administration, more than 40% of global oil exports (around 21 million barrels) transit the Strait daily. That’s more than $1.5 billion worth of oil every day. And that’s not considering the immense amount of LNG— about 33% of the world’s daily LNG exports—and other goods transiting the Strait. It’s hard to overstate the importance of the Strait of Hormuz to the global economy. If someone were to disrupt the Strait, it would cause immediate global economic chaos as energy prices skyrocket. Thanks to its commanding geography and expertise in unconventional and asymmetric warfare, Iran can shut down the Strait, and there’s not much anyone can do about it. It’s Iran’s geopolitical trump card. Analysts believe it would take...

title: Jerry Davich: Memories of old ball mitt circle the bases in my mind
content: Do you remember your first baseball glove? It may be in a landfill buried underneath layers of trash, or it could be in your garage buried underneath decades of memories. Jerry Davich My first mitt was bright blue and stiffer than a brand new pair of jeans. I bought it with my own money and walked out of the sporting goods store with a swagger and delusional dreams of playing in the bigs like my hero Bill Buckner. He wore Cubbie blue from 1977 to 1984, back when I was a diehard Chicago Cubs fan. For 22 seasons, Buckner sported a trademark smile, a thick mustache and big dark eyebrows. He batted lefty and fielded left-handed, just like me playing first base in countless sandlot games. I had no skills and even less talent, but man did I love that mitt. On the night I bought it, I rubbed it with glove oil like I was a massage therapist. I tucked an old baseball in its pocket, wrapped it up tightly with shoestrings and prayed to the baseball gods it would work miracles the next day at the sandlot field near my home. Either I didn’t pray correctly or I didn’t break in my mitt long enough. Too many balls scooted by me near first base. I looked like Billy “between the legs” Buckner in game 6 of the 1986 World Series. All of these memories circled the bases in my head when a work colleague asked if I still had my old mitt. He still has his gloves, with stamped autographs on them of...

Ernesto is expected to become a hurricane later Wednesday as it moves away from land. Infrared satellite imagery shows Tropical Storm Ernesto over the northeastern Caribbean. Wednesday’s report from the Labor Department showed that consumer prices rose just 0.2% from June to July after dropping slightly the previous month for the first time in four years. Meanwhile, similar shares of Americans say Harris and former President Donald Trump have the right vision for the country, are strong leaders, can win the 2024 election and are capable of handling a crisis. title: How A.I. Is Shaping the Future of U.S. Healthcare: Regulatory and Market Updates
content: PALM BEACH, Fla., Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FN Media Group News Commentary - The technological shift driven by the rise of artificial intelligence (AI) is giving patients in the USA cautious optimism towards the potential of generative AI in healthcare. title: Jerry Davich: Memories of old ball mitt circle the bases in my mind
content: My first mitt was bright blue and stiffer than a brand new pair of jeans. I bought it with my own money and walked out of the sporting goods store with a swagger and delusional dreams of playing in the bigs like my hero Bill Buckner. He wore Cubbie blue from 1977 to 1984, back when I was a diehard Chicago Cubs fan. For 22 seasons, Buckner sported a trademark smile, a thick mustache and big dark eyebrows. He batted lefty and fielded left-handed, just like me playing first base in countless sandlot games. I had no skills and even less talent, but man did I love that mitt. On the night I bought it, I rubbed it with glove oil like I was a massage therapist. I tucked an old baseball in its pocket, wrapped it up tightly with shoestrings and prayed to the baseball gods it would work miracles the next day at the sandlot field near my home. Either I didn’t pray correctly or I didn’t break in my mitt long enough. Too many balls scooted by me near first base. I looked like Billy “between the legs” Buckner in game 6 of the 1986 World Series. All of these memories circled the bases in my head when a work colleague asked if I still had my old mitt. He still has his gloves, with stamped autographs on them of MLB players. “I do -- somewhere,” I replied. I could see it in my mind buried in a bin in my basement with boxes of baseball cards from my childhood. I just can’t seem to part with them....

title: Minneapolis Star Tribune: So much rides on the farm bill
content: Raise your hand if you knew that Congress is debating a bill this summer that could slow the pace of climate change, produce cleaner drinking water, restore habitat for endangered wildlife and improve the American diet. No? It’s the farm bill, the massive food and agriculture policy vehicle that Congress updates every five years (in theory) , and, frankly, most people don’t follow it closely . The sprawling legislation is simultaneously so parochial and complicated that even most lawmakers just leave it up to the experts. That’s a shame, because this year Washington has a chance to update the farm bill in a way that takes steps toward healthier diets and a healthier planet. When Franklin Delano Roosevelt laid the foundations of modern farm policy in the 1930s, rural America was in crisis: The Dust Bowl had blown away thousands of farms and commodity prices had collapsed. Federal intervention did a lot of good for destitute farmers and the nation. But today the nation has different challenges: climate change, polluted waters, devastating floods, endangered birds and pollinators. Since farmers control what happens on millions of acres of land across the middle of the continent, they’re in a position to address these challenges — and Congress is in a position to give them the right incentives. Consider soil and water conservation. In 1985, Congress created a landmark project...

title: Remarkable Semi-Submersible E-Boat Takes Passengers Above And Below The Ocean
creator: Cover Media
content: Designs have been unveiled for a boat that takes passengers above and below the ocean. The 28-foot semi-submersible catamaran, named the Platypus, mirrors its namesake by spending time both above and below the water. The innovative vessel allows up to five passengers to enjoy under-the-sea gazing without diving into the water. The boat features a movable 'basket' that can be lowered below the water's surface, enabling underwater exploration while remaining seated motorcycle-style. An onboard compressor supplies air to special facemasks via retractable hoses. For those who wish to dive further, traditional diving gear can be stowed onboard. The basket is equipped with six air tanks and oil-less Nardi Compressori compressors for breathing air, providing an accessible and comfortable underwater experience. First floated as a concept over a decade ago, the Platypus could be cruising the seas by early 2025. The project has just received a zero-emission boost thanks to a new partnership between Platypus Craft and electric outboard manufacturer Evoy.

title: Jerry Davich: Memories of old ball mitt circle the bases in my mind
content: My first mitt was bright blue and stiffer than a brand new pair of jeans. I bought it with my own money and walked out of the sporting goods store with a swagger and delusional dreams of playing in the bigs like my hero Bill Buckner. He wore Cubbie blue from 1977 to 1984, back when I was a diehard Chicago Cubs fan. For 22 seasons, Buckner sported a trademark smile, a thick mustache and big dark eyebrows. He batted lefty and fielded left-handed, just like me playing first base in countless sandlot games. I had no skills and even less talent, but man did I love that mitt. On the night I bought it, I rubbed it with glove oil like I was a massage therapist. I tucked an old baseball in its pocket, wrapped it up tightly with shoestrings and prayed to the baseball gods it would work miracles the next day at the sandlot field near my home. Either I didn’t pray correctly or I didn’t break in my mitt long enough. Too many balls scooted by me near first base. I looked like Billy “between the legs” Buckner in game 6 of the 1986 World Series. All of these memories circled the bases in my head when a work colleague asked if I still had my old mitt. He still has his gloves, with stamped autographs on them of MLB players. “I do -- somewhere,” I replied. I could see it in my mind buried in a bin in my basement with boxes of baseball cards from my childhood. I just can’t seem to part with them....

title: DXCM Notice of Investigation: Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP Encourages DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ: DXCM) Investors with Significant Losses to Contact the Firm
content: RADNOR, Pa. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The law firm of Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP ( www.ktmc.com ) is currently investigating potential violations of the federal securities laws on behalf of investors of DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ: DXCM ) ("DexCom"). On July 25, 2024 , after the market closed, DexCom announced disappointing earnings results for its second quarter of 2024 and slashed full year revenue guidance from $4.35 billion to $4 billion - $4.05 billion . In addressing the results, DexCom stated that the company's "execution did not meet [its] high standards," and that DexCom lowered its full year 2024 guidance due to "certain unique items impacting 2024 seasonality." On this news, DexCom's stock price fell over 40%, from a close of $107.85 on July 25, 2024 to a close of $64.00 on July 26, 2024 . title: Καραλής - Τεντόγλου: Επιστρέφουν στη δράση στις 22 Αυγούστου στη Λωζάνη
content: Οι Ολυμπιακοί Αγώνες του Παρισιού μπορεί να έριξαν την αυλαία τους με την εντυπωσιακή τελετή λήξης το βράδυ της 11ης Αυγούστου, όμως, η αγωνιστική δράση συνεχίζεται για αρκετούς Έλληνες πρωταθλητές και πρωταθλήτριες. Χαρακτηριστικό μάλιστα είναι ότι το πρωί της Τρίτης (13/8) ο και ο , λίγες ώρες μετά την επιστροφή τους από το Παρίσι, βρέθηκαν στο Ολυμπιακό στάδιο της Αθήνας για προπόνηση. Ο “χρυσός” Ολυμπιονίκης του μήκους στις 22 Αυγούστου θα βρεθεί στη Λωζάνη όπου θα αγωνιστεί στο Diamond League ενώ μαζί του θα ταξιδέψει και ο “χάλκινος” Ολυμπιονίκης του επί κοντώ. Ο Καραλής μάλιστα μετά την συμμετοχή στο μίτινγκ της ελβετικής πόλης θα ταξιδέψει στην Πολωνία όπου στις 25 Αυγούστου θα αγωνιστεί στο Diamond League στη Σιλέσια. Δεν αποκλείεται να κάνει και έναν ακόμη αγώνα στις 8 Σεπτεμβρίου στο Ζάγκρεμπ. Ο Τεντόγλου στις 5 Σεπτεμβρίου θα βρεθεί στη Ζυρίχη για να αγωνιστεί στο Diamond League της πόλης. Ο τελικός προορισμός των Τεντόγλου και Καραλή για τη θερινή αγωνιστική σεζόν θα είναι στις Βρυξέλλες όπου θα αγωνιστούν στον τελικό του Diamond League στις 13 και 14 Σεπτεμρίου. Συνέχεια στις αγωνιστικές τους υποχρεώσεις θα δώσουν και δύο ακόμη Ελληνίδες πρωταθλήτριες. Η Κατερίνα Στεφανίδη (17/8) και η Ελίνα Τζένγκο (16/8) θα ταξιδέψουν στην Γερμανία όπου θα αγωνιστούν σε...

No? It’s the farm bill, the massive food and agriculture policy vehicle that Congress updates every five years (in theory) , and, frankly, most people don’t follow it closely . The sprawling legislation is simultaneously so parochial and complicated that even most lawmakers just leave it up to the experts. That’s a shame, because this year Washington has a chance to update the farm bill in a way that takes steps toward healthier diets and a healthier planet. When Franklin Delano Roosevelt laid the foundations of modern farm policy in the 1930s, rural America was in crisis: The Dust Bowl had blown away thousands of farms and commodity prices had collapsed. Federal intervention did a lot of good for destitute farmers and the nation. But today the nation has different challenges: climate change, polluted waters, devastating floods, endangered birds and pollinators. Since farmers control what happens on millions of acres of land across the middle of the continent, they’re in a position to address these challenges — and Congress is in a position to give them the right incentives. Consider soil and water conservation. In 1985, Congress created a landmark project...

Ernesto is expected to become a hurricane later Wednesday as it moves away from land. WASHINGTON (AP) — Year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, the latest sign that the worst price spike in four decades is fading and setting up the Federal Reserve for an interest rate cut in September. Wednesday’s report from the Labor Department showed that consumer prices rose just 0.2% from June to July after dropping slightly the previous month for the first time in four years. WASHINGTON (AP) — A poll finds Vice President Kamala Harris is going into the last stretch of the presidential campaign as the candidate more likely to be perceived as honest, committed to democracy and disciplined. Meanwhile, similar shares of Americans say Harris and former President Donald Trump have the right vision for the country, are strong leaders, can win the 2024 election and are capable of handling a crisis. title: Registration open for CCC's September community education classes
creator: DAILY SUN STAFF
content: Registration is now open for Coconino Community College’s (CCC) September community education classes. The college is continuing to offer community workshops and classes this fall, with September topics including artificial intelligence (AI), local history, astronomy and art classes. Unless otherwise noted, the classes take place on one of CCC's campuses in Flagstaff. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Halterner Feuerwehr löschte brennende Speisen : Bewohner erlitt Rauchgasvergiftung
content: Bei einer starken Rauchentwicklung in einer Wohnung in Haltern ist am Dienstagabend eine Person leicht verletzt worden. Sie wurde ins Krankenhaus eingeliefert.

title: Jail for friend of ex-FAS deputy director who helped him cheat sports body of over $450k
creator: The Straits Times
content: Pallaniappan Ravindran arriving at the State Courts on April 4. He was sentenced to eight weeks’ jail on Aug 14. SINGAPORE – A friend of a former Football Association of Singapore (FAS) deputy director who helped him cheat the organisation of over $450,000 has been sentenced to eight weeks’ jail on Aug 14. Pallaniappan Ravindran, 51, pleaded guilty to five counts of engaging in a conspiracy to cheat the association. Ten other similar charges were taken into consideration for his sentencing. Ravindran, who was director of sports merchandise supplier Myriad Sports & Events, had helped ex-FAS deputy director Rikram Jit Singh Randhir Singh, 43, to dupe FAS by pretending that Myriad would supply items to the association. But a company linked to Singh and his wife, Ms Asya Kirin Kames, were supplying the items and taking the payments from FAS. The trio’s conspiracy led to the association being cheated of $457,605 in total. Singh, whom Deputy Public Prosecutor Thiagesh Sukumaran called the mastermind behind the crime, was sentenced to 55 weeks’ jail in January. Ms Asya, 36, who was earlier handed 46 charges, was granted a discharge amounting to an acquittal in January – meaning she cannot be charged again with the same offences. DPP Thiagesh told the court on Aug 14 that Singh and Ravindran were colleagues at another company from 2008 to 2009. In 2016, Ravindran considered winding...

title: Volunteers sought for replanting trees on San Francisco Peaks
creator: DAILY SUN STAFF
content: Tree planting has begun on the east side of the San Francisco Peaks across approximately 380 acres, and volunteers are being sought to help in the replanting efforts on Saturday, Aug. 17, from 8:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. The planting is set to take place between Schultz Pass Road and Waterline Road in an area that was previously replanted after the 2010 Schultz Fire. The 2022 Pipeline and Tunnel fires burned across the same area and resulted in a total loss of 3,000 acres of replanted trees. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Jerry Davich: Memories of old ball mitt circle the bases in my mind
content: My first mitt was bright blue and stiffer than a brand new pair of jeans. I bought it with my own money and walked out of the sporting goods store with a swagger and delusional dreams of playing in the bigs like my hero Bill Buckner. He wore Cubbie blue from 1977 to 1984, back when I was a diehard Chicago Cubs fan. For 22 seasons, Buckner sported a trademark smile, a thick mustache and big dark eyebrows. He batted lefty and fielded left-handed, just like me playing first base in countless sandlot games. I had no skills and even less talent, but man did I love that mitt. On the night I bought it, I rubbed it with glove oil like I was a massage therapist. I tucked an old baseball in its pocket, wrapped it up tightly with shoestrings and prayed to the baseball gods it would work miracles the next day at the sandlot field near my home. Either I didn’t pray correctly or I didn’t break in my mitt long enough. Too many balls scooted by me near first base. I looked like Billy “between the legs” Buckner in game 6 of the 1986 World Series. All of these memories circled the bases in my head when a work colleague asked if I still had my old mitt. He still has his gloves, with stamped autographs on them of MLB players. “I do -- somewhere,” I replied. I could see it in my mind buried in a bin in my basement with boxes of baseball cards from my childhood. I just can’t seem to part with them....

title: Minneapolis Star Tribune: So much rides on the farm bill
맨유 또 HERE WE GO! 초대박...주장 브루노 재계약 서명 완료 '2027년까지'
creator: 김대식 기자
content: [스포츠조선 김대식 기자]맨체스터 유나이티드 팬들에게 행복한 시간이 지나가고 있다. 유럽 이적시장 전문가인 파브리시로 로마노 기자는 14일(이하 한국시각) '브루노는 금일 맨유와 새로운 계약을 체결했다. 이번 주에 발표가 있을 예정이다. 모든 계획이 100% 확인됐으며 공식 발표가 뒤따를 것이다. 브루노는 2027년 6월까지 맨유와 계약하며 계약 연장 조항도 있다'고 밝혔다. 로마노 기자는 지난 11일 '맨유는 브루노와 계약을 연장하기로 합의했다. 새로운 계약은 2027년 6월까지 유효할 것이며 2028년 6월까지 연장할 수 있는 조항이 있다. 브루노의 대우는 맨유 최고 대우 수준이다. 이적시장이 마무리되기 전에 모든 서명이 이뤄질 것이다'고 밝힌 바 있다. 현재 맨유의 주장인 브루노는 명실상부한 월드 클래스이자 에이스다. 맨유로 이적한 뒤로 234경기에 출장해 79경기 67도움을 기록 중이다. 맨유로 이적한 뒤로 곧바로 에이스가 된 브루노는 1시즌도 부진한 적이 없었다. 맨유의 암흑기가 더 망가지지 않도록 막은 선수가 브루노다. 브루노는 2023~2024시즌이 끝나고 맨유를 떠날 수도 있다는 소식이 들려왔다. 맨유라는 구단이 보여주는 야망에 만족하지 못한다는 루머였다. 새로운 맨유 보드진은 브루노와의 대화를 통해 다시 우승권 팀으로 도약할 수 있다는 목표를 보여주면서 잔류를 설득했다. 여러 이적설이 돌았다. 바이에른 뮌헨, 파리 생제르맹이 브루노를 노린다는...

title: Europe detects 1st ‘Sloth virus’ cases after South America outbreak
content: Europe has detected its first cases of the Oropouche virus, also known as the "sloth virus," sparking fears of a wider spread. The virus was long confined to South America however multiple cases have now been reported in Italy and Spain as of Aug. 1, among travelers returning from Cuba, according to the peer-reviewed medical journal, Lancet. South America has been battling various arboviral infections for years, including Zika, chikungunya, and dengue. Brazil is currently experiencing a severe dengue outbreak. As of Aug. 1, 2024, the region has recorded 8,078 cases of Oropouche fever in Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, and Peru, with the virus becoming endemic in Cuba, according to the journal. Oropouche virus, first identified in Trinidad and Tobago in 1955, typically circulates in forested areas, is transmitted by midges and mosquitoes and resides in sloths, non-human primates, and birds. However, the current outbreak has seen urban transmission, indicating a potential shift in the virus's behavior. Most cases of Oropouche fever exhibit mild symptoms akin to dengue, such as headache, muscle pain, nausea, and rash. However, severe complications like meningitis and encephalitis can occur. On July 25, two young Brazilian women without underlying conditions died from the virus, the first reported deaths. The Pan American Health Organization has highlighted concerns about possible...

title: Minneapolis Star Tribune: So much rides on the farm bill
content: Raise your hand if you knew that Congress is debating a bill this summer that could slow the pace of climate change, produce cleaner drinking water, restore habitat for endangered wildlife and improve the American diet. No? It’s the farm bill, the massive food and agriculture policy vehicle that Congress updates every five years (in theory) . The sprawling legislation is so parochial and complicated that even most lawmakers just leave it up to the experts. That’s a shame, because this year Washington has a chance to update the farm bill in a way that takes steps toward healthier diets and a healthier planet. When Franklin Delano Roosevelt laid the foundations of modern farm policy in the 1930s, rural America was in crisis: The Dust Bowl had blown away thousands of farms and commodity prices had collapsed. Federal intervention did a lot of good for destitute farmers and the nation. But today the nation has different challenges: climate change, polluted waters, devastating floods, endangered birds and pollinators. Since farmers control what happens on millions of acres of land across the middle of the continent, they’re in a position to address these challenges — and Congress is in a position to give them the right incentives. Consider soil and water conservation. In 1985, Congress created a landmark project that paid farmers to take vulnerable acres out of production and plant...

title: Jerry Davich: Memories of old ball mitt circle the bases in my mind
content: Do you remember your first baseball glove? It may be in a landfill buried underneath layers of trash, or it could be in your garage buried underneath decades of memories. Jerry Davich My first mitt was bright blue and stiffer than a brand new pair of jeans. I bought it with my own money and walked out of the sporting goods store with a swagger and delusional dreams of playing in the bigs like my hero Bill Buckner. He wore Cubbie blue from 1977 to 1984, back when I was a diehard Chicago Cubs fan. For 22 seasons, Buckner sported a trademark smile, a thick mustache and big dark eyebrows. He batted lefty and fielded left-handed, just like me playing first base in countless sandlot games. I had no skills and even less talent, but man did I love that mitt. On the night I bought it, I rubbed it with glove oil like I was a massage therapist. I tucked an old baseball in its pocket, wrapped it up tightly with shoestrings and prayed to the baseball gods it would work miracles the next day at the sandlot field near my home. Either I didn’t pray correctly or I didn’t break in my mitt long enough. Too many balls scooted by me near first base. I looked like Billy “between the legs” Buckner in game 6 of the 1986 World Series. All of these memories circled the bases in my head when a work colleague asked if I still had my old mitt. He still has his gloves, with stamped autographs on them of...

I could see it in my mind buried in a bin in my basement with boxes of baseball cards from my childhood. I just can’t seem to part with them....

title: ഇന്ത്യന്‍ നിര്‍മിത ഉപ്പിലും പഞ്ചസാരയിലും മൈക്രോപ്ലാസ്റ്റിക് കണ്ടെത്തിയതായി പഠനം
Walrus Ancestors May Have Developed Feeding Methods to Adapt to Changing Climate
creator: Paul Smaglik
content: Walruses are perhaps best recognized for their iconic tusks. But one thing that makes them unusual among modern marine mammals is the way they use suction to eat. That ability appears to have been missing among many of the animal’s ancient relatives. But fossils now show that a newly named species developed that skill — perhaps as a way to adapt to a changing climate, according to a report in PeerJ Life & Environment. This finding is both exciting and unusual because it showcases a potential example of two different species, separated by time and space, making similar adaptations — a phenomenon sometimes called evolutionary convergence. “ It's really something quite rare in the field of fossil marine mammals, to be able to observe an evolutionary convergence with these large animals,” says Mathieu Boisville , a paleontologist at the University of Tsukuba in Japan and an author of the paper. A Case of Evolutionary Convergence? In this case, showing convergence came down to comparing teeth and jaws of multiple ancestors of the contemporary walrus, Odobenus rosmarus . That was a more complicated and challenging task than one might think. Since the 1870s, paleontologists have discovered hundreds of walrus-like fossils from around the Northern Hemisphere, ostensibly categorized among the genus Ontocetus . Unfortunately, the various species were based on sometimes inconsistent...

The sprawling legislation is simultaneously so parochial and complicated that even most lawmakers just leave it up to the experts. That’s a shame, because this year Washington has a chance to update the farm bill in a way that takes steps toward healthier diets and a healthier planet. When Franklin Delano Roosevelt laid the foundations of modern farm policy in the 1930s, rural America was in crisis: The Dust Bowl had blown away thousands of farms and commodity prices had collapsed. Federal intervention did a lot of good for destitute farmers and the nation. But today the nation has different challenges: climate change, polluted waters, devastating floods, endangered birds and pollinators. Since farmers control what happens on millions of acres of land across the middle of the continent, they’re in a position to address these challenges — and Congress is in a position to give them the right incentives. Consider soil and water conservation. In 1985, Congress created a landmark project called the Conservation Reserve Program that paid farmers to take vulnerable acres out of production and plant them with grasses and trees. It was an astonishing success — soil erosion plummeted, wildlife rebounded. But farmers...

title: Big hotel groups accused of bullying independent hotels
Una cervecera berlinesa apuesta por la alta calidad y la fabricación sostenible
content: En funcionamiento desde hace tres años, la cervecera Fuerst Wiacek de la capital alemana elabora sobre todo cerveza artesana de gama alta . Es conocida por sus elaboraciones de estilo inglés India pale ale de alta calidad tanto como por sus cervezas tradicionales alemanas. Una vez a la semana, un granjero berlinés conduce su tractor hasta la cervecería y recoge el grano usado para elaborar la oferta. " A las vacas les encanta y lo están esperando", explicó Christoph Brundke a ' Euronews '. Reciclar el grano usado no es la única forma en que la fábrica de cerveza intenta ser respetuosa con el medio ambiente. "Intentamos abastecernos de energía solar ", explica George Shumay , jefe de ventas. "No abastece al 100% de la fábrica, pero ayuda a equilibrar de dónde obtenemos la energía". Shumay dijo que la cervecera quiere ampliar sus paneles solares para aumentar el uso de energías renovables. Las cervezas que allí se elaboran son completamente naturales , sin conservantes ni productos químicos adicionales . Cada tirada de cerveza ha sido rigurosamente probada y tiene menos de seis meses . Fuerst Wiacek exporta a 34 países y colabora con otras empresas. Lanza al menos un nuevo tipo de cerveza a la semana . La cerveza de la empresa es reconocible por su peculiar diseño y por venderse en latas en lugar de en botellas, todo ello con vista al reciclaje . Shumay explicó...

title: Donald Trump is going to North Carolina for an economic speech. Can he stick to a clear message?
creator: The Associated Press
content: ASHEVILLE, N.C. — (AP) — will have another opportunity Wednesday to recalibrate his presidential comeback bid, this time with a rally and speech in North Carolina that his campaign is billing as a significant economic address. Set in a Democratic city surrounded by staunchly Republican mountain counties, the event carries both national and local implications for the former president. Republicans are looking for Trump to focus the scattershot arguments and attacks he has made on Vice President since Democrats elevated her as their presidential nominee. Twice in the last week, Trump has fumbled such an opportunity, first in an hourlong news conference at his Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida, then in a 2 1/2-hour conversation on the social media platform X with CEO Elon Musk. The latest attempt comes in the state that delivered Trump his closest statewide margin of victory four years ago and that is once again expected to be a battleground in 2024. Trump won North Carolina over Democrat Joe Biden in 2020 by less than 1.4 percentage points — about 74,500 votes — and he can't afford to have the state's 16 electoral votes shift to Democrats for the first time since Barack Obama prevailed here in 2008. “We look forward to welcoming President Trump to western North Carolina and talking about how he will restore our economy," said North Carolina Republican Chair Jason Simmons. “This visit...

title: Top 5 reasons why Samsung believes its smart TVs are awesome
creator: Mihai Matei
content: Samsung has done a bit of restructuring to its website lately. Nothing extreme but, for example, online-exclusive Galaxy phone colors are now neatly shown in a more prominent box. New products across multiple categories went on sale in recent months, and a fresh coat of paint to the e-shop never hurts. One other thing we found interesting in the wake of these relatively minor aesthetic changes is that, in a sea of countless TV models, Samsung finally found some common ground across its entire lineup. Whether you're checking out a Crystal TV, an OLED, a Neo QLED, The Frame, or The Terrace at Samsung's e-shop, the company highlights these five reasons why its TVs are awesome right below the button. Needless to say, the Upscaling description will differ based on whether you're checking out a 4K or 8K TV at the online store. But beyond that, this banner will greet you when you visit any TV shop page in the USA — and possibly other regions. According to Samsung, the five main reasons its TVs are awesome are: Upscaling, Endless Content, Security, Connectivity, and Planet and People (Sustainability). Samsung has been the world's biggest TV manufacturer for more than a decade for good reasons, five of which are now neatly pushed to the forefront of virtually every TV landing page on Samsung's e-shop. It's refreshing to see that, despite the expansive and, for newcomers, even...

title: "Реал" — "Аталанта": онлайн трансляція матчу за Суперкубок УЄФА
content: Іспанський клуб розпочне матч у статусі переможця Ліги чемпіонів У середу, 14 серпня, іспанський "Реал" та італійський "Атланта" змагатимуться за Суперкубок УЄФА. Зустріч проходитиме у Варшаві на стадіоні Національний. "Телеграф" проведе текстову трансляцію матчу. Вже відомо, що матч Реал – Аталанта розпочнеться о 22:00 за Києвом. Його пряму онлайн-відеотрансляцію також можна буде побачити і в Україні. Зокрема, вона буде доступна на платформі Мегого. Крім того, її можна буде подивитися на платформі "Воля ТБ". Зазначимо, що іспанський клуб розпочне матч у статусі переможця Ліги чемпіонів, а італійський – переможця Ліги Європи. Однією із головних інтриг зустрічі називають дебют у складі Реала Кіліана Мбаппе. За словами тренера іспанців Карло Анчелотті, Мбаппе готовий до матчу. Також слід нагадати, що Реал уже п’ять разів вигравав Суперкубок УЄФА і, якщо переможе сьогодні, вийде у лідери за цим показником. Нагадаємо, "Реал" перед початком нового сезону посилився гравцем донецького "Шахтаря".

Legend of Wales' drag scene dies
creator: newsdesk@walesonline.co.uk (Ben Summer)
content: A legend of Cardiff's drag and LGBTQ+ scene has died at the age of 58. Mark Venn, known better to many as Marcia Bassey-Jones, was one of the very first drag queens in Cardiff and widely regarded as the first in the city to cross between the underground scene to mainstream drag, introducing it to a whole new audience. Marcia was synonymous with the city's LGBTQ+ scene and according to Alan Jones-Griffiths – better known to some as Fanny Dazzle – "all of our careers started because of Marcia." Long before Marcia existed Mark's love of performance began while living in Whitchurch with his adoptive mother Eva. She encouraged him to use her sewing machine and would take him to theatre and musicals, waiting on one occasion at the stage door of the New Theatre to get Danny La Rue's autograph. Making his costumes himself – and later providing that service to other drag queens across the city – Mark created a persona and evolved her over the years. Name a Cardiff venue, past or present, that hosted drag and cabaret and Marcia Bassey-Jones will have performed there. He performed with Paul O'Grady as Lily Savage, later recalling that the pair of them would "always be on the cider, rolling around the stage, the two of us having a lovely old time" and for a time lived in Benidorm where he owned a bar named Bar La Rue. title: Tejal, Raghvi fifties in vain as Australia 'A' beat India 'A' in first one-dayer
content: NEW DELHI: Raghvi Bist and Tejal Hasabnis ' half-centuries were not enough to secure a victory for India 'A' as they faced a four-wicket defeat against Australia 'A' in the first one-day match at the Great Barrier Reef Arena in Mackay on Wednesday. Katie Mack 's impressive 129 runs guided the Australian team to success. India 'A' struggled early on, finding themselves at 56/3 in 12.3 overs. However, Tejal's 53 off 67 balls, which included seven fours, and Raghvi's 82 off 102 deliveries, featuring six boundaries, helped the visitors reach a total of 249/9, reported IANS. Maitlan Brown was the standout bowler for Australia 'A', taking 4-23, while Nicola Hancock and Grace Parsons claimed two wickets each. In response, Katie's 129 off 126 deliveries, reaching her century off 106 balls, laid the foundation for Australia 'A's win. She formed partnerships of 50 with Maddy Darke, 65 with Charli Knott, and a decisive 135-run stand with captain Tahlia McGrath , who contributed 56 off 61 balls. Despite a late wobble, Kate Peterson sealed the victory for Australia 'A' with 18 balls remaining, as the Australian team selectors observed the match from the stands. Meghna Singh and Minnu Mani took two wickets each for India 'A'. India 'A' faced early setbacks with the bat as Nicola dismissed Shweta Sehrawat and Priya Punia, while Tahlia removed Shubha Satheesh. Tejal and Raghvi combined for a...

title: Brozović okončao reprezentativnu karijeru
content: javlja Fabricio Romano Hrvatski fudbaler Marcelo Brozović odlučio je da okonča svoju reprezentativnu kareijeru, javlja Fabricio Romano. Brozović je sa Hrvatskom napravio velike uspjehe. Bio je učesnik svih velikih rezultata sa vatrenima, od finala Svjetskog prvenstva u Rusiji 2018. godine, i trećeg mjesta sa Mundijala u Kataru. U karijeri je odigrao 99 utakmica u dresu Hrvatske i odlučio da okonča karijeru prije tog jubilarnog stotog meča u nacionalnom dresu, javlja fudbalski insajder Fabricio Romano. Rođeni Zagrepčanin je u dresu reprezentacije postigao sedam golova. Brozović je osam godina igrao za Inter, prije toga je u Hrvatskoj nastupao za Hrvatski Dragovoljac, Lokomotivu i Dinamo iz Zagreba. Sada je član ekipe Al Nasra, gdje igra zajedno sa Kristijaom Ronaldom.

title: Novozelandska banka hrane distribuirala bombone sa smrtonosnom dozom metamfetamina
content: B.Č.J. [ Beta ] donacija nepoznatog građanina Humanitarna organizacija koja pomaže beskućnicima u Oklandu na Novom Zelandu dijelila bombone, koje je donirao nepoznati građanin, bez znanja da sadrže potencijalno smrtonosnu dozu metamfetamina. Organizacija je danas saopštila da su njeni aktivisti počeli da traže kontakte 400 osoba kojim je donirala pakete sa hranom u kojima su bile otrovne bombone. U omotima slatkiša otkriveni su čvrsti komadi metamfetamina nakon što su tri osobe hospitalizovane zbog trovanja, saopštile su novozelandske vlasti. Količina metamfetamina u svakom omotu je i do 300 puta veća od nivoa koji bi neko konzumirao i mogla bi biti smrtonosna, prema Novozelandskoj fondaciji za droge koja je prva testirala bombone. Portparol Fondacije rekao je da je pakovanje droge u omote bezopasne robe uobičajena tehnika prekograničnog krijumčarenja. Vrijednost "slatkiša" bi na ulici bila i do 1.000 novozelandskih dolara (608 dolara) po komadu. Vlasti su saopštile da je osam porodica, među kojima je najmanje jedno dijete, prijavilo da su konzumirali otrovni "bombon" ali ih je većina odmah ispljunula zbog "odvratnog" ukusa. Banka hrane dobrotvorne organizacije prihvata samo donacije komercijalno proizvedene hrane u zatvorenoj ambalaži, rekao je Robinson. Slatkiši od ananasa, sa etiketom malezijskog brenda Rinda, pojavili su se kao takvi kada su donirani,...

title: «علی‌آبادی» به دلیل سوابق طولانی در صنعت برق، بهترین گزینه برای وزارت نیرو است
content: «مهدی صادقی» امروز (چهارشنبه) در گفت‌وگو با خبرنگار اقتصادی افزود: مهم‌ترین مشکل کنونی، بحث ناترازی انرژی برای واحدهای صنعتی است؛ به این معنا که در تابستان قطعی برق و در زمستان قطعی گاز را داریم که این روند عدم النفع زیادی برای واحدهای صنعتی ایجاد کرده و بخشی هم دچار زیان شده‌اند. وی ادامه ‌اد: علی‌آبادی سوابقی در صنعت برق دارد و زمانی معاون برق و انرژی وزیر وقت نیرو بود و یک دوره بسیار طولانی در مهم‌ترین بخش صنعت برق که شرکت مپنا است حضور داشت. نایب‌رئیس اتاق بازرگانی تهران خاطرنشان کرد: علی‌آبادی تأثیرگذار در بحث توسعه و تعمیق ساخت داخل نیروگاه‌های گازی و حتی سیکل ترکیبی تأثیرگذار بوده و به نظر می‌رسد به دلیل آنکه هم در عرصه سیاست‌گذاری به‌عنوان معاون وزیر نیرو حضور داشت و هم در حوزه اجرا در بنگاه‌داری و شرکت داری ساخت و توسعه‌ای، بهترین گزینه‌ای است که توسط رئیس‌جمهور انتخاب و معرفی شده‌ است. صادقی گفت: امید است نمایندگان مجلس شورای اسلامی هم با رأی بالا به وی کمک کنند مسئولیت وزارت نیرو را برعهده بگیرد. وی ادامه داد: مهم‌ترین چالشی که ما به‌عنوان فعالان صنعت برق دنبال می‌کنیم، بحث اقتصاد صنعت برق است. نایب‌رئیس اتاق تهران افزود: اگر اقتصاد این صنعت اصلاح نشود و روند بهبود نیابد، گرچه اقدام‌هایی در این زمینه توسط وزیر وقت انجام شده است، اما باید ترازها در این زمینه مثبت شود و اقتصاد صنعت برق بهبود یابد تا با بهبود اقتصاد این صنعت وضع شرکت‌های فعال در این بخش و مطالبات عدیده‌ای که دارند بابت سرویس‌ها و تجهیزاتی که به شبکه داده‌اند بتوانند مطالبات خود را به‌موقع...

title: VIDEO: Kiša i grad u Beranama
content: A.J. NA SNAZI CRVENI METEO ALARM Kiša praćena gradom, pala je danas u Beranama. Kako javljaju čitaoci Portala RTCG, grad je pao i u beranskom naselju Ržanica. Podsjetimo, meteorolozi su za danas najavili do 41 stepen. Na snazi je i crveni meteoalarm. Na sjeveru Crne Gore najavljeno je sunčano, popodne malo oblačno vrijeme, dok na planinama ima uslova za prolazni pljusak. Meteorolozi za sjutra najavljuju pljusak na sjeveru zemlje.

title: Knežević: Vesnu Medenicu sam juče vidio na crkvenom saboru, nikad ljepše nije izgledala
content: M.V. [ A plus/Adria ] POSLANIK DNP Optužnice protiv predsjednika Atlas grupe Duška Kneževića predstavljaju svojevrsni vodvilj kreiran od bivšeg tužilaštva, čiji su ključni akteri sada pod mjerama zabrane ili čak u zatvoru, mislim na bivše tužioce Milivoja Katnića i Sašu Čađenovića. Ovakva situacija ukazuje na ozbiljne nepravilnosti u radu pravosudnog sistema, tvrdi Milan Knežević, poslanik Demokratske narodne partije, gostujući u emisiji “Klub A plus” na A plus Televiziji. Knežević smatra da su optužnice protiv Duška Kneževića, koje su podignute od strane Čađenovića i Katnića, neodržive. On naglašava da je neophodno obezbjediti jednakost pravnog oružja u sudskim procesima, što znači da sve što je dozvoljeno tužiocu, mora biti omogućeno i Kneževiću. Posebno ističe da nije jasno zašto se Knežević i dalje nalazi u samici, uprkos njegovim molbama da bude premješten u ćeliju sa drugim zatvorenicima. “Najveća kazna u zatvoru je kada ste u samici. Ja to dobro znam jer sam i sam bio tamo. Duško Knežević je u samici već četvrti mjesec, iako je tražio da bude premješten. S obzirom na to da se dobrovoljno predao i da nema namjeru da bježi, smatram da bi mu trebalo omogućiti da se brani sa slobode, uz određene mjere nadzora”, rekao je Knežević. Knežević je dodao da bi ovakva odluka bila u skladu sa slučajevima poput Vesne...

title: Osimhen ha un dubbio sul Chelsea: cosa lo frena dal dire sì
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Victor Osimhen corteggiato nuovamente dal Chelsea , che però starebbe avendo delle difficoltà a convincere il centravanti nigeriano a scegliere la destinazione londinese. Il perché lo spiega il giornalista Marcello Altamura ai microfoni di Radio CRC . " Il Chelsea fa la Conference League, non la Champions: questo incide nelle scelte di Osimhen. In assenza di una situazione concreta col PSG, però, l'attaccante nigeriano potrebbe rivedere la propria posizione nei prossimi giorni". Proprio il club transalpino " è il suo club preferito, perché gli offre 14 milioni a stagione fino al 2029 e fa la Champions. Il Chelsea è una soluzione che, alla fine, potrebbe mettere tutti d'accordo, perché Osimhen sogna la Premier da bambino. Per Lukaku, il Napoli potrebbe risparmiare i soldi del cartellino, 30-35 milioni. Il vero dubbio che ho io è sulla tempistica". E ancora: " C'è chi scrive che Conte voglia Lukaku in panchina con il Verona, ma è oggettivamente complicato: la partita è domenica, si dovrebbe chiudere nelle prossime 24-48 ore e Lukaku non ha fatto la preparazione. L'ipotesi, comunque, resta sicuramente plausibile e percorribile".

title: Caiazza: "Napoli, non si è mai visto: che caos. Ma se arriva colpo di teatro..."
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Il giornalista del Roma, Salvatore Caiazza , ai microfoni della trasmissione "Napolimagazine Live", su Radio Punto Zero, ha messo in evidenza l'attualità di casa Napoli : " Non avevo mai visto quello che è accaduto nella giornata di ieri, bisogna capire quello che è successo. Se poi il 'no' a Brescianini dovesse portare ad un colpo di teatro ben venga, ma c'è qualcosa che non funziona e qualcuno ce lo dovrà spiegare. Se è vero che il Napoli ha cambiato la formula del trasferimento sul prestito bisogna capire cosa si sta programmando". Poi Caiazza, ha aggiunto: " Parliamoci chiaro, ad oggi c'è un grande caos, non da club di livello internazionale come gli azzurri. Il Napoli ha bisogno di un attaccante di riferimento che non può essere Raspadori, soprattutto quando le squadre si chiudono. Osimhen? Il Napoli lo paga tanto e dovrebbe poter puntare su di lui come ha fatto la Salernitana con Dia. Mi auguro che nella conferenza stampa di Conte prima del Verona si faccia chiarezza". Ha evidenziato Caiazza nell'intervento odierno.

title: Auriemma: "Il Napoli arriverà 8° secondo Opta. Al 15% andrà in Champions"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Interessante analisi di Raffaele Auriemma , il quale passa in rassegna le statistiche di 'Opta', che raccoglie dati relativi al calcio (e non solo), per approfondimenti e possibili previsioni sulle stagioni agonistiche dei massimi campionato europei. Il noto giornalista campano, indimenticato 'telecronista tifoso' che raccontava le gesta del Calcio Napoli su Mediaset , oggi direttore di Si gonfia la rete , ha posto all'attenzione dei suoi 'follower' sui social ciò che potrebbe accadere per la squadra di Antonio Conte. Come scrive lo stesso Auriemma su 'X', i pronostici non sembrano arridere molto agli azzurri, tanto è vero che "s econdo Opta, la posizione finale più probabile del Napoli sarà l’ ottavo posto . Gli azzurri, secondo la nota piattaforma, hanno solamente il 15.1% di probabilità di arrivare nelle prime 4 (ovvero in Champions League , ndr). È una previsione catastrofica, oppure realistica?" si domanda il giornalista partenopeo. Non resta che attendere, per scoprirlo.

title: Kehlani’s Ex Shares Receipts Amid Abuse Allegations
creator: Cole Blake
content: Kehlani 's ex, Javaughn Young-White , has shared a series of text messages between the two on Instagram after the singer was granted a temporary restraining order against him on Friday. Young-White argues that Kehlani was the one who was abusive during their relationship. He's also seeking custody of their 5-year-old daughter, Adeya. "I BEGGED YOU to leave me alone, I BEGGED YOU that I didn't want to speak," Young-White wrote in one of the alleged messages. "I RAN from your room into the backhouse. You followed me and barged through the door. I asked you REPEATEDLY that I did not want to talk to you. You said 'YOU HAVE TO SPEAK TO YOUR CO PARENT' I RAN into the bathroom. I said NO I DONT. PLEASE STOP. I said PLEASE leave me alone. Cause I knew what you were about to do. I said I AM PACKING. You KEPT COMING. YOU wanted us to be homeless in the morning." Read More: Kehlani’s Ex Regrets Accusations From Custody Lawsuit Filing WEST HOLLYWOOD, CALIFORNIA - JUNE 02: Kehlani during the 2024 WeHo Pride Parade on June 02, 2024 in West Hollywood, California. (Photo by Rodin Eckenroth/Getty Images) Young-White previously made headlines, earlier this month, after TMZ reported on documents in which he appeared to accuse Kehlani of being in a sex cult . Soon afterward, he walked back the remarks and claimed they were put out without his permission by former legal counsel. Kehlani also...

title: Comienza el juicio al ex ejecutivo acusado de abusar de su sobrina que pasó tres años prófugo
creator: Federico Fahsbender
content: Esta semana, Leandro Martínez, el ex ejecutivo de una reconocida multinacional acusado de abusar de su sobrina , finalmente enfrentará el juicio en su contra en el Tribunal Oral N°3 de Mercedes. La calificación en su contra es la de abuso sexual agravado por resultar ser gravemente ultrajante y por ser encargado de la guarda, además de corrupción de menores agravada . No se le imputa acceso carnal, el delito de violación. Su sobrina, al momento de los hechos, tenía menos de 13 años de edad , lo que agrava particularmente la imputación de acuerdo al Código Penal. La víctima es representada por una querella a cargo de su madre , con los abogados Roberto Schlagel y Ricardo Nicolás Canale. Sin embargo, el inicio del proceso queda por verse. Luego de la difusión del caso, que incluyó escraches y la viralización del video que muestra uno de los supuestos ataques, Martínez pasó tres años prófugo con una circular roja de Interpol en su contra, hasta entregarse en febrero del año pasado , en una causa a cargo de la UFI N°11 de Moreno de la fiscal Luisa Pontecorvo, con detectives de la Policía Federal que rastrearon el Conurbano y el resto del país para encontrarlo. La sospecha de estos detectives es que habría sido refugiado por un familiar, con vigilancias en countries y sospechas de una red de inversiones que permitieron que siga a la fuga. Hoy, Martínez goza...

title: Schira: "So perché il Napoli non ha preso più Brescianini"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: L'esperto di mercato Nicolà Schira , attraverso le frequenze di Kiss Kiss Napoli, nel corso di Radio Goal, è tornato sul caso Brescianini , rivelando alcuni retroscena inediti: " L'Atalanta ha rilanciato, il Frosinone l'ha fatto sapere al Napoli che ha avuto la possibilità di rilanciare. Il club di De Laurentiis, dalla sua, ha fatto delle riflessioni ed ha deciso di non proseguire e andare su un giocatore più rodato evidentemente. Brescianini buon giocatore, ma fino all'anno scorso giocava in Serie B". Schira ha svelato: " Il balletto non ha convinto il Napoli e così nonostante le visite s'è tirato indietro ed ha lasciato andare il calciatore: questa è la verità. E' ormai sempre più frequente, neanche le visite mediche mettono al riparo da sorprese. Il Napoli non lo ammetterà mai, ma non ha gradito il balletto del Frosinone e dell'agente del ragazzo". "Se fai le visite, fai le visite, invece lui e il suo entourage non erano insensibili ad offerte migliori. Stiamo parlando di un ottimo giocatore, ma era un rincalzo, e quindi hanno deciso diversamente di non prenderlo più. Poi c'è la versione del Frosinone sulle condizioni, dell'Atalanta sul rilancio... ognuno ha la propria. Ma la verità è che il balletto al Napoli non è piaciuto" . Ha concluso Schira.

title: Pogledajte nestvarne prizore sa Žabljaka
content: A.M. [ Portal RTCG ] foto-galerija Poznati planinar Nebojša Atanacković proveo je nekoliko dana na Žabljaku i tom prilikom fotografisao predivne prizore u NP "Durmitor". Priču o iskustvu na Durmitoru najavio je ubrzo na svom blogu "nestvarna blog".

title: דיווח: מתקפת סייבר גדולה נגד בנקים באיראן
content: ערוץ "איראן אינטרנשיונל" דיווח אחר הצהריים (רביעי) על מתקפת סייבר גדולה נגד הבנק המרכזי של איראן וכמה בנקים נוספים. לפי הערוץ המתקפה גרמה לשיבושים נרחבים במערכת הבנקאית של המדינה. הערוץ, שמזוהה עם מתנגדי המשטר באיראן ופועל מלונדון, דיווח כי ייתכן שמדובר באחת ממתקפות הסייבר הגדולות אי-פעם נגד מוסדותיה של הרפובליקה האיסלאמית. בינואר 2023 טענה איראן כי היא הצליחה לסכל מתקפת סייבר נגד הבנק המרכזי במדינה. הדיווח על המתקפה הנוכחית והשיבושים בבנקים האיראניים מגיע בזמן שבכירים במדינה ממשיכים לאיים בתגובה חריפה נגד ישראל, כנקמה על חיסולו של איסמעיל הנייה בטהרן לפני כשבועיים. 2 הבנק המרכזי של איראן צילום: Nazanin Tabatabaee/WANA (West Asia News Agency) via REUTERS/File Photo איראן סבלה בשנים האחרונות משורת מתקפות סייבר. בדצמבר האחרון דיווחה איראן כי מתקפת סייבר שיבשה את הפעילות של כ-70% מתחנות הדלק במדינה , והפנתה אצבע מאשימה כלפי ישראל וארה"ב. בהמשך לקחה קבוצת האקרים ישראלית אחריות על המתקפה. קבוצת ההאקרים, "הדרור הטורף", כתבה בהודעת לקיחת האחריות: "השבתנו היום את רוב תחנות הדלק באיראן בתגובה לתוקפנות האיראנית באזור. חמינאי, דע שלמשחק באש יש מחיר. לפני חודש הזהרנו אותך שאנחנו נגרום לך לשלם על הפרובוקציות שלך. זו רק טעימה ממה שאנחנו מסוגלים לבצע. כמו במבצעים קודמים שלנו, המתקפה הזו בוצעה באופן מבוקר שמגביל את הפגיעה בשירותי החירום. לפני המתקפה, שיגרנו אזהרה לשירותי החירום באיראן והקפדנו שלא לפגוע בחלק מתחנות הדלק במדינה, למרות שהייתה לנו היכולת להשביתן כליל". באותה מתקפה פרסמו ההאקרים...

title: رییس فدراسیون فوتبال خبر داد؛/ فوری: دو VAR جدید وارد کشور می‌شود
content: به گزارش "ورزش‌ سه"، هفته نخست لیگ برتر فوتبال کشور در حالی از فردا پنجشنبه آغاز می‌شود که دیدار افتتاحیه این رقابت‌ها بین پرسپولیس و ذوب آهن اصفهان از ساعت ۱۹:۳۰ در ورزشگاه یادگار امام خمینی برگزار می‌شود. این دیدار با توجه به نصب و راه‌اندازی VAR و تایید فیفا با استفاده از سیستم داور ویدئویی برگزار می‌شود. همچنین ورزشگاه سردار آزادگان قزوین نیز مجهز به این سیستم شده است تا بازی هفته نخست را با استفاده از همین فناوری پوشش دهد. مهدی تاج، رئیس فدراسیون فوتبال با پیگیری هرچه جدی ورود دستگاه‌های VAR خبر از ورود دو محموله دیگر از سیستم داور ویدئویی طی هفته آینده در کشور داد تا رفته رفته بر تعداد آنها برای پوشش بازی‌های لیگ برتر افزوده شود. گفتنی است در حالی که مسئولان برگزاری مسابقات فوتبال در ایران خبر از برگزاری هفته اول لیگ با استفاده از کمک داور ویدیویی داده بودند، ۶ مسابقه هفته اول بدون حضور این فناوری برگزار می‌شود ولی فدراسیون در تلاش است تا تعداد ورزشگاه‌های مجهز به وی آر را رفته رفته افزایش دهد و به نقطه‌ای برساند که تمام مسابقات لیگ برتر با استفاده از این فناوری برگزار شوند.

title: با ثبت کمترین محدودیت - نقطه مقابل استقلال/ گل‌گهر خوش‌اخلاق‌ترین مجموعه فوتبال ایران!
content: به گزارش "ورزش سه"، صبح امروز در فدراسیون فوتبال ایران، ابوالفضل حسن‌زاده رئیس کمیته انضباطی در نشست خبری با اصحاب رسانه و خبرنگاران در مورد مسئله ثبت شکایت از تیم‌های لیگ برتری و لیگ یک صحبت کرد. در شرایطی که مسابقات لیگ برتر و لیگ آزادگان به زودی آغاز خواهند شد، یکی از مسائل مهم فوتبال ایران مسئله تخلفاتی است که در فصل قبل صورت گرفته و مقابله با آن اقدامی است که باید از سمت کمیته انضباطی برای کاهش رفتارهای ناهنجار اعمال شود. ابوالفضل حسن‌زاده رئیس کمیته انضباطی در مورد بیشترین تخلف ثبت شده در لیگ برتر توضیح داد: این تخلفاتی است که در لیگ برتر و لیگ یک به ثبت رسیده. در لیگ برتر ۷ تخلف شایع را لیست کرده‌ایم که تخلف تماشاگران با ۱۲۲ فقره رای، سوءرفتار تیمی با ۶۲ فقره رای، بدرفتاری با مقام رسمی به منظور داوران و ناظران با ۴۵ فقره رای، رفتار غیر ورزشی با ۴۲ فقره رای، نقض اصول کلی رفتار مانند عدم حضور در کنفرانس خبری با ۴۱ فقره رای و عدم رعایت دستورالعمل مجوز حرفه‌ای با ۴۰ فقره رای و آخرین مورد بدرفتاری با مقام غیر رسمی از جمله بازیکن و کادرفنی با ۲۲ فقره رای است. او ادامه داد: آمار کلی این موضوع وجود دارد که کدام باشگاه بیشترین تخلف را دارد. سه تیم مسی ما هیچ تخلفی از سمت تماشاگرانش نداشته و این خیلی جالب است. مس کرمان، مس رفسنجان و مس ورزقان هیچ تخلفی نداشتند و مس شهر بابک فقط ۳ مورد تخلف کلی داشته. حسن‌زاده تاکید کرد: بیشترین محکومیت برای استقلال است که ۲۶ فقره رای برایش صادر شده و دومین تیم پرسپولیس است که مشترکا با شمس آذر قزوین ۱۳ فقره رای برایش ثبت شده. بیشترین...

title: إيلون ماسك يصف "الغارديان" بأنها "قمامة" وسائل الإعلام
content: وكتب رجل الأعمال في موقع X: "هل استمعتم للمحادثة بالأساس؟ إن الغارديان مجرد قمامة.. إن ظفري الصغير يعرف أكثر عن قضايا المناخ من جميع موظفي الغارديان". وكانت الصحيفة قد نشرت في اليوم السابق مادة مع خبراء، وصفت في عنوانها المناقشات بين ماسك وترامب حول المناخ بأنها "الأغبى" في التاريخ. وفي رأيهم أدلى رجل الأعمال والرئيس الأمريكي السابق بتصريحات قالوا إنها "بعيدة عن الحقائق". وكان ذلك رد الصحيفة على دعوة ماسك إلى عدم تشويه سمعة صناعة النفط والغاز، لأن ذلك هو قوة دافعة رئيسية للتلوث ومسببة للاحتباس الحراري. في الوقت نفسه، قال المحاور خلال الحوار إنه "إذا توقفنا عن استخدام النفط والغاز الآن، فسنموت جميعا جوعا وسينهار الاقتصاد". كما كان أحد أسباب الهجوم من الصحيفة عبارة "لا يزال لدينا الكثير من الوقت... لسنا بحاجة إلى التسرع"، والتي يزعم أنها كشفت عن ماسك كعارض للحرب ضد زيادة انبعاثات ثاني أكسيد الكربون في الغلاف الجوي. المصدر: نوفوستي

title: Kamala Harris Campaign Caught Deceptively Editing News Headlines
creator: Michael Schwarz
content: Stop me if you’ve heard this one. Believe it or not, Big Tech and the establishment media have colluded to help Democrats — all while feigning objectivity. According to , Vice President and 2024 Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris’ campaign has bought search ads on Google featuring deceptively edited headlines from establishment media outlets. For instance, a Harris ad might include a story from CNN, NPR, The Guardian or another establishment propaganda outlet. That ad, however, will feature a fake headline designed to paint Harris in the most flattering light possible. The first question that leaps to mind, of course, is why bother rewriting anything? Do those outlets’ actual fawning headlines and stories not already paint in a favorable light? In any event, Google has justified the practice by noting that each search ad comes with a “sponsored” designation. Thus, readers should already know that the Harris campaign paid for the ad. Normally, conservatives tend to err on the side of eschewing idiotic warning labels and instead trusting the public. In this case, however, one finds at least two very sinister acts of deception. First, the search ads feature links to actual articles by those establishment propaganda outlets. The Harris campaign simply changed the headlines and supporting text. That might not offend the average voter as much as say, . But it does seem...

title: Telangana: రాష్ట్రపతి పురస్కారానికి ఎంపికైన తెలంగాణ హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్..
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: : స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవం సందర్భంగా వివిధ రంగాల్లో ప్రతిభ కనబరిచిన 1,037 మంది పోలీసు సిబ్బంది, అగ్నిమాపక దళ సభ్యులు, హోంగార్డులు తదితరుల పేర్లను కేంద్ర హోం మంత్రిత్వ శాఖ బుధవారం ప్రకటించింది. 2022లో ఇద్దరు నేరస్థులను పట్టుకోవడానికి ప్రాణాలను అడ్డుపెట్టిన తెలంగాణ పోలీస్ హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్ చదువు యాదయ్యకు అత్యున్నత పురస్కారం ప్రకటించింది కేంద్రం. ఆయనకు రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలంటరీ పోలీసు పతకాన్ని ప్రదానం చేసేందుకు రాష్ట్రపతి ద్రౌపది ముర్ము ఆమోదం తెలిపారు. స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవం సందర్భంగా చదువు యాదయ్యతో పాటు 213 మంది సిబ్బందికి మెడల్ ఆఫ్ గ్యాలంటరీ(జీఎం) ప్రదానం చేయనున్నారు. సెంట్రల్ రిజర్వ్ పోలీస్ ఫోర్స్ (CRPF)కి గరిష్ఠంగా 52 శౌర్య పతకాలు, జమ్మూ కశ్మీర్ పోలీసులకు 31, ఉత్తరప్రదేశ్, మహారాష్ట్ర నుంచి 17 మంది పోలీసు సిబ్బంది, ఛత్తీస్‌గఢ్ నుండి 15, మధ్యప్రదేశ్ నుండి 12 మందికి పతకాలు వరించాయి. రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలంటరీ పతకం అత్యున్నతమైనది కావడంతో.. ఈ పతకం వచ్చిన చదువు యాదయ్య పేరు ఇప్పుడు దేశ వ్యాప్తంగా మార్మోగుతోంది. ఓ చోరీ కేసులో 2022లో తెలంగాణ పోలీసు శాఖలో పనిచేస్తున్న హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్ యాదయ్య ధైర్య సాహసాలు ప్రదర్శించారు. చోరీ కేసులో నిందితులైన ఇషాన్ నిరంజన్ నీలంనల్లి, రాహుల్‌ను ప్రాణాలకు తెగించి పట్టుకున్నారు. వారిని అదుపులోకి తీసుకునే క్రమంలో నిరంజన్, రాహుల్.. యాదయ్యపై కత్తితో దాడికి దిగారు. ఓ వైపు తీవ్ర రక్తస్రావం అవుతున్నా.. యాదయ్య వారితో పోరాడారు. చివరికి వారిని బంధించారు. ఈ ఘటనలో ఆయన గాయపడి 17 రోజులు ఆసుపత్రిలో చికిత్స పొందారు. ప్రాణాలను లెక్క చేయకుండా వీరోచితంగా పోరాడిన యాదయ్య...

title: اسامی دفاتر و سایت‌های منتخب فروش بلیت پرواز‌های اربعین اعلام شد
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: جعفر یازرلو سخنگوی سازمان هواپیمایی کشوری در گفت وگو با خبرنگار باشگاه خبرنگاران جوان با بیان اینکه فروش بلیت پروازهای اربعین از طریق ۲۱ شرکت هواپیمایی در حال انجام است گفت: با توجه به دستور رئیس سازمان هواپیمایی کشوری و تعیین ۲۴ مردادماه به عنوان شروع بازه فروش بلیت اربعین ۱۴۰۳ همچنین به منظور تسهیل دسترسی زائران به بلیت پروازها، شرکت‌های هواپیمایی موظف هستند تا شنبه ۲۷ مرداد ظرفیت پیش بینی شده خود براساس مجوزهای صادره این سازمان را از طریق کانال های عرضه و فروش تعیین معرفی شده در معرض مشاهده و فروش قرار دهند. وی ادامه داد: ظرفيت‌های ارائه شده بعد از شروع بازه اربعین صرفا محدود به پروازهای فوق العاده و برنامه‌ریزی شده در آینده و براساس تقاضای بازار خواهد بود. او بیان کرد: سازمان هواپیمایی کشوری آدرس و نحوه فروش بلیت پرواز‌های اربعین ۱۴۰۳ را اعلام کرده است و افراد به آژانس و سایت های معتبر برای خرید بلیت اقدام کنند. دفاتر و سایت‌های منتخب فروش بلیت پرواز‌های اربعین خبرنگار: محبوبه کباری

title: ببینید | تفحص پیکر ۱۸ شهید دفاع مقدس در شلمچه
creator: info@jamejamonline.ir
content: پیکر‌های مطهر ۱۸ شهید دوران هشت سال دفاع مقدس، از ابتدای هفته تاکنون توسط کمیته جست‌وجوی مققودین ستاد کل نیرو‌های مسلح در عملیاتی شلمچه کشف شده و هم‌اکنون نیز عملیات تفحص شهدا در این منطقه که محل برگزاری عملیات‌های مهمی همچون «کربلای پنج» است، همچنان ادامه داد. این درحالی است که این‌روز‌ها بسیاری از زائران حضرت اباعبدالله‌الحسین (ع) برای شرکت در راهپیمایی عظیم اربعین حسینی، از این منطقه که شهدای زیادی هنوز زیر خاک‌های آن خفته‌اند، عبور می‌کنند.

title: کریات شمونا موشکباران شد+فیلم
content: به گزارش به نقل از المیادین، منابع خبری از حمله موشکی از جنوب لبنان به الجلیل خبر دادند. مقاومت لبنان شهرک های شمال فلسطین اشغالی را موشکباران کرد. منابع خبری اعلام کردند که صدای آژیر خطر در کریات شمونا و مرگلیوت در شمال فلسطین اشغالی به گوش می رسد. رسانه های رژیم صهیونیستی بیان کردند که دو موشک به کریات شمونا اصابت کرده است بدون اینکه صدای آژیر خطر به صدا درآید. این منابع اعلام کردند که بانک لتومی کریات شمونا هدف قرار گرفته و خساراتی به آن وارد شده است. رسانه های رژیم صهیونیستی از قطع برق در شهرک کریات شمونا پس از حمله سنگین موشکی حزب الله خبر دادند. حزب الله در بیانه ای اعلام کرد: شهرک کریات شمونا را با موشکهای کاتیوشا در واکنش به حمله دشمن صهیونیست به روستاهای جنوبی و منازل به ویژه شهرک العباسیه و زخمی شدن غیرنظامیان، موشکباران کردیم.

title: Джейк Пол предложи 2 мача на Конър Макгрегър
content: Джейк Пол е отправил предложение към Конър Макгрегър за два мача, след като двамата не спират да разменят закани из социалните мрежи. Пол отдавна се стреми да се бие с легендата на UFC Макгрегър, който не се е сражавал повече от две години и който сега може да остане извън строя до 2025 г. Макгрегър трябваше да се изправи срещу Майкъл Чандлър през юни, но се отказа, след като счупи пръст на крака си по време на тренировка. Очакваше се двубоят да бъде пренасрочен за 14 декември, но главният изпълнителен директор на UFC Дейна Уайт смята, че Макгрегър няма да се бие до следващата година, което Макгрегър оспори, като се обърна към социалните медии, за да моли да му бъде позволено да се състезава преди новата година. Звездата от ютуб Пол, който ще се изправи срещу Майк Тайсън в боксов мач през ноември и се възползва от възможността да се заяжда с Макгрегър, като публикува: "Конър е толкова потиснат, че моли феновете да му помогнат да си организира битка. Не знам кое е по-тъжно, неговото падение или това, че най-голямата звезда в историята на UFC е контролирана от Дейна Уайт като служител и не може да се бие, когато иска." Coke head Conor is so down he’s asking fans to help him get his fight booked. Not sure what’s sadder, his downfall or that the biggest star in ufc history is controlled by Dana White like an employee & can’t fight when he wants. https://t.co/BdTuvQsAIA...

title: Следващият съперник на Лудогорец в Европа със служебна победа в Молдова
content: Съперникът на Лудогорец в Лига Европа - Петрокуб Хънчещ, нямаше мач през уикенда. Причината обаче не е отлагане, а неявяване на гостуващия отбор на Флорещ. В Молдова твърдят, че тимът е бойкотирал срещата заради неплатени заплати. Очаква се на Петрокуб да бъде присъдена служебна победа. Всъщност съперникът на Лудогорец не е изиграл нито един мач от началото на сезона, въпреки че са минали два кръга. Първият сблъсък срещу Милсами бе отложен за октомври. Петрокуб пък елиминира Ню Сейнтс от Уелс след 0:0 на реванша. Молдовците бяха спечелили първата среща в Кишинев с 1:0. Дуелът между Петрокуб и Лудогорец ще започне със среща в Разград на 22 август. Реваншът в Кишинев ще бъде седмица по-късно - на 29 август. Градчето Хънчещ се намира на 30 километра от столицата на Молдова. Клубното съоръжение на Петрокуб е с капацитет от само 1100 зрители. За европейските си мачове тимът използва стадиона на Зимбру в Кишинев. Тази пролет Петрокуб спечели за първи път в своята история футболния шампионат на Молдова, слагайки край на хегемонията на Шериф Тираспол. Съперникът на Лудогорец е основан едва преди 30 години и за това време клубът сменя името си цели 8 пъти. От началото на тази година Петрокуб има нов мощен спонсор.

title: Еди Хърн предлага на Имане Хелиф да стане професионалист
content: Водещият промоутър и шеф на Matchroom boxing, Еди Хърн не изключва възможността да предложи професионален договор на олимпийската шампионка Имане Хелиф. Участието на алжирката и Лин Ю Тин от Китайско Тайпе предизвика международна буря в Париж, когато стана ясно, че двете са били дисквалифицирани от Международната боксова асоциация (IBA) по време на миналогодишното световно първенство, тъй като не са отговаряли на критериите за допустимост по пол. Въпреки това IBA, която беше изключена от Международния олимпийски комитет (МОК) заради финансови и корупционни съмнения, не успя да предостави никакви доказателства за своите констатации. И на двете беше разрешено да се състезават и те спечелиха златни медали, което допълнително наля масло в огъня. Хърн, който промотира голям брой боксьори, включително бившия световен шампион в тежка категория Антъни Джошуа, не вижда причина Хелиф да не стане професионалист. "Ако беше в положение, в което няма причина този човек да не може да се състезава като жена. Първо, тя е талантлив боец. Второ, от...

title: Никифорчин стал худруком Московского академического симфонического оркестра
content: МОСКВА, 14 авг - РИА Новости. Дирижер Иван Никифорчин стал художественным руководителем Московского государственного академического симфонического оркестра (МГАСО), сменив на посту народного артиста РФ, скрипача и дирижера Павла Когана, сообщила министр культуры России Ольга Любимова. "Новым художественным руководителем одного из старейших симфонических оркестров России назначен Иван Никифорчин — лауреат Первого Международного конкурса пианистов, композиторов и дирижеров имени С. В. Рахманинова", - говорится в Telegram-канале министра. Глава ведомства пожелала новому художественному руководителю успехов, отметив, что он неоднократно выступал с МГАСО и на протяжении последних лет сотрудничал со многими ведущими оркестровыми коллективами страны. Никифорчин - основатель, художественный руководитель и главный дирижер "Академии Русской Музыки", объединяющей камерный оркестр и хор. Он выступает с ведущими оркестровыми коллективами страны. МГАСО был основан в апреле 1943 года. Его первым руководителем стал дирижер Большого театра , народный артист СССР Лев Штейнберг. В разные годы оркестром руководили такие прославленные музыканты, как Николай Аносов, Лео Гинзбург, Михаил Тэриан, Вероника Дударова и Павел Коган.

title: Фермер: Както си продаваш на една верига стоката, така в следващия момент влиза внос от чужбина и цената пада с 1-2 лева
content: © Българинът обича да слага на масата си чесън. Обича го и в таратора, и в пуканите чушки, и в консервите за зимата. Да произвеждаш чесън обаче си има много “лютивина". Основният проблем е липсата на работна ръка, разказва за Агри.БГ Андрей Митов, който вече 6 години отглежда чесън на 26 декара в Драгоман. Трудностите обаче го съпровождат по цялата верига на производство. “Трудностите при производството на чесън са много големи. Това е много скъпа култура. За декар с чесън инвестицията може да стигне от 500 до 1000 лв., докато субсидиите могат да покрият максимално едва 30% от разходите на стопаните", обяснява Андрей Митов. Разказва, че основните вкусови качества на чесъна зависят от мястото, на което се отглеждат и на какви хранителни вещества е богата почвата, на която е настанена култура. Нарастването на главата чесън и лютивината му пък са в пряка зависимост от добавяната сяра в земята. Заради това и китайският чесън е така лют и едър, разкрива тайните земеделският производител. За да има реална печалба един производител на чесън трябва да получи добив, пет пъти по-голям от вложените количества посадъчен материал, разкрива формулата на успеха стопанинът. “Най-изгодният вариант при чесъна е да се реализира на зелено, но там трябва да имаш много работна ръка. Ежедневно са необходими по 5-10 човека работници, които да берат. Освен това, за да има някаква печалба, трябва...

title: Официално: Гьозтепе се подсили с камерунски национал
content: Гьозтепе официално обяви входящия трансфер на камерунския национал Малкъм Бокеле, като по този начин потвърди Gong.bg . 24-годишният бранител пристига от Бордо като свободен агент. Бокеле, който може да играе като централен защитник и десен бек, е бил твърд титуляр за френския тим през последните два сезона. Göztepe’mize hoş geldin Malcom Bokele💛❤ pic.twitter.com/bxDkqmgeki — Göztepe Spor Kulübü (@Goztepe) August 14, 2024 Очаква се скоро да пристигне и нападателят Жуан Сантос от Сао Пауло. В момента Станимир Стоилов и Гьозтепе продължават да се готвят за двубоя с Фенербахче и Жозе Моуриньо в събота.

title: Ukraine's Kursk attack surprised Russia and perhaps some of its backers
creator: The Associated Press
content: BRUSSELS - Ukraine has stolen the battlefield initiative from Russia with its cross-border offensive into the Kursk region. But its Western backers have, for the most part, remained curiously silent about the surprise move. A week on, as Russian forces scrambled to respond to the sneak attack after days of fierce fighting, Ukraine's top military commander said that his troops were in control of 1,000 square kilometers (386 square miles) of territory. The information you need to know, sent directly to you: Download the CTV News App The move also appeared to surprise many of Ukraine's supporters at NATO and the European Union. It's unclear how extensively they were briefed ahead of the offensive, if at all, even though U.S. President Joe Biden insists that he's been kept abreast of developments since. "I've spoken with my staff on a regular basis probably every four or five hours for the last six or eight days," Biden told reporters on Tuesday. The Ukrainian offensive, he said, is "creating a real dilemma for (Russian President Vladimir) Putin." Pressed for more, Biden said only: "That's all I'm going to say about it while it's active." In Brussels, European Commission spokeswoman Nabila Massrali also declined to go into detail, saying that "the European Union is not involved, and is not commenting on, the operational developments on the front line." "We are fully standing...

title: VAC Traffic Signal: ಬೆಂಗ್ಳೂರಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡೋಕೆ ಶುರು ಮಾಡಿದ AI ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌, ಇದರ ಚಿಹ್ನೆಗಳ ಅರ್ಥ ತಿಳಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ!
content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು (ಆ.14): ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು ಹಾಗೂ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಮನಾರ್ಥಕ ಪದಗಳಂತೆ ಆಗಿವೆ. ಅದೆಷ್ಟೇ ಹೊಸ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನ ಬಂದರೂ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಗೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ಮುಕ್ತಿ ನೀಡಲು ಸಾಧ್ಯವಾಗಿಲ್ಲ. ಉತ್ತಮ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್ ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆಗಾಗಿ, ನಗರ ಪೊಲೀಸರು ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಪರಿಣಾಮಕಾರಿಯಾಗಿ ನವೀಕರಣ ಮಾಡಲು ನಿರ್ಧಾರ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇದು ವಾಹನಗಳು ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿ ಚಲನೆ ಮಾಡಲು ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಲಿದೆ. ಈಗ, ಜನದಟ್ಟಣೆಯ ರಸ್ತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ದೀರ್ಘಕಾಲ ಹಸಿರು ಬಣ್ಣದ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಕಾಯುವ ಬದಲು ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು ಈಗ ಎಐ ಚಾಲಿತ ಸ್ಮಾರ್ಟ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಿದೆ. ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನ ಕೆಆರ್ ಮಾರುಕಟ್ಟೆ, ಟೌನ್ ಹಾಲ್ ಮತ್ತು ಕಿಮ್ಸ್ ಬಳಿ, ಸ್ಮಾರ್ಟ್ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್ ಮಾಡ್ಯೂಲ್‌ಗಳು - ವೆಹಿಕಲ್‌ ಆಕ್ಟಿವಿಟಿ ಕಂಟ್ರೋಲ್‌ (ವಿಎಸಿ) ಅನ್ನು ರಿಯಲ್‌ ಟೈಮ್‌ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಪರಿಸ್ಥಿತಿಗೆ ಹೊಂದಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವಂತೆ ವಿನ್ಯಾಸ ಮಾಡಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ಹಿಂದೆ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರೀ ಸೆಟ್‌ ಆಗಿದ್ದ ಟೈಮರ್‌ಗಳು ಇರುತ್ತಿದ್ದವು. ಆ ಸಮಯ ಮುಗಿದ ಬಳಿಕ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳು ಗ್ರೀನ್‌ ಆಗುತ್ತಿದ್ದವು. ಆದರೆ, ಈಗ ಎಐ ಕ್ಯಾಮೆರಾಗಳನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಅಳವಡಿಕೆ ಮಾಡಲಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಇದು ವೆಹಿಕಲ್‌ಗಳ ಚಲನೆಯನ್ನು ಟ್ರ್ಯಾಕ್‌ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ. ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಲವೊಂದು ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಮೂರು ನಿಮಿಷದವರೆಗೆ ನಿಲ್ಲುವಂಥ ಪರಿಸ್ಥಿತಿ ನಿರ್ಮಾಣವಾಗಿದೆ.ಕೆಲವೊಮ್ಮೆ ನೀವು ನಿಂತ ರಸ್ತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ವಾಹನಗಳಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ಹಾಗಿದ್ದರೂ ಕೂಡ ಗ್ರೀನ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗೂ ಬರೋದಕ್ಕೆ ನೀವು ಕಾಯುತ್ತಾ ಇರಬೇಕಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಬೇರೆ ರಸ್ತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ವಾಹನಗಳೇ ಇಲ್ಲದೇ ಇದ್ದರೂ, ಗ್ರೀನ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ ಇದ್ದಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ಆದರೆ, ಈಗ ಬಂದಿರುವ ವ್ಯಾಕ್‌ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳಿಂದ ಈ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ ತಪ್ಪಲಿದೆ. ಈಗ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನ ಟ್ರಾಫಿಕ್‌ ಸಿಗ್ನಲ್‌ಗಳು ಸ್ಮಾರ್ಟ್‌ ಆಗಿದ್ದು, VAC ಎನ್ನುವ ಸಾಲನ್ನು ಪ್ರಕಟ ಮಾಡಲಾಗುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಇದರ ಅರ್ಥ ಏನೆಂದರೆ, VAC...
