USKORO SLEDI POVRATAK NA "KARAĐORĐE" Evo kada će Vojvodina ponovo moći da igra na svom terenu
content: Stadion "Karađorđe" u Novom Sadu će uskoro biti potpuno rekonstruisan. Fudbalski klub Vojvodina obavestio je svoje navijače putem društvenih mreža da su radovi na terenu u završnoj fazi, s postavljenim sistemima za drenažu, grejanje i zalivanje, dok je trenutno u toku postavljanje novog sloja trave. Kako su najavili iz kluba, očekuje se da će teren biti spreman za upotrebu za otprilike mesec dana, što znači da bi prvi susret na obnovljenom terenu mogao biti zakazan za 14. septembar, kada će Vojvodina igrati sa Železničarom. Međutim, obnova trave je samo jedan deo procesa za unapređenje stadiona. Da bi „Karađorđe“ bio spreman za evropske utakmice, potrebno je dodatno renoviranje zapadne tribine, uključujući proširenje konferencijske sale i pres boksova. U međuvremenu, Vojvodina će u četvrtak od 20.00 sati ugostiti Maribor na „TSC areni“, dok će eventualni sledeći protivnici u plej-ofu biti Đurgarden ili Ilves Tampere. Za više sportskih informacija, zapratite našu Fejsbuk stranicu .

title: Unical amplía sus ventas y asistencia en Europa con una nueva oficina en Surrey (Reino Unido)
content: La nueva oficina refuerza la presencia de Unical en Europa, Oriente Medio y África Mejora la prestación de servicios y la atención al cliente en regiones clave Refleja el reciente crecimiento y éxito de Unical en la región, subrayando su compromiso con sus clientes en la región PHOENIX , 14 de agosto de 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Unical Aviation, Inc. (Unical), líder en el mercado aeroespacial comercial de materiales de segunda mano, se complace en anunciar la apertura de una nueva oficina en Surrey, Reino Unido. Esta expansión subraya el compromiso de la empresa de reforzar su presencia en Europa, Oriente Medio y África (EMEA), lo que permite una mejor prestación de servicios y un compromiso más estrecho con el cliente en estos mercados vitales. Situada en la pintoresca localidad de Dorking, en Surrey, la nueva oficina servirá de centro estratégico para las operaciones de ventas y asistencia regional. La nueva oficina reforzará las relaciones con socios y clientes de toda la región EMEA. "Estamos muy contentos de abrir nuestra nueva oficina en Dorking, Surrey. La nueva oficina y la ampliación de nuestro equipo en el Reino Unido demuestran realmente el reciente éxito y crecimiento que hemos experimentado en la región de EMEA y nos sitúa en una excelente posición para prestar un mejor apoyo a nuestros clientes regionales en el futuro, al tiempo que nos permite...

title: Cancillería rusa tacha de terrorismo nuclear el ataque de Kiev con drones a la planta de Zaporozhie
content: "El 11 de agosto, un dron kamikaze atacó la central nuclear de Zaporozhie desde [la ciudad de] Níkopol, controlada por Kiev, en la región de Dnipró (...) Este acto de terrorismo nuclear mostró una vez más la amenaza que representa para el mundo entero el régimen de [Volodímir] Zelenski, incitado por Occidente a aventuras cada vez más criminales, el suministro continuo de armas letales a Kiev y su apoyo financiero regular", subrayó Zajárova. El 11 de agosto, un incendio se desató en una de las torres de refrigeración de la central nuclear tras el impacto directo de dos drones ucranianos, según denunció el gobernador de la región rusa de Zaporozhie, Evgueni Bálitski. El fuego fue extinguido por los equipos del Ministerio de Emergencias ruso. El personal de la planta nuclear aseguró que el siniestro no afectó el funcionamiento de la central. Defensa Central de Zaporozhie denuncia una "amenaza sin precedentes a la seguridad nuclear" tras el ataque 11 de agosto, 22:47 GMT De acuerdo con la nota del Organismo Internacional de Energía Atómica (OIEA), sus expertos tampoco detectaron un aumento de radiación en el área, lo que ya había adelantado antes el gobernador. Según el OIEA, en las fotografías y grabaciones de la parte interior de la torre de refrigeración dañada, sus especialistas identificaron "escombros que hablan de un fuego significativo", pero no...

title: Близкий к Путину миллиардер Герман Хан накануне вторжения в Украину пытался вывести сотни миллионов евро из банков Швейцарии
creator: ru@themoscowtimes.com
content: Поддерживающий «тесные отношения» с Владимиром Путиным миллиардер Герман Хан перед началом полномасштабного вторжения России в Украину вывел $280 млн из швейцарских банков, чтобы избежать европейских санкций, пишет со ссылкой на вердикт Федерального административного суда. Несмотря на то, что судебное решение было обнародовано без указания имен участников процесса, установить их личности удалось на основании содержащейся в документе информации, отмечает издание. В частности, удалось выяснить, что речь идет о российском миллиардере Германе Хане. По данным газеты, за день до начала полномасштабной войны со швейцарского счета Хана был сделан перевод $90 млн на счет его супруги. Несколько дней спустя — 1 марта — миллиардер поручил другому швейцарскому банку перевести еще $110 млн на счет жены, операция была успешно завершена 2 марта. В тот же день российский предприниматель перевел еще $60 млн на швейцарский счет своей дочери. При этом все транзакции были оформлены как подарок. 8 марта Хан собирался «подарить» дочери еще $20 млн, но у него это не вышло из-за банковских ограничений. Чуть позже (12 марта) он «подарил» $20 млн мужу своей дочери. Приложенные усилия, однако, оказались напрасными: швейцарский банк вскоре заблокировал средства на счетах жены и дочери миллиардера, а в начале апреля 2022 года были заблокированы и $20 млн, «подаренные» зятю. Позже муж...

title: NATO BAZA U NEMAČKOJ HITNO ZATVORENA! Baza pod opsadom, dogodio se užasan INCIDENT: SVI SU NA NOGAMA!
content: NATO baza u Nemačkoj , u Gajlenkirhenu je pod opsadom, zbog sumnje da je neko namerno kontaminirao vodu za piće. Baza je zatvorena nedugo nakon što je kasarna Bundesvera kod Kelna bila pod opsadom, takođe zbog sumnje da je neko zatrovao vodu za piće. Kako javlja Bild, trenutno se ispituje da li ima nekih problema sa vodom u NATO bazi . Prema nezvaničnim informacijama, jedna osoba je privedena. Baza takođe ima sopstvenu crpnu stanicu, kao i kasarna u Kelnu, koje su sada zatvorene. Mediji pišu da su na NATO aerodromu Gajlenkirhen stacionirani izviđački avioni. Istovremeno, mediji javljaju da je kod kasarne u Kelnu, gde su se jutros vršile provere, otkrivena rupa u ogradi. Stručnjaci su uzeli uzorke vode, a navodno su u njoj otkrivene abnormalnosti. Počinilac još nije identifikovan. "Sinoć se dogodio incident u kasarni. Zbog ovoga je kasarna zatvorena“, rekao je potpukovnik Ulrih Fonrobert. U istragu su uključeni istražni organi i državna bezbednost, rekao je portparol Ministarstva odbrane. Navode da niko nije povređen. (Kurir.rs/ Telegraf /Preneo: A.N.) Bonus video:

title: Hyundai Centennial - xe 'lãnh đạo' hiếm thấy tại Việt Nam
content: Với những người dùng ưa chuộng những chiếc sedan hạng sang mang phong cách cổ điển, Toyota Crown dường như là một "tượng đài" không thể thay thế. Tuy nhiên, với những người phóng khoáng hơn, những mẫu xe có phong cách tương tự cũng được chú ý, giống như chiếc Hyundai Centennial 2007. Hyundai Centennial mang vẻ đẹp "lãnh đạo" Hyundai Centennial được nhập về Việt Nam với số lượng cực ít, chủ yếu để phục vụ cho các hội nghị lãnh đạo cấp quốc tế. Mẫu xe này nằm trên mẫu Hyundai XG300 một bậc, cùng phân khúc các dòng xe Mercedes-Benz S-Class hay BMW 7-Series, nhưng có giá bán mềm hơn. Dù vậy, mẫu xe này vẫn có sức hút nhờ phong cách thiết kế khá giống Toyota Crown. So với Crown, Hyundai Centennial mới mẻ hơn do được sản xuất trong những năm 2000, trong khi mẫu xe của Nhật Bản đa phần sản xuất trong những năm 1990. Do đó, Centennial nổi bật với trang bị tiện nghi phong phú hơn nhưng vẫn đáp ứng được phong cách cổ điển, đúng nghĩa của một chiếc xe mang tầm "lãnh đạo". Xe có chiều dài ngang ngửa Merecdes-Benz S-Class Hyundai Centennial chính là thế hệ tiền nhiệm của mẫu Equus sau này, đời xe 2007 cũng rất hiếm khi bắt gặp trên...

title: '골 때리는 그녀들' 불나비, 탑걸에 2-1 승리...채연 선제골ᆞ김보경 선전
creator: 한은수 (online@etoday.co.kr)
한은수
content: 불나비가 탑걸에 2-1 승리를 거뒀다. 14일 방송된 SBS ‘골 때리는 그녀들’에서는 슈퍼리그 B조 탑걸FC과 불나비FC의 경기가 펼쳐졌다. 이날 양 팀은 막상막하의 플레이로 초반부터 치열한 경기를 선보였다. 특이 이전 시즌에서 탑걸의 감독이었던 최진철이 이번 시즌부터 불나비의 감독이 되면서 양 팀의 신경전은 더욱 거셌다. 경기 시작 전반 6분까지 골이 터지지 않은 상황에서 드디어 선제골이 터졌다. 주인공은 불나비의 채연이었다. 볼은 막 교체 투입된 한초임을 시작으로 이승연과 강보람을 지나 골문 앞에 있던 채연의 발을 통해 탑걸의 골망을 흔들었다. 특히 경기를 뛰고 있는 네 명의 선수를 모두 터치한 뒤 터진 골로 불나비의 팀웍을 입증했다. 하지만 탑걸도 가만히 있지만은 않았다. 전반 11분, 탑걸의 에이스 김보경은 하프라인 아래에서부터 볼을 끌고 간 뒤 그대로 중거리 슛을 만들며 스코어를 1-1 동점으로 만들었다. 원점에서 시작한 후반에서 탑걸의 핸드볼 반칙이 나왔다. 프리킥 상황에서 강보람이 키커로 나섰지만, 이를 막던 중 또다시 탑걸의 핸드볼 반칙이 나오면서 페널티킥이 주어졌다. 키커로 나선 강보람이 골에 성공하면서 후반 1분 만에 스코어는 2-1이 됐다. 후반은 지키려는 자와 뚫으려는 자의 치열한 대결로 이어졌다. 좀처럼 추가 골이 나오지 않는 상황에서 선수들의 체력까지 떨어지며 처절한 경기가 계속됐다....

title: De‘Longhi-Ausverkauf bei Amazon mit hohen Rabatten auf Kaffeevollautomaten
creator: Ömer Kayali
content: De‘Longhi-Ausverkauf bei Amazon mit hohen Rabatten auf Kaffeevollautomaten Auf der Suche nach einer neuen Kaffeemaschine? Bei Amazon erhalten Sie zurzeit Rabatt auf verschiedene Modelle von De‘Longhi. Ein Kaffeevollautomat bietet eine bequeme Lösung für alle Kaffeeliebhaber. Damit bekommen Sie einen frisch gebrühten Kaffee auf Knopfdruck. Je nach Modell sind verschiedene Getränke und Zubereitungsarten verfügbar. Sie können zudem beispielsweise Brühtemperatur und Mahlgrad einstellen und Ihren Kaffee Ihren Vorlieben entsprechend zubereiten. De‘Longhi gehört zu den führenden Herstellern für Kaffeemaschinen. Die italienische Marke hat einen hervorragenden Ruf und schneidet zudem in Tests gut ab. Bei Amazon finden Sie derzeit mehrere De‘Longhi-Kaffeevollautomaten vergünstigt. De‘Longhi-Angebote bei Amazon in der Übersicht Amazon hat mehrere Kaffeevollautomaten vergünstigt. Sie können bei den Angeboten über 100 Euro sparen. Nachfolgend sind die aktuellen De‘Longhi-Deals aufgelistet: Die Angebote sind auf unbestimmte Zeit verfügbar. Typischerweise ändern sich die Preise bei Amazon allerdings nach einer Weile. Daher lohnt es sich zuzuschlagen, wenn Sie ein für Sie attraktives Angebot entdecken. Im Sommer ist Ihnen Eiskaffee lieber? Diesen können Sie auch mit herkömmlichen Kaffeevollautomaten selbst zubereiten. Bestimmte Modelle können das aber für Sie...

title: CV Ananda Bose: এটা সমগ্র বাংলার লজ্জা, আরজি কর কাণ্ডে মন্তব্য রাজ্য রাজ্যপাল সিভি আনন্দ বোসের
content: আরজি কর মেডিকেল কলেজ ও হাসপাতালে (RG Kar Medical College and Hospital) য় বুধবার তদন্তের দায়িত্বভার নিল সিবিআই। এদিন সকালে এসেই কলকাতা পুলিশের থেকে মূল অভিযুক্তকে হস্তান্তর করা হয় সিবিআই হেফাজতে। অন্যদিকে আজ থেকে প্রতিবাদে নেমেছে রাজ্যের বুদ্ধিজীবীরা। সেই সঙ্গে রাজ্যের বিভিন্ন প্রান্তে বিক্ষোভ মিছিলে সামিল হয়েছেন অসংখ্য যুবক-যুবতী। এমনকী এই ঘটনা নিয়ে এবার সরব রাজ্যপাল সিভি আনন্দ বোস (CV Ananda Bose)। তিনি বলেন, আরজি কর হাসপাতালের ঘটনা অত্যন্ত নির্মম ও ভয়াবহ। এটা বাংলা তো বটেই গোটা দেশের জন্য লজ্জাজনক ঘটনা। রাজ্য সরকারকে এই ঘটনার দায় নিতে হবে এবং সকল রাজ্যবাসীকে এর বিরুদ্ধে প্রতিবাদ করতে হবে। রাজ্যপাল আরও বলেন, "যাঁর সঙ্গে এরকম ঘটনা ঘটেছে তিনি কারোর মেয়ে বা বোন বা দিদি। আর বিগত কয়েকদিনে এই ধরনের ঘটনা আমাদের রাজ্যে হামেশাই হচ্ছে। এই ধরনের ঘটনাগুলি কেন বন্ধ হচ্ছে না বাংলায়। এই বাংলার স্বপ্ন দেখেছিলেন কবিগুরু রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুর? যিনি বলেছিলেন 'চিত্ত যেথা ভয় শূণ্য উচ্চ যেথা শিড়'। এই সমস্ত ঘটনার নিরপেক্ষ বিচার হওয়া উচিত। স্বামী বিবেকানন্দ বলেছিলেন, 'ওঠো, জাগো লক্ষ্যে না পৌঁছানো পর্যন্ত থেমে থেকো না', ফলে এর বিচার না হওয়া পর্যন্ত রাজ্যবাসীর প্রতিবাদে সামিল থাকা উচিত"। Watch: Governor of West Bengal C. V. Ananda Bose says on RG Kar Medical College and Hospital rape-murder incident says, "...It is a shame on entire Bengal, it's a shame to India, shame to humanity...This is not the first time...Government has to take the responsibility all state... — IANS...

title: Mangal Gochar: ୪୫ ଦିନ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଏହି ସବୁ ରାଶିର ବଢିବ ରୋଜଗାର, ହାତେଇବେ ସଫଳତା
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: ମଙ୍ଗଳ ୨୬ ଅଗଷ୍ଟରେ ମିଥୁନରେ ଚଳନ କରିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ଏଠାରେ ୪୫ ଦିନ ଅବସ୍ଥାନ କରିବେ। ଏପରି ପରିସ୍ଥିତିରେ, ଜନମାଷ୍ଟମୀ ଅର୍ଥାତ୍ ୨୬ ଅଗଷ୍ଟ ପରେ ୫ଟି ରାଶିର ଭାଗ୍ୟ ବଦଳିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ତାଙ୍କ ଭାଗ୍ୟ ଉଦୟ ହେବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ମଙ୍ଗଳ ଆଗାମୀ ୪୫ ଦିନ ଅର୍ଥାତ୍ ଅଗଷ୍ଟ ୨୬ ରୁ ଅକ୍ଟୋବର ୨୦ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ମିଥୁନରେ ରହିବେ। ଅକ୍ଟୋବର ୨୦ରେ ମଙ୍ଗଳ ମିଥୁନରୁ Mangal Gochar: ମଙ୍ଗଳ ୨୬ ଅଗଷ୍ଟରେ ମିଥୁନରେ ଚଳନ କରିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ଏଠାରେ ୪୫ ଦିନ ଅବସ୍ଥାନ କରିବେ। ଏପରି ପରିସ୍ଥିତିରେ, ଜନମାଷ୍ଟମୀ ଅର୍ଥାତ୍ ୨୬ ଅଗଷ୍ଟ ପରେ ୫ଟି ରାଶିର ଭାଗ୍ୟ ବଦଳିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ତାଙ୍କ ଭାଗ୍ୟ ଉଦୟ ହେବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ମଙ୍ଗଳ ଆଗାମୀ ୪୫ ଦିନ ଅର୍ଥାତ୍ ଅଗଷ୍ଟ ୨୬ ରୁ ଅକ୍ଟୋବର ୨୦ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ମିଥୁନରେ ରହିବେ। ଅକ୍ଟୋବର ୨୦ରେ ମଙ୍ଗଳ ମିଥୁନରୁ ବାହାରି କର୍କଟ ରାଶିକୁ ଗତି କରିବେ। ଜ୍ୟୋତିଷ ଶାସ୍ତ୍ରରେ ମଙ୍ଗଳକୁ ଗ୍ରହ ମାନଙ୍କର କମାଣ୍ଡର କୁହାଯାଏ। ତେଣୁ ମଙ୍ଗଳ ଗ୍ରହର ଏହି ଚଳନ ମେଷ, ବୃଷ ସହିତ ୫ଟି ରାଶିର ଜୀବନରେ ପ୍ରଗତି, ଆର୍ଥିକ ଲାଭ ଏବଂ ଅନେକ ସୁଖ ଆଣିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛି। ଆସନ୍ତୁ ଜାଣିବା କେଉଁ ରାଶି ପାଇଁ ବୁଧ ଗ୍ରହର ରାଶି ଚିହ୍ନ ମିଥୁନରେ ମଙ୍ଗଳ ଗ୍ରହର ଗମନାଗମନ ଶୁଭ ହେବ। ମେଷ ରାଶି ମଙ୍ଗଳ ମେଷ ରାଶିର ତୃତୀୟ ଘରକୁ ଚଳନ କରିବେ। ଏହି ସମୟ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ତୁମେ ତୁମର ସାହସର ବୃଦ୍ଧି ଦେଖିବାକୁ ପାଇବେ। ଆପଣ ମଧ୍ୟ ନିଜ ପରିବାର ସହିତ ଏକ ଭଲ ସମୟ ଅତିବାହିତ କରିବେ। ଭାଇଭଉଣୀଙ୍କଠାରୁ ସହଯୋଗ ପାଇବେ।ଏହି ଅବଧି ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଆପଣ ଏକାସାଙ୍ଗରେ ଅନେକ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କରିବାକୁ ସମର୍ଥ ହେବେ। ଆପଣ ଏଥିରୁ ମଧ୍ୟ ଲାଭ ପାଇବେ। ବୃଷ ରାଶି ବୃଷର ଦ୍ୱିତୀୟ ଘରକୁ ଚଳନ କରିବେ ମଙ୍ଗଳ । ଦ୍ୱିତୀୟ ଘରେ ମଙ୍ଗଳ ଗ୍ରହର ଚଳନ ଯୋଗୁଁ ଆୟରେ ବୃଦ୍ଧି ହେବ। ଏଥିସହ, ଆପଣ ଏହି ସମୟ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଆପଣଙ୍କ ପରିବାର ସହିତ ବହୁତ ସମୟ ଅତିବାହିତ କରିବେ। ଆପଣ ନିଜ ପରିବାର ସହିତ ବହୁତ ଗୁଣାତ୍ମକ ସମୟ ବିତାଇବାକୁ ଯାଉଛନ୍ତି। ଏହି ସମୟ ମଧ୍ୟରେ, ଆପଣ ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଆୟର ଉତ୍ସ...

title: El nuevo look de Chiquito Romero para jugar la Copa con Cruzeiro
content: El Mundo Boca se prepara para una serie de octavos de final que será trascendental. Los jugadores, el cuerpo técnico, los dirigentes y los hinchas son conscientes de la importancia que significaría conquistar la Copa Sudamericana y volver a estar en lo más alto en el plano internacional, además de obtener el boleto directo -sin escalas- a la próxima Copa Libertadores. Y Sergio Romero lo sabe más que nadie, por eso, renovó su look capilar en vísperas del partido ante Cruzeiro. ¿Le dará suerte? El arquero xeneize acostumbra a cambiar de look con frecuencia, principalmente su corte de pelo, el cual se lo ha visto de varios colores durante su estadía en Boca. Pero en esta ocasión, dejó los claritos que había mostrado en los últimos partidos para meterle un platinado más furioso. Al arquero de 38 años le pasaron brocha y tintura en el pelo y le quedó platinado. Pero esta no es la primera vez que se tiñe el cabello con ese tono gris metálico, ya lo había hecho con anterioridad e incluso vistiendo los colores azul y oro. Lo cierto, es que volvió a cambiar su look una vez más, en la previa del encuentro de ida por los octavos de final ante el conjunto brasileño, que se disputará este jueves a las 21:30, en la Bombonera . Sergio Romero es sin ninguna duda un héroe sin capa en el Xeneize. Los penales son su zona de confort, y ha salvado a su equipo en...

title: All eligible North Carolina hospitals in debt relief plan
content: (The Center Square) – Gov. Roy Cooper announced on Monday that all 99 of the state’s eligible hospitals have agreed to participate in a medical relief program. First announced on July 1, the program will forgive up to $4 billion in medical debt for as many as 2 million North Carolinians. “Unlike most debts, medical debt is not a choice. People don’t choose to have accidents, cancer or heart attacks. This plan helps eliminate medical debt for low to moderate-income people in North Carolina,” Cooper, a Democrat, said in a statement . He added that he believes this program will be critical for families. “This first-in-the-nation program will make a difference in the lives of families across the state,” Cooper said. Hospitals must opt into the program to receive an “enhanced level of payment” through the Healthcare Access and Stabilization Program, which was approved by lawmakers last year. If any hospitals had declined , they would have just received a base level of payment for Medicaid reimbursement. The hospitals are required to partner with organizations like Undue Medical Debt to “facilitate full implementation of medical debt relief over the next two years.” This program, and the Medicaid expansion which was passed at the same time, will allow the state to draw more than $8 billion each year from the federal government. Kody Kinsley, director of the state Department of...

title: Zwangsarbeit: So profitierte Bahlsen vom NS-Regime
creator: Simon Benne
content: Arbeitskräfte aus dem Osten: Ukrainische Frauen wurden während des Krieges auch in der Keksfabrik Bahlsen zur Zwangsarbeit herangezogen. Quelle: dc3 Hannover Wehrmachtaufträge und Zwangsarbeit: Eine 600 Seiten starke Studie belegt jetzt, wie Keksproduzent Bahlsen von der NS-Diktatur profitierte – die Firma versuchte sogar, Hitler persönlich als Werbefigur zu nutzen.

title: Jets star RB opens up about Aaron Rodgers' reputation
creator: Zac Wassink, Yardbarker
content: Handfuls of critics and analysts have called quarterback Aaron Rodgers a "distraction," "selfish" and "self-centered" for a variety of reasons throughout his tenure with the New York Jets that began in April 2023. During a Tuesday appearance on New York sports radio station WFAN, Jets running back Breece Hall opened up about Rodgers' reputation and his working relationship with the future Hall of Famer. "Just knowing how much he values his teammates and this brotherhood we have, you get a whole different outlook on him," Hall said about Rodgers, as Ryan Chichester of Audacy shared. "Just being around him and knowing how much he values us and his relationship with us, and knowing the high standard he holds himself to." Rodgers played just four meaningful snaps before he went down with a season-ending Achilles tear in New York's Week 1 win last September. Since then, the 40-year-old has routinely generated headlines for sharing conspiracy theories during interviews, for his links to independent 2024 presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and his decision to skip the Jets' two-day mandatory minicamp in June so he could travel to Egypt. On Tuesday, Rodgers made it clear that he understands fans expect the 2024 Jets to, at the very least, end what's become the longest active playoff drought in the four major North American sports leagues. Hall indicated others inside the...

title: خرید موتور برق با شرایط ویژه
content: به گزارش ایسنا به نقل از موتور برق دات کام، برای مشاهده انواع موتور برق بنزینی، دیزلی ، سایلنت از این صفحه فرمایید. برای دریافت مشاوره فنی با شماره های ذیل تماس بگیرید. حتی ممکن است فروشگاه یا دفتر کارتان به دلیل قطعی برق، فعالیت‌ های خود را متوقف کند و خسارت سنگینی را تجربه کنید. این لحظات ناخوشایند به راحتی با داشتن یک موتور برق قابل اعتماد، از بین خواهند رفت و شما دیگر با این مشکل مواجه نخواهید شد. موتور برق به شما این امکان را می‌ دهد که در مواقع اضطراری و قطعی برق، بدون هیچ نگرانی همچنان به استفاده از وسایل برقی خود ادامه دهید. در شرایط اضطراری مانند طوفان‌ها یا حوادث طبیعی، موتور برق می‌ تواند منبع انرژی پایدار برای شما و خانواده‌تان باشد، که از خاموشی خانه و خطرات ناشی از آن جلوگیری می‌ کند. برای کسب‌ وکارها، داشتن یک موتور برق می‌ تواند از توقف کارها و ضررهای مالی جلوگیری کند. مثلاً فروشگاه‌ها می‌ توانند یخچال‌ها و سیستم‌ های امنیتی خود را همچنان روشن نگه دارند. اگر به کمپینگ یا سفرهای خارج از شهر علاقه‌ مند هستید، موتور برق می‌ تواند منبع انرژی قابل حمل و مطمئنی برای روشنایی، پخت و پز و شارژ دستگاه‌های الکترونیکی شما باشد. برخلاف تصورات عمومی، موتور برق های مدرن با مصرف سوخت کم و بازدهی بالا، می‌ توانند یک سرمایه‌ گذاری اقتصادی و مقرون به صرفه باشند. یکی از برندهای مطرح در زمینه موتور برق، برند لانسین است که شما با خیال راحت و بدون هیچگونه دغدغه ای می توانید از موتور برق های آن استفاده کرده و نگران کیفیت و قدرت آنها نباشید. موتور برق ۱۰۰۰۰ لانسین یکی از تولیدی های...

title: Tatilin tadını çıkarıyor
content: Habertürk 'ten Eren Gürel'in haberine göre; Şarkıcı Mustafa Sandal'ın, 2022'de evlendiği Melis Sütşurup, önceki gün Türkbükü'nde görüntülendi. Gittiği beach'te mavi bikinisiyle boy gösteren Sütşurup, tatilin tadını çıkarmaya devam etti. Mustafa Sandal'ın işleri nedeniyle eşinin yanında olamadığı öğrenildi. Şifre yenileme bağlantısını gönderebilmemiz için e-posta adresinize ihtiyacımız var. Şifreniz eposta@email.com adresine başarıyla gönderildi. Lütfen gelen kutunuzu veya spam (önemsiz) klasörünü kontrol edin.

title: В Новой Зеландии нашли наркотики в леденцах от благотворителей
content: Благотворительная организация Auckland City Mission сообщила , что в некоторые посылки с продуктами для бездомных попали леденцы, содержащие метамфетамин. Информация об этом появилась на сайте миссии. «Получатель посылки сообщил, что у него были леденцы «со странным вкусом». Тесты подтвердили, что проверенные леденцы содержали потенциально смертельные дозы метамфетамина», — говорится в публикации. Как уточнил Новозеландский фонд по борьбе с наркотиками, который проводил экспертизу, в одном леденце содержалось около 3 г вещества — около 300 доз наркотика. В пресс-службе рассказали, что ананасовые леденцы марки Rinda пожертвовал неизвестный. Они были в запечатанной упаковке — только такие принимает организация для дальнейшей отправки. Пресс-служба принесла извинения и сообщила, что связывается с теми, кто мог получить посылку. CBS News со ссылкой на полицию пишет , что в больницу из-за конфет попали ребенок, подросток и работник благотворительной организации. Все находятся в стабильном состоянии, последнего уже выписали. Для контрабанды наркотиков нередко используют подобные способы маскировки, в организацию они могли попасть случайно, отмечает канал.

title: Opinión | TikTok: la revolución del marketing turístico
content: La autora reflexiona sobre como la red social china se ha convertido en una nueva herramienta tanto para promocionar destinos y actividades, como para organizar viajes. Un video viral en TikTok puede impulsar significativamente el turismo en una región específica, beneficiando tanto a empresas locales como restaurantes, hoteles y servicios. En plenas vacaciones de verano, TikTok se ha convertido en una herramienta para la planificación de escapadas y viajes, transformando de manera innegable como las personas descubren y eligen sus destinos vacacionales. Del entretenimiento a la información En un mundo liderado por las redes sociales, las tendencias cambian a un ritmo vertiginoso. TikTok ha irrumpido con fuerza gracias a su formato de vídeos cortos y dinámicos, conquistando a millones de usuarios. Las marcas no han tardado en reconocer su potencial, convirtiéndolo en una plataforma clave para el marketing turístico. Esta red, con capacidad para promover el descubrimiento de contenido relevante, ha creado una experiencia única para los viajeros, desde playas paradisíacas hasta destinos muy cerca de casa y completamente desconocidos. Pero, ¿Cómo es que una plataforma diseñada para entretenimiento se ha convertido en una guía de viajes esencial? La respuesta radica en su capacidad para ofrecer información auténtica y actualizada, visualmente atractiva y accesible....

title: Parsi New Year 2024 Special Food Ideas: Patra Ni Machhi, Parsi Ravo and Sali Boti – Authentic Dishes To Enjoy the Festival Navroz
content: Parsi New Year, celebrated according to the Shehenshahi calendar, falls on August 15, 2024. This calendar is one of the two main Zoroastrian calendars used by the Parsi community, The Shehenshahi New Year is known for its significance in reflecting the ancient Zoroastrian tradition and reconnecting with the community's historical roots. As you observe Parsi New Year 2024, we at have compiled a collection of five traditional Parsi dishes commonly enjoyed during the celebration. Celebrations for the Shehenshahi New Year typically involve a blend of religious and cultural practices. Parsis attend prayers and ceremonies at fire temples, where they seek blessings for the coming year. Families prepare festive meals, often including traditional dishes such as Dhansak (a flavourful lentil and meat stew), and engage in communal gatherings. The day is marked by exchanging well-wishes and gifts and enjoying a festive atmosphere that strengthens community bonds and celebrates the enduring legacy of Zoroastrian traditions. . This is a rich, hearty stew made with lentils, vegetables, and meat (often lamb or chicken), flavoured with a blend of spices. It's served with rice and is a central dish in Parsi feasts, symbolizing prosperity and communal spirit. A flavourful dish made from tender chunks of meat, usually lamb, cooked in a spicy gravy and topped with crispy potato sticks (sail). It...

title: NRDC Report: Climate Law to Slash Power Sector Emissions
creator: NRDC
content: WASHINGTON, D.C. — The climate legislation and pollution standards adopted during the Biden administration have put the U.S. power sector on track to make unprecedented progress in cutting carbon dioxide emissions. The power sector is now on track for a 65 percent cut by 2030 in carbon emissions from 2005 — and an 80 percent cut by 2040, according to the new analysis — Powering Ahead: How Biden Administration Policies Are Delivering Cleaner Electricity and Climate Progress . “The actions taken by the Biden administration are bearing fruit, as we accelerate the move toward clean, affordable electricity,” said Amanda Levin , director of policy analysis at NRDC and author of the new study. “We need to build on this progress in order to create a real clean energy economy.” This new analysis compares power sector modeling now to our forecast two years ago before the passage of the Inflation Reduction Act and the completion of Environmental Protection Agency standards for carbon emissions from power plants and vehicles. Following these actions by Congress and the Biden administration, emissions will be two-thirds lower in 2030 than what was forecast back in 2022, this new analysis shows. This is notable because the new modeling also takes into account the dramatic expected growth in electricity demand from new factories, data centers and electric vehicles, as well as updated costs...

title: 장가현, 47세 나이 잊게 만든 비키니 자태 "20대인 줄"
creator: 김현희 기자
content: [스포츠한국 김현희 기자] 배우 장가현이 20대 같은 비주얼을 자랑했다. 장가현은 13일 SNS에 수영장을 찾아 찍은 사진과 영상을 올렸다. 그는 빨간색 비키니를 입고 선베드에 앉아 늘씬한 몸매를 뽐냈다. 군살 하나 없이 매끈하면서도 볼륨감 넘친 몸매로 47세 나이를 잊게 했다. 팬들은 “미모가 20대인 줄요. 동안 미모네요” “너무 멋지십니다” “20년 전 행사장에서 본 그대로네요” 등의 반응을 보였다. 한편 장가현은 1998년 영화 ‘조용한 가족’으로 데뷔했으며 드라마 ‘청담동 스캔들’ ‘황홀한 이웃’ ‘청춘기록’ ‘킬힐’ 등에 출연했다.

title: Платформа VK Видео представила новые функции и редизайн сервиса
content: Платформа VK Видео представила новые функции и редизайн. Среди новинок обновлённый раздел подписок, отложенный просмотр и управление уведомлениями, рассказали в пресс-службе VK. Дизайн обновился как в приложении, так и в веб-версии. Так, лента «Продолжить просмотр» переместилась на главный экран, появилась возможность добавлять видео в список «Смотреть позже» и управлять уведомлениями. Редизайн раздела «Подписки» теперь даст возможность пользователям ещё быстрее находить ролики. Кроме того, стало проще продолжить просмотр видео, отметили в пресс-службе. В веб-версии VK Видео появилась функция «Продолжить просмотр». Благодаря ей пользователям больше не нужно заходить в раздел истории просмотров, так как видео, которые не были досмотрены, появятся в главной ленте. 13 августа VK запустила новый бесплатный и учеников — VK Tutoria. Занятия могут проходить как в мобильной, так и в веб-версии сервиса. Авторизация на платформе будет происходить с помощью VK ID.

title: ХАМАС: сопротивление на Западном берегу должно усилиться
content: В заявлении движения ХАМАС говорится: "Мы выражаем соболезнования в связи с гибелью пяти палестинцев в Тубасе и призываем палестинский народ встать за вариант сопротивления для противодействия планам оккупационного режима против нашей земли и святынь". В заявлении ХАМАС также отмечается: "Усиление агрессии армии оккупационного режима против городов и лагерей на Западном берегу является подтверждением продолжения преступных планов экстремистского кабинета этого режима против оккупированного Западного берега. Поэтому мы призываем наше героическое сопротивление и революционную молодежь на оккупированном Западном берегу активизировать операции против оккупантов и поселенцев повсюду, чтобы они покинули нашу землю". Утром сегодня информационные источники сообщили о столкновении палестинских боевиков с солдатами израильского режима в поселке Тамюн, расположенном рядом с городом Тубас на Западном берегу, в результате чего погибло пять палестинских граждан.

title: Mumbai court refuses to close INS Vikrant fund misuse case against BJP’s Kirit Somaiya, son
creator: Scroll Staff
content: A Mumbai court has refused to close a case against Bharatiya Janata Party leader Kirit Somaiya and his son Neil for allegedly misappropriating Rs 57 crore of funds collected from the public for refurbishing Indian Naval Ship Vikrant, the Hindustan Times reported on Tuesday. The closure report filed by Mumbai Police’s Economic Offence Wing was rejected by the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate SP Shinde of the Esplanade Metropolitan Magistrate Court on August 8. The rejection came after the court observed that while drives to collect the funds had been undertaken at various locations, the investigating officer had only looked into the one outside the Churchgate railway station, the Hindustan Times reported. The officer had also not ascertained what had happened with the collected funds, said the court, and ordered the case to be investigated further , The Indian Express reported. title: Paris Olympics singe CAE profits as demand for pilot training drops
content: MONTREAL — CAE Inc.’s chief executive says demand for pilot training dropped in its latest quarter, due in part to lower travel volumes to Europe because of the Paris Olympics. CEO Marc Parent told analysts on a conference call Wednesday that the Olympic Games as well as the Euro Cup “altered normal travel behavior.” Carriers including Air Canada, Delta Air Lines and Air France all reported that the summer games hurt their seasonal sales, as travellers opted to steer clear of France, where parts of central Paris were closed off for the duration of the event. CAE, which makes flight simulators and trains commercial pilots, says an even bigger factor in its 26 per cent year-over-year profit drop in the quarter ended June 30 was a general decrease in short-term demand. Parent says that delays at plane manufacturers such as Boeing Co. have pushed back fleet expansion and pilot training at some airlines, while others have at last filled the hiring gap caused by the travel rebound after the COVID-19 pandemic. For this fiscal year, CAE’s civil segment is forecasting operating income growth of about 10 per cent, slightly lower than previous expectations. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Aug. 14, 2024. Companies in this story: (TSX:CAE) The Canadian Press

title: Yunan medyası Atina yakınlarında çıkan orman yangınları için hükümeti suçladı
content: Yunanistan son yılların en kötü orman yangınlarından biriyle sarsılmaya devam ederken muhalefet üyeleri ve ülkedeki bazı yayın organları suçu Yunanistan'ın merkez sağ Yeni Demokrasi hükümetine attı. Ülkenin ana muhalefet partisi Radikal Sol Koalisyon (SYRİZA) hükümetten yangının "Atina'nın kentsel dokusuna nasıl ulaştığı" konusunda yanıt vermesini ve ülkenin itfaiye teşkilatının etkinliğini gözden geçirmesini talep etti. Yunan yayın kuruluşu Skai'ye göre SYRİZA, alevlerle mücadeleye katılan uçaklardan GPS verilerinin yanı sıra Sivil Koruma Kurumu tarafından Pazartesi günü koordine edilen bir toplantının tutanaklarını da istedi. Salı günü, bir kadının ölümüne ve Yunanistan'ın başkentinin hemen kuzeydoğusunda 400 kilometrekarelik bir alanın yok olmasına neden olan orman yangınlarının üçüncü günüydü. Kuvvetli rüzgarlar ana yangının salı günü itibarıyla sönmesine yol açmış olsa da, itfaiye teşkilatı hala yüzlerce küçük yangınla mücadele ettiklerini bildirdi. İnsanların evlerine doğru hızla ilerleyen yangın, ülke medyasının hükümetin krizi ele alış biçimini eleştirmesine de neden oldu. Yangının ertesi sabahı Ta Nea gazetesi birinci sayfasında "Yeter artık" ifadelerine yer verdi. title: Niente telefono, niente pisolino, niente acqua: cos'è questa nuova moda del "raw dogging" sui voli
content: Per la maggior parte di noi, un volo a lunga percorrenza è qualcosa da cercare di abbreviare dedicandosi ai bisogni più primari. Con il tempo che scorre lento e la vita che si riduce a mangiare, bere, dormire, andare in bagno e intrattenersi, la maggior parte di noi vuole solo soddisfare le proprie esigenze nel miglior modo possibile. Ma una nuova categoria di viaggiatori ci sta mostrando che c'è un altro modo: il raw dogging . Nel caso vi foste imbattuti nei video di giovani uomini che guardano intensamente davanti a sé in aereo, vi spieghiamo di cosa si tratta... In effetti, è praticamente tutto qui. Questa nuova moda, o piuttosto sfida, richiede di trascorrere un intero viaggio in aereo facendo una sola cosa: fissare il sedile di fronte o, se se si è fortunati, una mappa di bordo. Niente musica, niente film, snack o bevande. E, nella sua forma più estrema, nessuna pausa bagno. Chi è che fa il raw-dog sui voli? Erling Haaland , un 24enne norvegese meglio conosciuto per le sue prodezze calcistiche, è tra coloro che hanno trasformato il raw-dogging sui voli in una sorta di competizione . L'attaccante del Manchester City ha recentemente provato questa "tecnica" di viaggio, scrivendo su Instagram di aver sopportato un volo di sette ore "senza telefono, senza sonno, senza acqua, senza cibo" e di averlo trovato "facile" . All'inizio del mese un uomo ha postato su...

creator: Jennifer Allen
content: Garlic, chocolate, watermelon and sage are among the wild and wacky flavors taking over the craft beer scene. What do these flavors all have in common? They're unusual and delicious, and there's more where these came from. Whether a seasoned beer enthusiast or someone curious about the world of craft brewing, unusual craft beer flavors promise a fresh perspective. Read on if you're curious about the newest flavor trends in craft beers and tips for how to microbrew them at home. Evolution of craft brewing The craft beer scene has transformed over the past few decades. What began as a niche and untapped market has become a vibrant and experimental industry. This evolution has supported the emergence of bizarre flavors, reflecting the adventurous spirit of modern brewers. Moreover, bringing the micro-brewing process home has never been easier thanks to the advent of home brewing kits. While craft brewing was initially taken up by small, independent breweries, as home brewing kits became more accessible, more people can now experiment at home . As homebrewers brought fresh ideas and bold flavors to the table, pilot testing ingredients ranging from their personal favorites to cultural staples, breweries had to start pushing the bounds of their beers. Today's competitive industry, fueled by home brewers' innovation, makes standing out more important than ever. Brewers are constantly...

Eugènie Herlaar, eerste vrouwelijke presentator NOS Journaal, overleden
creator: Edwin van der Aa
content: Herlaar werd op 10 november 1939 geboren op Curaçao en woonde daar tot haar achtste. Ze kon als kind al foutloos teksten voorlezen en sprak Nederlands zonder accent. Op de leeftijd van vier klonk de stem van Herlaar al door de ether in een kinderprogramma op de Curaçaose radio. Na een baan bij de Wereldomroep als presentator solliciteerde ze in 1965 bij het Journaal. Herlaar zond een brief aan de toenmalig hoofdredacteur, met de vraag waarom er geen vrouwenstem in het Journaal zat. Ze kreeg een brief terug met het antwoord dat een goede vrouwenstem weliswaar gewenst, maar niet voorhanden was. Herlaar kreeg een uitnodiging voor een screentest en werd aangenomen. Zo werd ze, zonder dat het haar intentie was, een boegbeeld voor emancipatie. Eenmaal per week las Herlaar het nieuws voor, in een tijd dat vrouwen daar volgens de publieke opinie niet geschikt voor werden geacht, op andere werkdagen verzorgde ze reportages. ,,Als vrouw bij actualiteitenrubriek was ik kennelijk een bezienswaardigheid”, vertelt Herlaar daar jaren later over in een interview. ,,‘t Toetje van het Journaal werd ik genoemd. Dat zou nu niet meer kunnen, maar dat was een heel andere tijd.” Feit is dat ze de allereerste vrouw van Nederland was die een actualiteitenprogramma presenteerde. Een pionier of ‘doorbraakvrouw’ was ze. Lees verder onder de foto Nadat ze een kind kreeg moest Herlaar uit vaste dienst,...

title: Inflation below three percent for the first time since 2021, CPI report shows
creator: The Independent
content: has dropped below three percent , according to figures from the Bureau of Labor Statistics. Annual inflation in July was 2.9 percent, when prices increased following the effects of the -19 pandemic. to ease the pressures on the economy. A measure that removes more erratic categories like food and energy had the smallest increase over the course of 12 months since April 2021 – “Core” prices increased 0.2 percent on a monthly basis and 3.2 percent compared to a year ago. The Labor Department’s Bureau of Labor Statistics said on Wednesday that the consumer price index increased 0.2 percent last month after decreasing by 0.1 percent in June. The new numbers were mostly close to what analysts expected and may lead to officials at the central bank agreeing to cut interest rates during their policy meeting next month. Officials have said for months that borrowing costs won’t be eased until they’re sure inflation is decreasing to normal levels and they’re now increasingly recognizing that there are risks of having interest rates remain high for too long. Hiring has already slowed and the global markets are concerned that the Federal Reserve may have put too much pressure on the economy, Housing remains the main driver of inflation, accounting for almost 90 percent of the monthly rise. On a month-to-month basis, rents rose by 0.5 percent, compared to a rise of 0.3 percent in June. The...

title: Delhi Metro: DMRC की विशेष प्रदर्शनी, विभाजन के दर्द को याद करने का अनूठा प्रयास
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: Delhi Metro News: दिल्ली मेट्रो ने Partition Horrors Remembrance Day पर राजीव चौक और कश्मीरी गेट मेट्रो स्टेशनों पर प्रदर्शनी का आयोजन किया Delhi News: दिल्ली मेट्रो रेल कॉर्पोरेशन (DMRC) ने विभाजन विभीषिका स्मृति दिवस ( Partition Horrors Remembrance Day) के अवसर पर 14 अगस्त को राजीव चौक और कश्मीरी गेट मेट्रो स्टेशनों पर एक विशेष प्रदर्शनी का आयोजन किया गया. इस प्रदर्शनी का मुख्य उद्देश्य विभाजन की त्रासदी और हमारे साझा इतिहास पर पड़े गहरे प्रभाव को दर्शाना की है. यह प्रदर्शनी लोगों को पिछली सदी में जान गंवाने वाले लोगों की याद दिलाता है. इस समय काफी संख्या में लोग विस्थापित भी हुए थे. वहीं इसे देखने के लिए बच्चे से लेकर बड़े तक जा सकते हैं. इस प्रदर्शनी को देखने से लोगों को अपने इतिहास के बारे में पता चलेता है. इस संस्थान द्वारा किया गया प्रदर्शनी का आयोजन यह प्रदर्शनी भारतीय ऐतिहासिक अनुसंधान परिषद (ICHR) और इंदिरा गांधी राष्ट्रीय कला केंद्र (IGNCA) के द्वारा आयोजित की गई है. वहीं यह शैक्षिक अनुभव भी प्रदान करता है. साथ ही इसका उद्घाटन जनप्रतिनिधियों और वरिष्ठ नागरिकों की उपस्थिति में किया गया. ये भी पढ़ें- रक्षाबंधन पर आंगनबाड़ी कर्मचारियों को मिलेंगे इतने हजार रुपये, CM सैनी ने की घोषणा इन जगहों पर लगी प्रदर्शनी विभाजन विभीषिका स्मृति दिवस' उन लाखों लोगों की पीड़ा और संघर्ष को याद करने के लिए मनाया जाता है जो विभाजन के दौरान अपने घरों से विस्थापित हुए थे. यह प्रदर्शनी आगंतुकों को विभाजन के समय की दर्दनाक घटनाओं की गहरी समझ प्रदान करती है और इतिहास के इस महत्वपूर्ण हिस्से...

title: Берлинская пивоварня наладила экологичное производство
content: Пивоварня Fuerst Wiacek работает в Берлине уже три года и производит в основном крафтовое пиво высокого класса, и известна своим высококачественными индийским пейл-элем и традиционным немецким пивом. Раз в неделю местный берлинский фермер приезжает на своем тракторе на пивоварню и забирает отработанное зерно, использованное для приготовления напитка. "Коровам это очень нравится, и они уже ждут", - рассказал Euronews фермер Кристоф Брундке. Переработка отработанного зерна - не единственный способ, с помощью которого пивоварня старается сохранить окружающую среду. "Мы стараемся получать значительную часть энергии от солнечных батарей", - говорит глава отдела продаж Джордж Шумай. "Это не обеспечивает 100% питания пивоварни, но помогает сбалансировать источники энергии". Шумай сказал, что пивоварня хочет увеличить число солнечных панелей, чтобы использовать больше возобновляемых источников энергии. Пиво, которое здесь производят, полностью натуральное, без консервантов и лишних химикатов. Каждая партия пива проходит тщательную проверку. Fuerst Wiacek экспортирует свою продукцию в 34 страны и сотрудничает с другими компаниями, выпуская не менее одного нового сорта пива в неделю. Пиво компании узнаваемо по причудливому дизайну и тому факту, что оно продается в банках, а не в бутылках. Шумай объяснил, что это решение было принято для того, чтобы быть более экологичным,...

title: Honduras progresa en su integración a bancos internacionales vinculados a China
creator: Hondudiario Redacción
content: *** Finanzas subrayó la importancia de estos avances para el país, ya que el financiamiento de proyectos en energía será uno de los principales enfoques. El ministro de Finanzas de Honduras, Marlon Ochoa, anunció que el Gobierno está en proceso de integrar al país en diversos bancos en los que China participa, como el Banco de los BRICS y el Banco de Exportaciones e Importaciones, con el objetivo de financiar proyectos de desarrollo futuros, principalmente en los sectores de energía e infraestructura. Ochoa detalló que Honduras logró avances significativos en su incorporación a estas instituciones, que incluyen tanto bancos estatales chinos como organismos multilaterales, como el Banco de los BRICS, liderado por la expresidenta de Brasil, Dilma Rousseff. Asimismo, el ministro indicó que se están explorando otros productos crediticios que China está desarrollando y que serán esenciales para financiar proyectos de desarrollo en diferentes áreas. “Adicionalmente se nos expuso como a través de la iniciativa de La Franja y La Ruta, China está creando diversos instrumentos financieros precisamente para el financiamiento de infraestructura y otros proyectos de desarrollo en todo el mundo”, detalló Ochoa en declaraciones desde Casa Presidencial. El titular de Finanzas subrayó la importancia de estos avances para el país, ya que el financiamiento de proyectos en...

title: Erkeklerde osteoporoz nedir?
content: Erkeklerde osteoporoz, ciddi ve çoğu zaman göz ardı edilen bir durumdur ve sakatlayıcı kırıklara ve yaşam kalitesinde düşüşe yol açabilir. Risk faktörlerini anlamak ve önleyici adımlar atmak, erkeklerin daha güçlü kemiklere sahip olmasını ve osteoporozla ilişkili komplikasyonların olasılığını azaltmasını sağlar. Erken teşhis ve uygun tedavi, bu sessiz hastalığın etkilerini hafifletmek için çok önemlidir. ERKEKLERDE OSTEOPOROZ NEDİR? Osteoporoz, kemiklerin zayıflaması ve daha kırılgan hale gelmesiyle karakterize edilen bir hastalıktır. Kadınlar, menopoz sonrası hormonal değişiklikler nedeniyle daha sık etkilenirken, erkekler de bu durumdan muaf değildir. Erkeklerde osteoporoz genellikle teşhis edilmez ve tedavi edilmez, bu da ciddi sağlık risklerine yol açar. Erkekler genel olarak kadınlara göre daha yüksek kemik yoğunluğuna sahip olsalar da, yaşlandıkça, özellikle 50 yaşından sonra, kemik kaybı yaşarlar. Erkeklerde osteoporoz, hormonal dengesizlikler, yaşam tarzı seçimleri ve altta yatan sağlık sorunları ile ilişkilendirilebilir. Hastalık genellikle belirti vermeden ilerler, ta ki bir kemik kırığı meydana gelene kadar. Bu durum, erken teşhis ve önleme stratejilerini daha da önemli kılar. KEMİK ERİMESİ NEDİR? Kemik erimesi, kemik dokusunun parçalandığı ve kalsiyum gibi minerallerin kan dolaşımına salındığı doğal bir...

title: Estudiantes participarán de los Intercolegiales de Handball
creator: Redacción
content: Con el objetivo de promover el deporte y trabajo en equipo, se desarrollarán los Intercolegiales Provinciales de Handball promovidos por el Consejo General de Educación (CGE), a través de la Dirección de Educación Física. La competencia que congregará a estudiantes secundarios se desarrollará en la categoría sub 14 femenino y masculino, incluyendo chicos 2010, 2011 y 2012. Para llegar al provincial, ya comenzaron a desarrollarse las instancias locales departamentales organizadas por los delegados departamentales de educación física. Luego se realizarán las zonales, finalizando con la provincial que se realizará 30 y el 31 de octubre en Concepción del Uruguay Centro de Educación Física No 3 Profesor Hugo Mario La Nasa y el Club Tomás de Rocamora. La directora de Educación Física del CGE, Belén Nesa, destacó que la concreción de estos encuentros son fruto de “un trabajo articulado con profesores de educación física de toda la provincia que tienen como objetivo que los estudiantes vivan estas instancias deportivas que generan un aprendizaje más allá del aula, donde la socialización, los vínculos, la tolerancia y el trabajo en equipo son el centro”. Resaltó que “esta competencia comenzará en las escuelas con el armado de los equipos, las preparaciones, las prácticas, tendrán los encuentros locales, luego zonales y por último el provincial”,...

title: Avcı Kraven 18+ fragmanı çıktı!
content: Sony Pictures, Aaron Taylor-Johnson'ın canlandırdığı Marvel karakterini merkeze alacak yeni filmi Avcı Kraven (Kraven the Hunter) için R-Rated (18+) fragmanını yayınladı. Madam Web hüsranının ardından gelecek olan film, Venom Son Dans filmiyle beraber vizyona girecek ikinci Marvel kökenli film olacak. Filmin ilk teaser fragmanından yaklaşık bir yıl sonra gelen yeni fragman bizleri Kraven the Hunter'ın geçmişine götürüyor. Videoda, Sergei Kravinoff ile babası Nikolai Kravinoff arasındaki çatışmanın daha da derinleştiğine tanık oluyoruz. Öte yandan Rhino karakterine ilk kısa bakış da yine fragmanda kendine yer bulmuş. Avcı Kraven'ın çekimleri 2022'de bitmiş olsa da yapım 2023'teki Hollywood grevlerinden etkilenmiş ve film 30 Ağustos 2024'e ertelenmişti. Ancak, Mayıs 2024'te film bir kez daha ertelenerek bu yılın Aralık ayına taşındı. Spider-Man'in en dişli rakiplerinden biri olan Kraven'ın doğuşuna tanık olacağımız film, karakterin güçlenişini çizgi romanlardan biraz farklı şekilde aktaracak. Örümcek Adam'dan ne haber? Avcı Kraven filminin sonunda yeni bir Spider-Man görüp görmeyeceğimiz henüz belli değil nitekim halen kendisine dair bir işaret yok. zira önizleme görüntülerinde web-slinger hala ortalıkta görünmüyor. Avcı Kraven büyük olasılıkla bir yandan Sergei'nin ailevi sorunlarını anlatırken, diğer yandan da Chameleon, Rhino...

title: Who is David Lalhlansanga? The goal scorer for East Bengal in AFC Champions League 2 prelims against Altyn Asyr
content: East Bengal opened the scoring against Turkmen side Altyn Asyr when David Lalhansanga scored for the Red-and-Gold Brigade in the seventh minute, in their AFC Champions League 2 preliminary round match in Kolkata on Wednesday. Lalhlansanga, the top scorer in last year’s Calcutta Football League and Durand Cup, joined East Bengal on a three-year deal, before the 2024-25 season. He also played a pivotal role in Mohammedan Sporting Club’s maiden I-League triumph with five goals and two assists. Hailing from Mizoram, Lalhlansanga rose through Aizawl FC’s youth ranks before being promoted to Aizawl’s first team in the 2019-20 season. After spending three seasons with the Mizoram capital side, David moved to Mohammedan Sporting Club in 2023. The 22-year-old made an immediate impact in the Durand Cup, winning the Golden Boot award with six goals and one assist in just three matches, including four goals in a group stage match against Jamshedpur FC. Recently, Lalhlansanga was selected to be part of the Indian squad that faced Kuwait and Qatar in Round 2 of the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers earlier this month. East Bengal FC Head Coach Carles Cuadrat said, “David is one of our Indian recruits whom we had been trying hard to sign for a long time. He was the leading scorer in the Durand Cup and the CFL, which grabbed my attention. From that moment he became a target for our future plans. I am...

title: EUA: Inflação em julho recua para 2,9%, em linha com as expectativas
creator: João Barros
content: A taxa de inflação nos EUA desceu para 2,9% em julho, igualando a expectativa do mercado e marcando novo mínimo desde março de 2021, enquanto a taxa subjacente recuou para o valor mais baixo desde abril do mesmo ano. A leitura dá mais força à probabilidade de cortes da Reserva Federal já em setembro, evitando por enquanto novas perturbações no mercado fruto das preocupações com a economia norte-americana. Os dados divulgados pelo Departamento do Trabalho esta quarta-feira apontam para uma inflação homóloga de 2,9%, uma redução depois dos 3,1% do mês passado e em linha com as expectativas do mercado. O sell-off da semana anterior gerava medos com uma possível leitura acima do esperado, que poderia gerar nova correção em alta das expectativas quanto aos juros diretores, enquanto uma descida muito pronunciada poderia sugerir problemas com o consumo interno. A componente alimentar manteve-se sem variações, com uma subida de 2,2%, enquanto o alojamento, transportes e vestuário registaram todos abrandamentos em relação ao mês anterior. Na mesma linha, os preços dos veículos novos e de carros e carrinhas usados continuaram a descer, registando uma diminuição ainda mais forte do que no mês anterior. Em sentido inverso, a energia acelerou marginalmente de 1% para 1,1%, sobretudo à boleia de uma redução menos intensa dos preços dos combustíveis, que...

title: Már Donald Trumpot is bíróság elé citálja a párizsi olimpia botrányhőse, Imane Helif
content: Imane Helif volt minden bizonnyal a párizsi olimpia legismertebb alakja, és ennek elsősorban nem az az oka, hogy aranyéremmel a nyakában zárta a játékokat. Az algír bokszolót tavaly kizárták a világbajnokságról, mivel megbukott a nemi teszten. Ám ahelyett, hogy most már szolidan elvonulna ünnepelni, a genderlobbi által hősnek kikiáltott, ám a teszteredményei alapján biológiai férfi az ügyvédjén keresztül mindenkinek nekitámad, aki a női mivoltát kétségbe vonja. Legutóbbi „áldozata” nem más, mint Donald Trump. Ki tudja, mikor csitulnak el a nagy port felverő hírek Imane Helif körül. Az algériai bokszoló aranyérmet szerzett a párizsi olimpián a női 67 kilósok versenyében , ám a nemi tesztek eredményei alapján – rendelkezik X- és Y-kromoszómával – kiderült róla, hogy nem is indulhatna a nők között, mert biológiailag férfi. Noha például a Nemzetközi Olimpiai Bizottság azzal védekezik, hogy az általa gyűlölt Nemzetközi Bokszszövetség (IBA) által elkészíttetett tesztek eredményeit nem látták, amin senki sem csodálkozhat, ugyanis az algériaiak mindenkit perrel fenyegetnek, aki nyilvánosságra hozza az eredményeket. A jogszabályok szerint erre csak maga Helif adhatna engedélyt, aki „véletlenül” ezt nem tette eddig meg. A botrány miatt egyébként komoly esélye van annak, hogy a 2028-as, Los...

title: Rusya'da kripto para borsalarının yasallaştırılması planlanıyor
content: Rusya Maliye Bakanı Anton Siluanov, Rusya Merkez Bankası ile kripto para borsalarını yasallaştırmak üzere çalışma yaptıklarını söyledi. Siluanov, başkent Moskova'da düzenlenen bir etkinlikte yaptığı konuşmada, Rusya'da kripto para ödemeleri ve madenciliğine yönelik son dönemde çeşitli yasaların yürürlüğe girdiğini belirtti. Söz konusu yasaların ardından geriye kripto para borsalarına yönelik düzenlemelerin kaldığına işaret eden Siluanov, "Geriye, kendi resmi yasal kripto borsalarımızın oluşturulmasının sonuca ulaştırılması kaldı. Bu hala gri bir alanda, (kripto para borsaları) ne yasal ne de yasa dışı durumdalar." dedi. 'YASALLAŞTIRILMASINI İSTİYORUZ' Rus hükümetinin bu konuda çeşitli istişareler yaptığını anlatan Siluanov, "Bu konuyu Rusya Merkez Bankası ile görüşüyoruz ve birlikte üzerinde çalışıyoruz. Farklı bakış açıları nedeniyle bunu nasıl yapacağımız konusunda bir çözüm bulamadık. Biz bu sürecin yasallaştırılmasını istiyoruz" şeklinde konuştu. Siluanov, Rusya Merkez Bankasının ise konuya daha temkinli yaklaştığını söyledi. Rusya Devlet Başkanı Vladimir Putin, 8 Ağustos'ta, kripto paraların uluslararası ödemeler ve Forex işlemlerinde deneysel olarak kullanılmasını ve kripto para madenciliğini yasal hale getiren yasaları onaylamıştı. Rusya Merkez Bankası 2021'de hazırladığı raporla ülkede kripto paraların...

title: Study finds 'a dime a dozen' and 'cat got your tongue' among Britain's most puzzling phrases
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Alice Hughes)
content: Expressions like 'Raining cats and dogs', 'as easy as pie' and 'bite the bullet' are among the most puzzling idioms for Brits, a study reveals. The research, involving 2,000 adults, discovered that a third have been left scratching their heads over an object's name or a common phrase. 'A dime a dozen' topped the list of confusing phrases for 24% of participants, while 'cat got your tongue' also left 14% baffled. In terms of 'misnomers' or misleading names, 'tennis bracelet' (32%), 'herringbone' (17%) and 'koala bear' (16%) were the main culprits of confusion. Other sources of bewilderment included 'wisdom teeth' (11%), 'gravy boat' (13%) and 'cat burglar' (10%). As a result, 22% admitted to using a misnomer in the wrong context, while 16%confessed to misunderstanding what something does. The study was conducted by biscuit brand, LU, to celebrate the launch of its new Le Petit Cookie. Brand ambassador Fred Sirieix commented: "It's been great fun finding the unique names, terms and phrases that often cause confusion in the English language." "You know, English isn't my first language, so it's been even more fun to get to the bottom of it all. I'm now on a mission to turn the peculiarly named Piccadilly Circus into 'Normal English Square' - makes much more sense." The survey also revealed that 32% have searched for an unusual saying to understand its meaning, although 24%...

title: Sudan'da iç savaşı bitirmek için müzakereler başladı
content: Sudan'da 16 aydır ordu ile Hızlı Destek Kuvvetleri (HDK) arasında devam eden iç savaşın sonlandırılması için resmi görüşmeler İsviçre'nin Cenevre kentinde "ordu temsilcisi olmadan" başladı. ABD'nin Sudan Özel Temsilcisi Tom Perriello, X sosyal medya platformundan yaptığı paylaşımda, İsviçre, Suudi Arabistan, Mısır, Birleşik Arap Emirlikleri (BAE), Afrika Birliği ve Birleşmiş Milletler'i (BM) temsil eden uluslararası ve teknik ortaklarla açılış oturumunun gerçekleştirildiğini kaydetti. Tarafların Cidde'deki taahhütlerine ve uygulamalarına uymalarını sağlamaya odaklandıklarını belirten Perriello, "Savaşan taraflar, uluslararası insancıl hukuka saygı göstermeli ve insani yardımı sağlamalı. Silahların susturulmasının vakti geldi." ifadelerini kullandı. Perriello, Sudan'daki iç savaşın durdurulması yönünde de çağrıda bulundu. Görüşmelere ilişkin dün yazılı açıklama yapan Perriello, "Sudan ordusu ve Hızlı Destek Kuvvetleri'ne (HDK) doğrudan bu görüşmelere katılmalarının, Sudan halkının çatışmanın ve kıtlığın sona ermesi yönündeki ısrarlı isteğinden kaynaklanması gerektiğini vurgulamak istiyorum. HDK Cenevre'ye ulaştı. Ordu bir heyet gönderirse birlikte daha fazlasını yapabiliriz." değerlendirmesinde bulunmuştu. HDK heyeti görüşmelere katılmak üzere Cenevre'ye gelirken, ordu görüşmelere katılmıyor. Sudan Egemenlik Konseyi...

title: La dedica di Fedez alla sua assistente Eleonora Sesana: “Solo noi sappiamo quello che abbiamo vissuto”
creator: Niccolò Di Francesco
content: Tra feste e nuovi flirt, Fedez trova il tempo di rendere omaggio anche alla sua assistente: il cantante, infatti, ha condiviso sui social una dolce dedica indirizzata proprio a Eleonora Sesana . Il rapper, infatti, ha condiviso sul suo profilo Instagram una foto che li vede abbracciati scrivendo: “Solo noi sappiamo quello che abbiamo vissuto e le sfide che abbiamo dovuto affrontare in questi anni. Cose talmente folli che se le raccontassimo nessuno ci crederebbe. Ma noi sempre fianco a fianco, perché se siamo insieme tutto pesa la metà. Eleonora oggi abbiamo fatto la storia della Costa Smeralda insieme. Ti voglio un mondo di bene”. Nel frattempo prosegue l’estate bollente di Fedez. Il cantante, infatti, dopo Garance Authié e Sveva Magatti , è stato paparazzato mentre si scambia effusioni in barca con la 23enne Luna Shirin Rasia . I due, secondo quanto scrive Chi , il magazine che ha pubblicato le immagini , si sarebbero conosciuti in un locale: “Fedez ha iniziato a seguire Luna sui social, mentre lei già lo seguiva. Da lì a vedersi in Sardegna il passo è stato breve”. “La passione, accennata la sera prima in un locale, è esplosa in barca – si legge ancora sul settimanale – Nulla di male, un ragazzo incontra una ragazza, la notte poi non passa, la notte se ne va. Ma, forse, una ragazza ferita, che ha vissuto il dramma che ha affrontato Luna, va avvicinata con la massima...

title: आर्ट्स स्ट्रीम की छात्राएं भी कर सकती हैं Nursing का कोर्स, जानें कैसे मिलेगा एडमिशन
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: Nursing Course After 12th: आर्ट्स स्ट्रीम की छात्रा भी मेडिकल की फील्ड में अपना करियर बना सकती हैं. अगर वे नर्सिंग का कोर्स करने में रूची रखते हैं, तो वे ऑक्सिलरी नर्सिंग मिडवाइफ और जनरल नर्सिंग एंड मिडवाइफरी की पढ़ाई कर सकती हैं. Nursing Course for Arts Stream Student: क्या आप जानती हैं कि आप आर्ट्स स्ट्रीम से 12वीं कक्षा की बोर्ड परीक्षा पास करने के तुरंत बाद नर्सिंग के कोर्स के लिए अप्लाई कर सकती हैं? जिन छात्राओं ने आर्ट्स स्ट्रीम से अपनी कक्षा 12वीं की बोर्ड परीक्षा पूरी की है, उनके पास हॉस्पिटेलिटी इंडस्ट्री, मीडिया, मास कम्युनिकेशन, टीचिंग, फ्लाइंग अटेंडेंट, एयर होस्टेस और कई अन्य फील्ड में आवेदन करने का विकल्प है. लेकिन वे ऑक्सिलरी नर्सिंग मिडवाइफ (ANM) और जनरल नर्सिंग एंड मिडवाइफरी (GNM) की भी पढ़ाई कर सकती हैं. यह एक आम धारणा है कि किसी के पास साइंस का बैकग्राउंड होना चाहिए, लेकिन नर्सिंग कोर्स या कॉलेज में एडमिशन लेने के लिए आपको साइंस बैकग्राउंड से होने की आवश्यकता नहीं है. नर्सिंग प्रोफेशन के लिए उच्च स्तर की विशेषज्ञता की आवश्यकता होती है. जिन छात्राओं ने 12वीं कक्षा की परीक्षा पास की है, वे ऑक्सिलरी नर्सिंग मिडवाइफ (ANM) और जनरल नर्सिंग एंड मिडवाइफरी (GNM) डिप्लोमा कोर्स में एडमिशन ले सकते हैं. भारतीय नर्सिंग परिषद (Indian Nursing Council) भारत में नर्सों और नर्सिंग शिक्षा के लिए नियामक प्राधिकरण है. ऑक्जिलरी नर्सिंग मिडवाइफ 2 साल का डिप्लोमा कोर्स है, जिसमें 6 महीने की इंटर्नशिप (अनिवार्य) शामिल है. ANM कोर्स की सालाना फीस 10,000 रुपये से 60,000 रुपये के बीच...

title: পুজোর মুখে ব্যাপক চাহিদা! হাতে তৈরি গয়নায় সাজাতে পারেন নিজেকে, কেমন দাম জানুন
content: আর কিছুদিন পরেই বাঙালির শ্রেষ্ঠ দুর্গাপুজো। ইতিমধ্যে অনেকেই অল্প অল্প করে জামাকাপড় কিনতে শুরু করে দিয়েছেন। তবে শাড়ি বা ড্রেসের সঙ্গে ম্যাচ করে গয়না তো আমরা সারা বছরই পরি। কিন্তু পুজোর সাজে গয়নার একটা আলাদা গুরুত্ব আছে। বর্তমানে দুর্গাকে থিম করে অনেক রকম গয়নার কালেকশন তৈরি হচ্ছে। আগে যদিও পোড়ামাটির গয়না কিংবা টেরাকোটার গয়নার একটা চল ছিল তবে বর্তমানে এমব্রয়েডরি জুয়েলারি বা ফেব্রিকের জুয়েলারির একটা ট্রেন্ড রয়েছে। পুজোর জন্য নানারকম দুর্গার মোটিফ, শরতের শিউলি, কাশফুল, গণেশ জননী ইত্যাদি বিভিন্ন রকম ছবি ফুটিয়ে তোলা হচ্ছে পুজোর ক্লে কালেকশনে। এই গয়নাগুলো যে কোনও ট্র্যাডিশনাল শাড়ি কিংবা ওয়েস্টার্ন ড্রেসের সঙ্গে পড়লে বেশ স্মার্ট একটা লুক আসবে। তাঁত হোক কিংবা কাঞ্জিভরম এই জুয়েলারিগুলো বেশ ট্রাডিশনাল লুক দেয়। আজ বহু বছর ধরে এমব্রয়েডরি জুয়েলারি তৈরি করে আসছেন হেমতাবাদের পুজা সাহা। পুজা জানান, দুর্গাপুজোর আগেই এমব্রয়ডারি জুয়েলারি, হ্যান্ডমেড জুয়েলারি, চিকের উপর জুয়েলারি। এই জুয়েলারিগুলোর প্রচুর চল। এগুলো ফেব্রিকের উপর কাজ করা। এগুলোর দাম ৮০ টাকা থেকে শুরু হয়। পুজা তাঁর তৈরি এই হ্যান্ডমেড জুয়েলারিগুলো অনলাইন পেজে বিক্রি করেন। এছাড়া সরকারি মেলায় মেলায় তাঁরা এই জুয়েলারি বিক্রি করেন। একদম পুজোর শাড়ির সঙ্গে ম্যাচ করে পেয়ে যাবেন এই ডিজাইনের বিভিন্ন ধরনের জুয়েলারি।

title: Rechaza el TEE la solicitud de Morena de hacer un recuento parcial de votos en San Luis Acatlán
creator: Rosendo
content: Chilpancingo, Guerrero, a 14 de agosto de 2024.- El pleno Tribunal Electoral del Estado (TEE), rechazó la solicitud de Morena para recontar los votos en la elección del Ayuntamiento de San Luis Acatlán, y revoco una sentencia emitida por la Comisión de Justicia del PAN, en contra de la ex diputada local, Guadalupe González Suástegui. En sesión virtual de resolución celebrada ayer martes, el TEE también determinó sancionar al ex candidato a la diputación local del distrito 11, de la alianza PRI-PRD-PAN, Arturo Arzeta Serna, por vulnerar las reglas de aparición de menores en propaganda, violación a la preservación de la identidad de las infancias en actos de campaña y la utilización de sus imágenes sin el consentimiento de sus padres o tutores. El proyecto TEE/JIN/025/2024, a cargo de la magistrada Hilda Rosa Delgado Brito, atendió una solicitud de recuento total de la elección del Ayuntamiento de San Luis Acatlán, solicitada por el representante de Morena ante el Consejo Distrital 28. En ésten se propuso declarar improcedente la solicitud de Morena porque la impugnación pretendía que fuera el TEE el que realizara la apertura de los paquetes electorales de todas las casillas instaladas en San Luis Acatlán, bajo el argumento de que el Consejo Distrital 28 se negó a realizarlo. “El 6 de junio, en sede administrativa la autoridad responsable efectuó...

Inflation Drops to Lowest Level in More Than 3 Years
content: Inflation in the U.S. reached its lowest point in more than three years, as the overall inflation was 2.9 percent in July. According to a report released by the U.S. Labor Department on Wednesday, consumer prices increased by just 0.2 percent from June to July, following a slight decrease the previous month for the first time in four years. Year-over-year, prices climbed by 2.9 percent, down from 3 percent in June, marking the mildest annual inflation rate since March 2021. Inflation remains a top concern among Americans as it reflects a loss of purchasing power as prices for goods and services rise over time. When the inflation rate is high, it suggests that prices are rising rapidly, often having an immediate impact on personal finances. Inflation peaked at 9.1 percent two years ago, the highest level seen in four decades. The Consumer Price Index rose 2.9 percent in the 12 months through July. The report released by the Labor Department also indicated that nearly all of July's price increases were driven by higher rental and housing costs. According to the Associated Press (AP), the news is expected to set the stage for the Federal Reserve to consider cutting interest rates as early as September. reached out to the Labor Department on Wednesday via email for comment. According to the AP, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has stated that the Fed is looking for more signs...

title: 'It's frightening': Food bank says it unknowingly distributed meth-laced candy in New Zealand
creator: USA TODAY
content: A New Zealand charity working with people experiencing homelessness unknowingly distributed candies laced with potentially lethal after they were donated to the organization. , located on the country's north island, apologized Wednesday for distributing dozens of pineapple-flavored candies that had sickened at least three people, as of Wednesday. The charity, which serves those who cannot afford food, said it first became aware of the issue on Tuesday afternoon when several recipients complained after eating the wrapped pineapple-flavored sweets. "We are deeply concerned at this turn of events and the police are actively investigating," the in a statement released online. The candy, donated by an unknown member of the public, was tested by the , which each piece of candy contained a potentially lethal 3 grams (0.1 ounces) of meth − up to 300 times the normal dose, Drug Foundation Executive Director Sarah Helm said. Methamphetamine is that affects the central nervous system. The powerful drug is white, odorless, and bitter-tasting, according to the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration. The NZ Drug Foundation, which first tested the sweets, advises people not to eat, taste or lick the candy. A child, a teenager and a charity worker all sought medical treatment after tasting the sweet, reported. "To say we are devastated is an understatement," Auckland City Mission wrote in a...

title: રાષ્ટ્રપતિનું રાષ્ટ્રને સંબોધન:દ્રૌપદી મુર્મુએ કહ્યું- આઝાદીના ઉત્સવમાં ભાગ લેનાર તમામ દેશવાસી અમારો પરિવાર
content: આજે 14 ઓગસ્ટ, 2024ના રોજ 78મા સ્વતંત્રતા દિવસની પૂર્વસંધ્યાએ રાષ્ટ્રપતિ દ્રૌપદી મુર્મુએ 20 મિનિટ માટે રાષ્ટ્રને સંબોધિત કર્યું હતું. તેમણે કહ્યું હતું કે સ્વતંત્રતા પર્વમાં ભાગ લેનારા તમામ દેશવાસી અમારો પરિવાર છે. રાષ્ટ્રપતિએ કહ્યું હતું કે આઝાદીનો આ તહેવાર આપણને એ દિવસોની યાદ અપાવે છે, જ્યારે દેશ માટે ઘણા લોકોએ બલિદાન આપ્યા હતાં. આપણા સ્વાતંત્ર્ય સેનાનીઓએ આપણને એક નવી અભિવ્યક્તિ આપી. સરદાર પટેલ, બોઝ, ભગત સિંહ, બાબા સાહેબ આંબેડકર જેવા બીજા ઘણા હતા, જેમનાં બલિદાનની પ્રશંસા કરવામાં આવી છે. દ્રૌપદી મુર્મુ દેશના 15મા રાષ્ટ્રપતિ છે. આ સર્વોચ્ચ બંધારણીય પદ પર પહોંચનારા તેઓ દેશનાં પ્રથમ આદિવાસી અને બીજાં મહિલા રાષ્ટ્રપતિ છે. તેમણે 64 વર્ષની વયે (વર્ષ 2022) દેશનાં સૌથી યુવા રાષ્ટ્રપતિ બનવાનો રેકોર્ડ પણ બનાવ્યો. દ્રૌપદી મુર્મુના સંબોધનની 6 મહત્ત્વની વાત...

title: Upstate NY organic producer giving seeds away for free, calls them a gift from nature
content: Fruition Seeds founder Petra Page-Mann holds one of the company's hundreds of seed varieties offered on Thursday, Aug. 1, 2024. The multimillion-dollar organic seed company has declared that "seeds are gifts" and will be giving them away after this month. (AP Photo/Cara Anna) AP The Associated Press NAPLES, New York (AP) — A multimillion-dollar organic seed company has surprised its supporters by announcing it will end sales and give hundreds of varieties away, declaring “we can no longer commodify our beloved kin, these seeds, or ourselves.” The Cocozelle zucchini, now $14.25 per 100 seeds? No charge. Catnip, kale, the rampant mint? All free. Petra Page-Mann and Matthew Goldfarb, the couple who run Fruition Seeds in Upstate New York, said they’re letting go workers, stopping sales on Aug. 27 and relying on public goodwill — donations of money, talent and effort — to grow and distribute seeds on a $76,000 budget. That’s a dramatic shift for a company with more than $22 million in sales, according to 2022 records, and a profile high enough that it’s among a handful of seed companies featured in the New York Botanical Garden’s shop. “The call is simple enough: Seeds are gifts. Gifts are shared,” the couple said in a long and searching announcement weeks ago. They’ve thought about barriers to access and what they call the indignity of the dollar. Burnout, too, played a role....

title: اردوغان: مانع تلاش اسرائیل برای به آتش کشیدن کل منطقه خواهیم شد
content: آنکارا/ خبرگزاری آنادولو رجب طیب اردوغان، رئیس‌جمهور ترکیه طی سخنانی در برنامه‌ای که به مناسبت 23'مین سالگرد تاسیس حزب عدالت و توسعه برگزار شد، گفت: سال‌هایی که تحت مدیریت حزب عدالت و توسعه گذشت، از هر جهت به‌عنوان درخشان‌ترین دوره ترکیه در طول تاریخ جمهوریت ثبت شده است. وی تصریح کرد: از لحظه‌ای که مسئولیت مدیریت در ترکیه را بر عهده گرفتیم، در تلاش هستیم وظیفه خود را به بهترین شکل ممکن انجام دهیم. اردوغان اظهار داشت: طی 23 سال گذشته که افتخار خدمت به ملت‌مان را داشتیم، تلاش کردیم و ملتمان می‌داند که ترکیه را از کجا به کجا رساندیم. رئیس‌جمهور ترکیه ادامه داد: ما کشورمان که حتی برای تفنگ پیاده نظام‌ به دیگران وابسته بود را به لیگ کشورهای نخبه که توانایی تولید توپ، تانک، موشک، راکت، هواپیما و پهپاد دارد، ارتقا دادیم. اردوغان در بخش دیگری از سخنان خود درباره موضع ترکیه در قبال حملات اسرائیل به غزه گفت: به رویکرد سازنده، فعال، خویشتندارانه و باوقار خود در سیاست خارجی ادامه خواهیم داد. ما مانع تلاش اسرائیل برای به آتش کشیدن کل منطقه خواهیم شد.

title: Eva Mendes and Kate McKinnon will be among guests this fall at 92nd Street Y in Manhattan

title: Eva Mendes and Kate McKinnon will be among guests this fall at 92nd Street Y in Manhattan
creator: News Staff
content: NEW YORK (AP) — Kate McKinnon , Malcolm Gladwell and Eva Mendes will be among the featured speakers this fall at the 92nd Street Y i n Manhattan, a leading venue for arts events. McKinnon will be promoting her expansively titled children’s story, “The Millicent Quibb School of Etiquette for Young Ladies of Mad Science,” and Gladwell his new book, ”Revenge of the Tipping Point.” Mendes will discuss her picture book, “Desi, Mami, and the Never-Ending Worries,” a family-friendly version of life with the two children she has with husband Ryan Gosling. Other guests at the Y will include Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, whose “True Gretch” came out this summer; Josh Brolin , who has written the memoir “From Under the Truck”; and designer Bob Mackie, who will be discussing a documentary about him, ”Naked Illusion.” The Associated Press

title: RTE delight Ireland fans with bumper TV announcement around upcoming fixtures for men & women’s sides
creator: Vincent Whelan
content: IRELAND supporters will be thrilled to hear confirmation that all six of the men's Nations League fixtures will be broadcast on RTE. The national broadcaster communicated the assuring update to fans via group head of sport, Declan McBennett. The biggest takeaway from his announcement was that EVERY match of next summer's women's Euros will also be shown. In October The Girls in Green will be in the play-off picture to secure their own spot in Switzerland. On that hope, he outlined: “For many years we have placed women’s sport at the heart of our coverage including the Women’s Euros in 2022 and the World Cup last year in Australia. "We are delighted that every game from Euro 2025 will be carried by RTÉ and we desperately hope our national team carve their own path to Switzerland via the playoffs.” Eileen Gleeson's charges will first have to get past Georgia before facing the winner of Wales/Slovakia in the play-off final. As regards the beginning of the Heimir Hallgrimsson era , The Boys in Green couldn't have a much more daunting task first up. England, led by interim manager Lee Carsley , will be coming to the Aviva Stadium on Saturday September 7. The Icelander's debut double-header will be rounded off by the visit of familiar foes Greece to Dublin on Tuesday September 10. Seamus Coleman and Co will then have to take to the skies in quick succession over the October window....

title: US consumer inflation records smallest annual rise since 2021
content: US consumer inflation eased slightly in July, according to government data published on Wednesday, its smallest 12-month increase since March 2021 and a positive sign for the Federal Reserve as it weighs cutting interest rates. The consumer price index (CPI) rose 2.9 per cent last month from a year ago, the Labour Department said in a statement, while a measure that strips out volatile food and energy costs cooled to an annual rate of 3.2 per cent . This was slightly lower than the median forecast of economists surveyed by Dow Jones Newswires and The Wall Street Journal. The monthly inflation rate picked up by 0.2 per cent after declining in June, in line with expectations. Almost 90 per cent of the monthly increase was down to a 0.4 per cent increase in shelter costs, the Labor Department said. Energy prices remained unchanged, while the index for food rose 0.2 per cent . So-called “core” inflation, excluding volatile food and energy prices, also eased last month to 3.2 per cent — its lowest level since April 2021. Traders have assigned a probability of just over 55 per cent that it will make a quarter-percentage point cut.

title: Bukele colombiano estalla contra viceministro Gareth Sella por buscar libertad para capturados de la Primera Línea: “Es inadmisible”
creator: Nelson Álvarez
content: El viceministro de Juventudes, Gareth Steven Sella, afirmó en una entrevista en El Espectador que están explorando mecanismos internacionales para que miembros de la primera línea capturados puedan recuperar su libertad. Además, confirmó que están en diálogos con la Fiscalía para encontrar alternativas jurídicas. Ante esta afirmación del viceministro, el alcalde de Bucaramanga, Jaime Andrés Beltrán, le respondió que es una iniciativa “inadmisible”. Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . En la entrevista, el viceministro Gareth Sella respondió a la pregunta sobre qué pasará con los miembros de la ‘primera línea’ hoy presos, que “nosotros esperamos que la nueva Fiscalía mire con dignidad y con humanidad a los jóvenes, pero es un tema bastante complicado, delicado. Nosotros seguimos apostándole para que las juventudes del estallido social, porque no fueron solamente de primeras líneas, no sean tratadas como delincuentes o criminales. Esperamos también que a nivel internacional se le ponga un ojo a eso y que haya otros mecanismos para que estas juventudes puedan recuperar su libertad”. Sin embargo, esa declaración fue criticada por el alcalde de Bucaramanga, Jaime Andrés Beltrán, también conocido como el Bukele colombiano, al asegurar que es incoherente de parte del Gobierno nacional intentar liberar a criminales cuando en las...

title: ‘Resentful’ Joe Biden Set to Snub Barack Obama and Kamala Harris Speeches at DNC
creator: David Gardner
content: While the Democratic Party leadership is putting on a united public front, Joe Biden ’s simmering resentment over the quiet coup that ended his re-election dreams may be bubbling to the surface. It wasn’t long ago that Biden was looking forward to the primetime closing spot at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago , making his case for leading the United States for another four years. Now he’s been demoted to a curtain-raiser speech on the opening night when he is likely to make a call for unity in a party that has effectively closed ranks to move forward without him. According to Politico’s Playbook , Biden “won’t be sticking around for the rest of the week’s festivities.” That means he’ll miss his old boss Barack Obama ’s speech to the convention on Tuesday, fueling speculation that the president “harbors some resentment” that Obama didn’t stand up for him when the knives came out after the disastrous debate with Donald Trump in Atlanta. Even more significantly, if Biden retires to the White House for the remainder of the convention, he will skip the symbolic handover of the 2024 presidential election torch to Kamala Harris that he set in motion when he decided to stand down and endorse his vice president on July 21. The Harris-Walz team will worry that would send the wrong kind of message to their GOP rivals, and to the country. The White House was coy on Monday...

title: Tropical Storm Ernesto pummels northeast Caribbean and leaves hundreds of thousands in the dark
creator: The Canadian Press
content: SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico (AP) — Ernesto intensified Wednesday into a hurricane over the Caribbean and is on a path toward Bermuda, forecasters said. The storm had maximum sustained winds of 120 kph (75 mph), making it a Category 1 hurricane, the National Hurricane Center said. Before it was confirmed to strengthened to a hurricane, the tropical storm dropped torrential rain on eastern Puerto Rico and left hundreds of thousands of people without power in the U.S. territory. Ernesto is forecast to move through open waters and make its closest approach to Bermuda on Saturday. It is expected to become a major Category 3 storm, with forecasters warning of heavy swells along the U.S. East Coast. THIS IS A BREAKING NEWS UPDATE. THE FOLLOWING IS AP'S PREVIOUS STORY. Tropical Storm Ernesto dropped torrential rain on Puerto Rico on Wednesday and left nearly half of all clients in the U.S. territory without power as it threatened to strengthen into a major hurricane en route to Bermuda. The storm was located about 125 miles (200 kilometers) northwest of San Juan, Puerto Rico and was moving over open waters. It had maximum sustained winds of 70 mph (110 kph) and was moving northwest at 16 mph (26 kph). Ernesto was expected to become a hurricane later Wednesday. “While it is possible Ernesto is already a hurricane, radar data does not yet support an upgrade,” the National Hurricane Center in...

title: How To Strike Gold Ore In Once Human
creator: Brandon Morgan
content: Many of the late-game crafting recipes you’ll encounter in Once Human require rare materials that only stem from high-level zones. For instance, Gold. It’s one of the most lucrative materials in the game, but also highly necessary to produce end-game equipment to take down Great Ones. Pulling from past experience in survival-crafting games, we can use our detective skills to track down Gold Ore in Once Human. Or you can just follow along with us! Here is where to get Gold in Once Human! There’s only one zone in the game that spawns Gold: Red Sands . It’s a challenging end-game zone with level 40+ enemies, many of which tower over you. That said, even exploring Red Sands for an hour may turn up zilch. Gold is proving extremely rare, and that’s part of why it’s the primary currency for player trades. It’s lucrative! But if you’re looking to score big, head north to Red Sands and wander through the desert. I recommend leaving your motorcycle or truck behind, as it’s easy to miss the flat, gold-plated rock while you’re zipping by on the highway. Once you’re in Red Sands, prioritize the following areas: These four high-level areas require plenty of ammunition and aid items such as health kits, food, water, and gas for your vehicle to make a quick escape should things go awry quickly.
