title: Poll: Harris and Walz build huge lead among likely California voters
creator: James Rainey - Los Angeles Times (TNS)
content: Vice President Kamala Harris' entry into the presidential race has galvanized traditional Democratic voting groups and those not aligned with a political party, helping extend the Democrats' already large advantage over former President Trump in California, a new poll shows. Harris leads Trump 59% to 34% in the electoral-vote-rich Golden State, a margin 7 points larger than President Biden held earlier this year, before he gave up his bid for reelection late last month, according to the survey by Berkeley's Institute of Governmental Studies, cosponsored by The Times. title: Poll: Harris and Walz build huge lead among likely California voters
creator: James Rainey - Los Angeles Times (TNS)
content: Vice President Kamala Harris' entry into the presidential race has galvanized traditional Democratic voting groups and those not aligned with a political party, helping extend the Democrats' already large advantage over former President Trump in California, a new poll shows. Harris leads Trump 59% to 34% in the electoral-vote-rich Golden State, a margin 7 points larger than President Biden held earlier this year, before he gave up his bid for reelection late last month, according to the survey by Berkeley's Institute of Governmental Studies, cosponsored by The Times. Fueling the surge by the vice president are much higher levels of support that Harris receives from younger voters, ages 18 to 29, whose backing of the Democrats grew by 23 percentage points; and Black voters, whose backing jumped by 16 percentage points. Other California voting groups that traditionally lean Democratic also expressed higher levels of enthusiasm for Harris than for Biden — with support bumping up 11 points among liberals and 10 points among Latinos, according to the poll of likely voters, which was conducted online from July 31 through Aug. 11. "Harris has consolidated the support of Democratic and Democratic-leaning voters in the state," said Eric Schickler, co-director of the Institute of Governmental Studies. "With Biden, you saw a lack of enthusiasm and engagement that was especially stark...

title: Rap-Superstar will bei Olympia 2028 antreten: "Todernst"
content: Ernst gemeintes Ziel oder PR-Stunt? US-Megastar Dr. Dre will 2028 bei Heim-Olympia in Los Angeles in einer Sportart antreten, die dann doch überrascht. Dr. Dre ist ein Mann der Worte. Mit seinen (produzierten) Alben (u.a. Eminem und 50 Cent) hat er Millionen Fans weltweit erreicht. Und jetzt lassen diese Worte aufhorchen. Andre Young, so sein bürgerlicher Name, will sich im Bogenschießen für die Olympischen Spiele 2028 in seiner Heimat Los Angeles qualifizieren. In einem Interview mit der amerikanischen TV-Sendung "Entertainment Tonight" erklärte der 59-Jährige, dass er in seinem Garten aus größerer Entfernung trainiere, als es bei den Spielen erforderlich ist. "Ich versuche, mich für die Olympischen Spiele 2028 zu qualifizieren", sagte er über seine sportlichen Ambitionen und unterstrich, dass er nicht scherze. "Ich meine es todernst." Dr. Dre habe schon in der High School angefangen, Bogenschießen zu praktizieren, erzählte er. Dr. Dre trainiert im eigenen Garten für Olympia 2028 "Ich habe eine Weile aufgehört und dann hat mir mein Sohn eine Anlage gekauft, ich weiß nicht mehr, ob es ein Geburtstagsgeschenk oder ein Vatertagsgeschenk oder etwas Ähnliches war, und ich habe sie in meinem Garten aufgestellt", verriet Dre. "Ich habe sie in meinem Hinterhof aufgestellt." Bogenschießen ist eine olympische Kernsportart und wurde 1972 wieder in das olympische Programm...

Στην περιοχή επιχειρούν 32 πυροσβέστες, με 1 ομάδα πεζοπόρου, 10 οχήματα και 1 ελικόιπτερο. Συνδράμουν υδροφόρες Ο.Τ.Α. και μηχανήματα έργου. title: Alertan de lluvias intensas para cuatro estados de México; aquí el pronóstico
content: Este miércoles se prevén lluvias puntuales intensas en cuatro estados del país , informó el Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN), fuente climática oficial del Gobierno de México . Para Jalisco, las lluvias serán fuertes con puntuales muy fuertes . Para hoy, el monzón mexicano en interacción con inestabilidad en niveles altos de la atmósfera, originará lluvias puntuales fuertes y rachas fuertes de viento en Sinaloa Sonora, Chihuahua y Durango , con descargas eléctricas y posible caída de granizo; intervalos de chubascos en Baja California Sur, con posibles descargas eléctricas; y lluvias aisladas en zonas de Baja California. A su vez, un canal de baja presión a lo largo de la Sierra Madre Occidental que se extenderá hasta el occidente y centro de México , en interacción con inestabilidad en niveles altos de la atmósfera, ocasionarán lluvias puntuales fuertes en Zacatecas, Aguascalientes y Guanajuato; y lluvias con intervalos de chubascos en Coahuila, Nuevo León, San Luis Potosí, Querétaro e Hidalgo. Por su parte, el ingreso de aire húmedo del Golfo de México producirá lluvias con intervalos de chubascos en Tamaulipas, y la entrada de aire húmedo del Océano Pacífico , en interacción con inestabilidad en niveles altos de la atmósfera, generarán lluvias puntuales muy fuertes con descargas eléctricas en Michoacán y Jalisco; y puntuales fuertes en...

title: Northern California forecast: Warm Wednesday expected, drop in temperatures later this week
content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. — Wednesday is expected to be slightly warmer than it has been this week so far in Northern California. Meteorologist Tamara Berg said the forecast high for downtown Sacramento this Wednesday is 94 degrees, which is average for this time of year. That's up from 92 degrees on Tuesday and a Monday that saw highs in the upper 80s. Across the region, high temperatures will range in the low-to-mid 90s. Berg said a weather system approaching this weekend will help the Delta breeze bring temperatures down. Weekend highs are likely to peak in the upper 80s. This week so far has seen temperatures either around the average for this time of year or somewhat below that. Berg said next week, however, appears to be much warmer in comparison. title: Luis Lacalle Pou aún no recibió el pedido de Cabildo Abierto para declarar la emergencia en seguridad
content: Cabildo Abierto (CA) propuso la declaración de una emergencia en seguridad que, según había confirmado su líder, Guido Manini Ríos, se lo comunicaría al presidente de la República, Luis Lacalle Pou , aunque todavía el mandatario no ha recibido noticias al respecto. Este martes Manini Ríos presentó la posibilidad de una declaración de emergencia en seguridad a la vez que también recomendó que las Fuerzas Armadas trabajen en conjunto con el Ministerio del Interior en la materia. La propuesta se encontraba siendo analizada por el partido, a la vez que se iban a comunicar con el presidente Lacalle Pou para conversar sobre el tema. Sin embargo, según confirmó Telenoche, el mandatario todavía no ha recibido noticias por parte del líder de Cabildo Abierto. La propuesta de Manini Ríos El candidato a presidente por Cabildo Abierto recordó que la seguridad fue una promesa de campaña de la Coalición Multicolor y por eso trajo la idea de una declaración de emergencia en seguridad. “Hay que estudiar la posibilidad de la declaratoria de la emergencia nacional en materia de seguridad, algo que estaba previsto en el compromiso por el país firmado en el año 2019”, dijo el candidato presidencial. Por otro lado, Manini Ríos propuso que las Fuerzas Armadas deberían tener un rol mayor en la seguridad y trabajar en conjunto con el Ministerio del Interior . "Un rol que no...

title: Собянин назвал постоянное перекладывание плитки в Москве «современной экономикой»
creator: ru@themoscowtimes.com
content: Ежегодная замена плитки и другое городское благоустройство является «неотъемлемой частью» современной экономики, заявил мэр Москвы Сергей Собянин на молодежном образовательном форуме «Территория смыслов». «По поводу экономики — много раз упрекают, что вы чрезмерно занимаетесь благоустройством города, зачем такие деньги тратите, эту плитку несчастную там кладете, перекладываете? Такой мем в городе: „Собянин копает эти тротуары бесконечно, потому что там Лужков клад зарыл“. На самом деле это так, но только не Лужков там зарыл — это современная экономика там зарыта. Когда на этом месте стояли ларьки и машины парковались, там не было людей, не было торговли, не было туристов», — ТАСС Собянина. По его словам, в Москве были снесены десятки тысяч ларьков, но благоустройство города окупается за счет туризма. Подобные городские проекты он назвал «экономическим чудом». «Сегодня, потратив 100 млрд на благоустройство, мы за год дополнительно имеем 120 млрд от туризма. У нас за год окупаются эти проекты, за год! И таких экономических чудес вряд ли где-то вы найдете», — уточнил мэр. Несмотря на доходы, столичные власти к резкому ухудшению состояния городского бюджета. В 2024–2026 гг. дефицит столичной казны составит рекордные 1,1 трлн рублей, говорится в утвержденном Мосгордумой проекте закона. В этом году при доходах 4,289 трлн рублей правительство Москвы намерено потратить...

title: Harvest of Harmony Alumni Band seeking additional members
creator: GRAND ISLAND AREA CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
content: Are you a former band member looking to relive the excitement and camaraderie of your marching band days? The Harvest of Harmony Alumni Band is seeking additional members to join us for this year’s festivities. Whether you played the trumpet, flute, drums, or any other instrument, we’d love to have you back on the field. It’s a fantastic opportunity to reconnect with old friends, make new ones, and be part of one of Grand Island’s most cherished traditions. The Aurora High School band marches in the 2023 Harvest of Harmony parade on Saturday, Oct. 7. Reconnect with fellow alumni, showcase your musical talents, and march in one of Grand Island’s most beloved parades. It’s an experience you won’t want to miss. To sign up or if you have any questions, please contact Scott Miller, Alumni Band Director, at 308-383-8300. Don’t miss out on the fun — register today. Receive the latest in local entertainment news in your inbox weekly!

title: TREBINjSKO KULTURNO LETO: Posle pozorišnog i filmskog festivala, na sceni džez majstori
content: U ORGANIZACIJI Kulturnog centra iz Trebinja, od 23. do 27.avusta, održaće se treći "Trebinje džez festival". Prve večeri na Crkvini, nastupiće poznati slovenački kantautor Zoran Predin sa koncertom "Zoran pjeva Arsena", na kome će izvoditi numere Arsena Dedića u "džipsi sving" maniru. Na festivalu će učestvovati pet bendova iz pet država, na pet različitih lokacija u gradu. Svoje veče imaće i poznati novosadski trombonista Nemanja Zlatarev sa svojom grupom i specijalnom gošćom Ksenijom Končetovom, nastupiće i pijanista Dušan Petrović sa svojim oktetom, mlade snage BiH scene predstavlja "Sarajevo džez gerila", a kultni beogradski rok bend "Kanda Kodža i Nebojša" održaće koncert poslednje festivalske večeri.

title: HOROR NA PUTU KOD ŠIDA! VOZAČ IZGOREO U AUTOMOBILU: Vatrogasci ugasili "ladu", ali čoveku nije bilo spasa (FOTO)
content: Jedna osona nastradala je danas oko 13.30 sati na ulasku u Bikića Do kod Šida kada se zapalio automobil marke "lada" u kom se osoba nalazila. Kako se saznaje, došlo je do samozapaljenja vozila. - U autu je bila samo jedna osoba, vozač. Kada je vozilo planulo, nije uspeo da izađe i nastradao je - rekao je izvor i dodao da je istraga u toku. Kako se može videti na fotografijama s mesta nesreće, automobil je potpuno ugljenisan, a pronađen je u kanalu kraj puta. A post shared by Sremska televizija (@sremskatelevizija) -. Auto se prvo zapalio u toku vožnje, pa je vozač, kako se veruje, zbog toga izgubio kontrolu i sleteo je s puta u kanal. Iz auta nije uspeo da izađe, iako je pokušavao, jer nije mogao da otvori vrata - objašnjava izvor Kurira. Na lice mesta brzo su došli vatrogasci, policija i Hitna pomoć. Vatrogasci su za kratko vreme uspeli da ugase plamen, ali nažalost vozaču nije bilo spasa. - Čovek je izgoreo u svom automobilu. Telo je maltene bilo ugljenosano - dodaje sagovornik Kurira i navodi da je telo prevezeno na obdukciju. - Još nije uzvrđen identitet nastradalog zbog stanja u kom se telo nalazilo, tako da je identifikacija u toku -. zaključuje naš izvor. title: Bassin d'Annonay. Fête de Burdignes, vogue de Saint-Alban-d'Ay : que faire ce week-end du 15 août ?
content: Les festivités du 15-Août se poursuivent vendredi 16, samedi 17 et dimanche 18 août. À Saint-Alban-d’Ay avec la vogue, à Préaux avec la deuxième journée du festival Yakila mais aussi à Lalouvesc. Dimanche, à Burdignes, ce sera la campagnarde fête de l’été, qui sera précédée d’une soirée de concerts. À Saint-Alban-d’Ay , retraite aux flambeaux à 20 h, place de l’Église. Bal Coachella des conscrits. À Saint-Félicien , concert “Paris en chansons” de la compagnie Patrice Péricard à 21 h, place de la salle des fêtes. À Préaux , festival Yakila : cirque à 11 h, théâtre de rue à 17 h, cinq concerts de 20 à 5 h (reggae dub, jazz fusion, rock psyché, trip, techno). Au boulodrome. À Lalouvesc , pétanque des pompiers et de l’Apel de Saint-Joseph à 13 h 30, bal à 21 h et fougot. Au boulodrome. À Burdignes , “concert d’été” organisé par Burdilao. Rock avec Grüki, musiques de l’Est avec Tram des Balkans, rock avec Talysker. À partir de 19 h, au centre du village. À Roiffieux , spectacle de cirque. À 17 h à L’Aparté. À Saint-Alban-d’Ay, à 11 h 30, course au baquet. Plateaux repas à réserver, animations l’après-midi, bal sudiste le soir. À Lalouvesc , concert de musique lyrique avec Le Jeune orchestre baroque européen. À 20 h 30 à la basilique. À Burdignes , fête d’été avec labours à cheval, chiens de troupeaux, manèges d’enfants,...

Described by Roman as 'simple but elegant', this charming piece also boasts glowing reviews from wearers, securing an impressive 4.9-star average out of five. Sporting a classic round neckline, angelic short sleeves that reach the elbows, and a skirt that graciously skims the figure, the dress' unique floral print is set off by a contrasting border hem for a showstopping look that pairs effortlessly with a trusty denim jacket and chic flat sandals. function loadOvpScript(){let...

title: OGROMAN UDARAC ZA MADRIĐANE! Jedan od najboljih fudbalera se UŽASNO POVREDIO na treningu - evo kolika ga pauza čeka!
content: Vezista fudbalskog kluba Real Madrida, Francuz Eduardo Kamavinga , uganuo je unutrašnji ligament levog kolena tokom treninga i verovatno neće moći da igra nekoliko nedelja, saopštio je danas madridski klub. "Posle danas obavljenih testova našem igraču Eduardu Kamavingi, dijagnostikovano je uganuće unutrašnjeg kolateralnog ligamenta levog kolena", naveo je Real Madrid koji nije precizirao koliko dugo igrač neće moći da igra. Španski mediji su preneli da bi Kamavinga mogao da bude odsutan sa terena šest do sedam nedelja. Kamavinga je ostao na zemlji držeći levu nogu na treningu posle kontakta sa Orelijenom Čuamenijem uoči finala Superkupa Evrope protiv Atalante večeras od 21.00. Ta povreda predstavlja težak udarac za aktuelnog španskog i evropskog šampiona, koji će možda morati da angažuje dodatnog vezistu, posle odlaska Nemca Tonija Krosa, koji nije zamenjen. title: Uống 1 thứ thay nước lọc nhiều năm, người đàn ông 35 tuổi nhập viện cấp cứu vì biến chứng tiểu đường
content: Theo bác sĩ Hồng Bình Bình, bác sĩ điều trị tại Khoa Nội tiết của Bệnh viện Trung ương Thiệu Hưng, Chiết Giang Trung Quốc, bệnh nhân Trần Lăng Dương (35 tuổi) nhập viện trong tình trạng đau bụng dữ dội, buồn nôn và nôn mửa. Sau khi thực hiện xét nghiệm, bác sĩ phát hiện chỉ số đường huyết của bệnh nhân cao bất thường, chẩn đoán nhiễm toan ceton do biến chứng tiểu đường và viêm tụy cấp. Khi khai thác về tiền sử bệnh, bác sĩ Hồng phát hiện bệnh nhân thích ăn đồ ngọt và có thói quen uống nước ngọt có ga thay cho nước lọc. Thậm chí, bệnh nhân còn uống 2 lon nước ngọt mỗi tối trước khi đi ngủ. Thói quen này đã kéo dài trong nhiều năm. Theo lời kể của gia đình, bệnh nhân Trần từng bị béo phì nhưng vài tháng gần đây, cân nặng của anh bỗng giảm dần xuống dù không tập luyện hay ăn kiêng. Anh Trần đã giảm 30kg so với cân nặng trước kia. Một tháng trước khi nhập viện, anh Trần xuất hiện thêm các triệu chứng mờ mắt, kèm theo đó là các triệu chứng khô miệng, thường xuyên khát nước. Tuy nhiên, bệnh nhân không mấy bận tâm tới các triệu chứng này. Chỉ đến khi bị đau bụng dữ dội, nôn mửa, bệnh...

title: Ćevap zvanično brendiran
content: Grad Sarajevo je proceduru pokrenuo 2022. godine. Prošle godine je gradonačelnica glavnog grada Bosne i Hercegovine Benjamina Karić to učinila sa direktorom Agencije za sigurnost hrane BiH Džemilom Hajrićem, a sve kako bi se sarajevski ćevap brendirao kao autohtoni domaći proizvod. "Jako sam zadovoljna sa do sada preduzetim aktivnostima koje smo za pokrenuli za vreme našeg mandata. Grad je učinio i više što se od njega očekivalo. Ranije niko nije delovao u tom pravcu“, rekla je tada Karić. Nakon što je procedura i zvanično završena Karić se oglasila na Fejsbuku "Sa radošću delim sa vama informaciju da je okončana procedura zaštite sarajevskih ćevapa kao autohtonog domaćeg proizvoda. Proceduru je Grad Sarajevo pokrenuo još 2022. godine, a sada je u saradnji sa sarajevskim ćevabdžijama i Agencijom za sigurnost hrane BiH završena", navela je gradonačelnica Sarajeva. Na kraju se zahvalila direktoru Agencije za sigurnost hrane Džemilu Hajriću, kao i sarajvskim ćevabdžijama koji su razumeli i podržali ovu inicijativu. Podeli:

title: Xander Schauffele shows true character after Scottie Scheffler made him cry
creator: Tom Sunderland
content: Xander Schauffele was emotional after passing the Olympic torch at Paris 2024 (Image: Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images) Xander Schauffele displayed remarkable sportsmanship despite missing out on golf glory at the Paris 2024 Olympics . Schauffele, 30, came up just short in his bid to become the first double Olympic gold medallist in his sport. That near miss saw one of this year's top performers briefly succumb to disappointment, especially after he held a joint lead entering the fourth and final round. However, his fortunes took a turn when Scottie Scheffler's stunning nine-under-par 62 clinched the title in dramatic circumstances . Yet rather than dwell on what could have been during a medal ceremony in which he did not feature, Schauffele found himself celebrating the triumphs of his compatriot. The Mirror reported how the golfer experienced an unexpected surge of joy amid the emotions on display and national anthems. title: Menstrual health advocacy: Expert demands policy changes and better accessibility
content: Menstrual health advocacy has gained significant traction in recent years, focusing on improving education , resources , and support for menstruating individuals. Despite progress, challenges persist, especially in rural and underserved areas. Organizations and experts are leading efforts to distribute menstrual products and provide education in schools and communities. "I believe that menstrual health is a fundamental human right," said Shobhini, an innovator and educator who is also the founder of Swasthina. Notably, Shobhini’s modified incinerators have been adopted by the supplier of vending machines to the government of Rajasthan under the Laadli scheme, enhancing environmental protection through effective waste management. Key accomplishments include installing menstrual pad vending machines and modified incinerators in multiple government schools. These initiatives have greatly reduced the negative impact of unsafe disposal of biohazardous waste from used menstrual pads, she reportedly said. Shobhini said the importance of education in combating the stigma surrounding menstruation. "Menstrual education empowers individuals to understand and control their bodies, debunking myths and reducing shame." "Providing free or subsidized products can significantly improve lives," she added.

title: Σπάνια αντικείμενα του Τιτανικού φυλάσσονται σε μυστική αποθήκη: Οι άγνωστες ιστορίες τους, δείτε βίντεο
content: Μια τσάντα φτιαγμένη από δέρμα αλιγάτορα και μερικά μικροσκοπικά φιαλίδια που εξακολουθούν να αναδύουν έντονο άρωμα είναι μερικά μόνο από τα άγνωστα αντικείμενα που ανασύρθηκαν από το ναυάγιο του και φυλάσσονται σε μυστική τοποθεσία στις ΗΠΑ. Η ακριβής τοποθεσία της αποθήκης όπου φυλάσσονται αποτελεί επτασφράγιστο μυστικό, λόγω της μεγάλης αξίας του περιεχομένου της, σύμφωνα με το BBC. «Το μόνο που μπορούμε να πούμε είναι ότι βρίσκεται κάπου στην , στις ΗΠΑ». Το BBC είχε την ευκαιρία να μπει στην εν λόγω εγκατάσταση αποθήκευσης και να ανακαλύψει τις ιστορίες που κρύβονται πίσω από μερικά από αυτά τα αντικείμενα. «Είναι μια πραγματικά όμορφη, μοντέρνα μικρή τσάντα» λέει η διευθύντρια συλλογών για την RMS Titanic, την εταιρεία που έχει ανακτήσει αυτά τα αντικείμενα. Η αμερικανική εταιρεία έχει τα δικαιώματα διάσωσης του πλοίου και με την πάροδο των ετών έχει ανασύρει 5.500 αντικείμενα από τον τόπο του ναυαγίου, μια επιλογή από τα οποία εκτίθεται σε όλο τον κόσμο. Η τσάντα είναι φτιαγμένη από δέρμα αλιγάτορα, που έχει επιβιώσει δεκαετίες στα βάθη του Βόρειου Ατλαντικού. Τα αντικείμενα μέσα της έχουν επίσης διατηρηθεί, αποκαλύπτοντας λεπτομέρειες της ζωής της ιδιοκτήτριά της, μίας επιβάτιδος τρίτης θέσης ονόματι Μάριαν Μίνγουελ. «Ήταν μια 63χρονη μοδίστρα,...

title: MONSTRUM DUG 3 METRA VREBA U PLIĆAKU Zbog ovog snimka, mnogi se ne usuđuju da odu na plažu! (VIDEO)
content: Australija je puna jedinstvenih životinjskih vrsta za koje se često čini da postoje samo da bi uplašile ljude. Među njima su i veliki crvi koji žive ispod površine peščanih plaža u Australiji. Društvenim mrežama kruže snimci ribolovaca koji pecaju ove crve da bi ih koristili kao mamac i čini se da se Australijanci polako navikavaju na drugu životinjsku vrstu koja izgleda kao da je izašla iz noćnih mora. U pitanju je ogroman crv koji može da poraste i do 300 cm, koji ima veliku čeljust namenjenu za hvatanje plena. Njihove mandibule su oštre i snažne, što im omogućava da brže uhvate i seciraju svoj plen. Na snimku koji je izazvao gađenje i paniku vidi se čovek na plaži koji spušta do peska komad ribe. Tada iz peska izviruje glava crva, na miris svežeg plena, a onda ga čovek izvlači iz peska. U pitanju jako dug crv, koji nalikuje zmiji. Mnogi ljudi su prestravljeni i pitaju se da li im ovaj crv može nauditi kada ulaze u vodu... Mnogi stoga komentarišu da im je gledanjem ovog videa "otključan novi strah" pored svih ostalih kada je more u pitanju. (b92) BONUS VIDEO PROČITAJTE KLIKOM OVDE NAJVAŽNIJE AKTUELNE VESTI

title: REMOVERY TO PROVIDE 150 FREE TATTOO REMOVAL PACKAGES TO COMMEMORATE THE INAUGURAL WORLD TATTOO REMOVAL DAY
content: On August 14 , the world's tattoo removal experts will provide 150 treatments to individuals in need across their global studio locations AUSTIN, Texas , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- To bring awareness to the safety, efficacy and accessibility of tattoo removal treatment, Removery is presenting the first-ever World Tattoo Removal Day on August 14, 2024 . "We've seen tremendous growth in demand for tattoo removal over the last few years, but there are still many folks out there that don't know removal treatment is even an option. World Tattoo Removal Day is an opportunity to spread the word and celebrate the transformative journey of tattoo removal," said Tom Weber , Removery's co-founder and CEO. To mark the inaugural day, Removery is providing free complete removal treatment packages to 150 individuals in need who have applied for its INK-nitiative program across its global studio locations in the United States , Canada and Australia , with the intent to continue this tradition annually. Removery's INK-nitiative community outreach program launched in 2020 on National Tattoo Day and is designed to provide safe, effective and free tattoo removal on an ongoing basis to those with barriers to accessing treatment including individuals who were formerly incarcerated, former gang members, survivors of human trafficking and those who wish to remove hate symbols or racist tattoos....

title: Θεσσαλονίκη: Φωτιά σε τουριστικό λεωφορείο στον Περιφερειακό
content: Φωτιά σημειώθηκε σήμερα (14/8) το μεσημέρι σε τουριστικό λεωφορείο στην Περιφερειακή Οδό της Θεσσαλονίκης , μετά την έξοδο της Νεάπολης, στο ρεύμα προς τα ανατολικά. Η πυροσβεστική προχώρησε στην κατάσβεση της φωτιάς, ωστόσο στο σημείο ισχύουν κυκλοφοριακές ρυθμίσεις, λόγω λαδιών που έπεσαν στο οδόστρωμα. Από το συμβάν δεν σημειώθηκε κάποιος τραυματισμός.

title: I went to Taylor Swift's Eras Tour and these are 5 things Swifties need to know
content: The ‘You Belong With Me’ singer was previously in the capital in June for three dates, and I was lucky enough to get tickets to the star's shows. Being a fan of Swift since I was eight years old, I remember the first time I heard her sing. She performed on the late Steve Wright’s show where she played ‘Teardrops on My Guitar’ and I was immediately mesmerised. At that moment, I became a lifelong fan. Since I first heard that song, I’ve been a ‘Swiftie’ throughout her Grammy-winning career. I have brought all her albums, own the All Too Well (Taylor’s Version) Red scarf and seen her on the 1989 World Tour in London’s Hyde Park. Unable to afford tickets to her Reputation tour, I made it my mission to save up and get tickets to see her again for the Eras Tour. A post shared by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) After waiting nearly 10 years and with the help of the Midnights Pre-sale, I was able to do just that and was lucky enough to bag two shows, for 'nosebleed tickets' and standing in June. Now, in just a few days, thousands more Swifties will be able to see the ‘Mean’ singer and her three-hour Eras show for possibly the first time. But before you do, here are some things you need to know as a Swiftie who has already seen the star in London. If you can, try and buy your merch before going to the show and then go back to your accommodation to get ready. I stayed in a hotel a little...

title: Tropical Storm Ernesto drenches Puerto Rico, forecast to be major hurricane near Bermuda
creator: Michelle Marchante - Miami Herald (TNS)
content: MIAMI — Tropical Storm Ernesto is forecast to strengthen into a hurricane Wednesday in the Atlantic’s warm waters after drenching Puerto Rico with “torrential rainfall” overnight, forecasters say. Ernesto is continuing to douse Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands with flooding rain early Wednesday as it pulls away and heads north into the Atlantic’s open waters, according to the National Hurricane Center. Ernesto’s center moved over the Virgin Islands Tuesday night and was north of Puerto Rico early Wednesday, the forecast track shows. The storm is on the cusp of turning into a hurricane, with maximum sustained winds near 70 mph. Ernesto needs to have maximum sustained winds of at least 74 mph to be a Category 1 hurricane. “While it is possible Ernesto is already a hurricane, radar data does not yet support an upgrade. ... Two Hurricane Hunter aircraft are scheduled to be in the system later this morning,” according to the National Hurricane Center. Forecasters expect Ernesto will strengthen into a hurricane Wednesday over the open water as it treks north, with the forecast calling for a Category 2 with maximum sustained winds near 110 by the time it nears Bermuda on Saturday. “Ernesto is likely to bring impacts to Bermuda late this week, and interests there should monitor the progress of this system,” the hurricane center said. Where is Ernesto? The storm was about 125 miles...

title: It’s official: a new Lenovo Chromebook Duet is coming soon
creator: Robby Payne
content: Yep, you are reading that right! After months of heavy speculation and detective work, the new Chromebook tablet from Lenovo is now out in the open for all to see. Sure, it’s still a tad bit hidden and only viewable if you know where to look (we got a heads-up from a reader), but the name of it is out there in public repositories, and I have to imagine its launch is just around the corner at this point. Back to the basics The images below are from cros.tech and Chromium Dash, and both of these sites pull directly from Google’s ChromeOS update servers. Between the two, there’s no denying now that the same ‘Ciri’ we’ve been tracking for quite some time is nearing launch as the Lenovo Chromebook Duet. advertisement via cros.tech via Chromium Dash For the time being, it seems Lenovo is going away from the Duet 3 and Duet 5 naming scheme and back to the simple Chromebook Duet just like we saw in the first iteration back in 2020. That device was a massive success for Lenovo, so cleaning up the naming scheme a bit isn’t too surprising this time around. As we’ve covered before, this new detachable will come bearing the new MediaTek Kompanio 838 processor (shown by its internal name MT8188G above) and should present a big performance leap over the current crop of Chromebook tablets. While we don’t expect it to be a performance monster, it will represent a large step forward for...

title: Katy Perry investigated for possibly damaging sand dunes in ‘Lifetimes’ video
creator: Olivia Land
content: She’s gonna hear them roar. Katy Perry is being investigated by the Spanish government for allegedly filming the music video for her new single “Lifetimes” on ecologically sensitive sand dunes without permission. Scenes from the video — which was mostly filmed on the islands of Ibiza and Formentera — are believed to have been posed on protected dunes on the tiny, uninhabited isle of S’Espalmador, the BBC reported . The production company behind the video, WeOwnTheCity, did not secure permission to film at the location, the environmental department of the Balearic Islands claimed . The department is looking into potential damage on the dunes, which are marked off by a rope. The Stillz-directed video does not count as a crime against the environment, because commercial videos and photographs at the dunes can be permitted upon request, the officials noted. As of Wednesday morning, Perry had not addressed the allegations. WeOwnTheCity did not immediately return The Post’s request for a comment on the investigation. The 1.8-mile stretch of S’Espalmador has been part of the Ses Salines de Ibiza and Formentera natural park since 1980, the Guardian reported . The dunes on the privately owned island are the area’s best-preserved dune system and are of “great ecological value,” according to the regional government’s website. The investigation is the latest blow for Perry, who is...

title: Φωτιά τώρα στις Δρυμάδες Ιωαννίνων
Vikrant Massey supports inDrive’s campaign - “Ride to Donate” in collaboration with Cry India
content: New Delhi: In an effort to make a meaningful impact on communities in need, inDrive is proud to announce its partnership with Cry India to drive the Ride to Donate campaign. Through Ride to Donate, inDrive users expressed their support for this initiative simply by using the inDrive app for their transportation needs. The “Ride-to-Donate” project aimed to donate 10% fare of every fourth ride to Cry India, to support underprivileged kids through education, development programs & other children welfare initiatives. The "Ride to Donate" campaign was active during the month of July 2024, during which over 1 lakh users across Delhi NCR, Kolkata, and Chandigarh participated. The primary beneficiaries of this initiative were 500+ underprivileged children who will be provided with essential educational resources, development programs, and healthcare support. The funds raised, amounting to INR 34,00,000, were directed towards various CRY India projects focusing on improving educational infrastructure and providing scholarships to these children. Avik Karmakar, Senior Marketing Manager - South Asia, inDrive said “ Through Ride To Donate” campaign we want to Challenge Injustice happening in the society where a lot of childhood dreams & opportunities either get broken or stolen which is the bare minimum need - The Right to Education. We donated INR 34,00,000 to help kids through CRY...

title: President Droupadi Murmu addresses nation on eve of 78th Independence Day | WATCH
content: President Droupadi Murmu addressed the nation on the eve of the 78th Independence Day on Wednesday, August 15. During her address, she extended her Independence Day greetings to the people of the country. The President also expressed her delight at the nation's preparations to celebrate its 78th Independence Day. She also emphasised the joy and excitement of witnessing the tricolour unfurling, whether at the Red Fort, state capitals or in local neighbourhoods. "It always thrills our hearts," President Murmu said, highlighting that this occasion represents a profound expression of national pride and unity, shared by over 1.4 billion fellow Indians. "Just as we celebrate various festivals with our families, we celebrate our Independence Day and Republic Day with our family which comprises our fellow citizens. On the 15th of August, in all parts of the country and also abroad, Indians participate in the flag-hoisting ceremonies, sing patriotic songs, and distribute sweets. Young children participate in cultural events. When we hear them talking about our great nation and about the privilege of being a citizen of it, we find in their words echoes of what our great freedom fighters used to say. Then we realise that we are part of a chain that binds the dreams of those who participated in the freedom struggle and the aspirations of those who will witness the nation regaining its...

title: बिना अनुमति चल रहे नर्सिंग होम पर कार्रवाई:महिला डॉक्टर के खिलाफ कोतवाली थाने में FIR दर्ज
content: शाजापुर के हाट मैदान रोड वार्ड नंबर 4 दरगाह के सामने स्थित निजी क्लिनिक सर्वोत्तम सुयश फर्टिलिटी सेंटर पर डिलीवरी किए जाने की शिकायत लगातार कलेक्टर को मिल रही थी। कलेक्टर के आदेश पर जिला प्रशासन एवं स्वास्थ्य विभाग की टीम ने संयुक्त कार्रवाई की थी। टीम ने कई अनियमितता पाई थी, जिसमें मुख्य रूप से गर्भपात एवं बिना अनुमति निजी क्लिनिक पर नर्सिंग होम का संचालन करना पाया गया। इसके बाद कलेक्टर के आदेश पर क्लिनिक संचालक डॉक्टर स्मिता सिंह के खिलाफ सीएमएचओ ने कोतवाली थाने में आवेदन दिया। कोतवाली पुलिस ने डॉक्टर स्मिता सिंह पति अजित सिंह के खिलाफ भारतीय न्याय संहिता 2023 की धारा 125,125 (a) एंव धारा 125 (b) के तहत मामला दर्ज किया। मामला दर्ज होने के बाद से महिला डॉक्टर फरार है।

title: New Samsung offer gives free £599 projector when you buy Galaxy Z Fold 6
creator: Olivia Garrett
content: With the Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold on sale this week it looks like Samsung is squaring up to its closest competitor with a brand-new phone deal. Having released their latest foldable phone – the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 – just last month, the tech company has now put an impressive new offer on the table. Right now, customers who buy the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 will get a free Samsung Freestyle projector to go with it. This projector has a usual RRP of £599, and can be used to turn any living room, garden or cosy space into a home cinema. With a screen size from 30 to 100-inches, powerful 360-degree sound, and smart TV capabilities, this projector regularly features on our technology best lists, like the best budget projectors . Meanwhile the Z Fold 6 has proved worth its salt, as its 15% thinner and 10g lighter than its predecessors, as well as having an impressive camera and advanced AI features. This deal is available until the 22nd of August and if you've been waiting to get a new phone, we think it's more than worth it. title: Hasta los grandes fondos del mundo están aumentando su exposición a bitcoin
creator: Glenda González
content: Hechos clave: El fondo invirtió indirectamente en bitcoin a través de empresas vinculadas con BTC. El capital está fluyendo a compañías como MicroStrategy y Marathon Digital, por ejemplo. El Fondo de Pensiones Global del Gobierno de Noruega (Norwegian Government Pension Fund Global o NBIM), considerado el mayor fondo de pensiones soberano del mundo, registra un crecimiento de más de 400% en su exposición indirecta a bitcoin (BTC) en alrededor de dos años. Se trata de un crecimiento que se atribuye a una estrategia de diversificación de riesgos que llevó a la empresa a exponerse indirectamente a la moneda digital desde el año 2022. Esto, a través de la inversión en acciones empresas que poseen BTC en sus tesorerías . También te podría interesar Binance vuelve a estar disponible en Venezuela tras días de bloqueo 14 agosto, 2024 Goldman Sachs posee USD 400 millones en bitcoin a través de ETF 14 agosto, 2024 Tal como explica en X Vetle Lunde, analista de K33, el aumento se debe a ajustes más amplios de la cartera de inversiones y no a iniciativas directas para aumentar las tenencias de Bitcoin. «Es probable que el crecimiento se origine en una ponderación sectorial predeterminada basada en algoritmos y en la diversificación del riesgo. Es poco probable que se deba a una elección intencional de acumular exposición: si el objetivo fuera una mayor exposición a...

title: Welsh Fire put one foot in Hundred final as Hayley Matthews seals knockout berth
content: Report Welsh Fire put one foot in Hundred final as Hayley Matthews seals knockout berth Captain Tammy Beaumont's unbeaten half-century secures nine-wicket win at Southern Brave ECB Media 14-Aug-2024 • 1 hr ago Hayley Matthews finished with 4 for 14 • ECB via Getty Images {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://img1.hscicdn.com/image/upload/f_auto/lsci/db/PICTURES/CMS/386100/386126.4.jpg","caption":"Hayley Matthews finished with 4 for 14"} Welsh Fire 106 for 1 (Beaumont 59*, Matthews 35*) beat Southern Brave 103 (Tryon 55, Matthews 4-14, Jonassen 3-21) by nine wickets Hayley Matthews continued her remarkable all-round form as Welsh Fire cruised to a commanding nine-wicket victory over bottom side Southern Brave at the Utilita Bowl, the result guaranteeing the Fire a top-three place and progression to The Hundred's knockout stage. The Barbadian, opening the bowling, delivered figures of 4 for 14 with her offbreaks, before her unbeaten 35, in the slipstream of Tammy Beaumont 's 59 not out off 40 balls, helped the visitors knock off their target with 26 balls to spare. Fire are now in a strong position, due to their superior net run rate, to finish in top spot and qualify automatically for the Hundred Final at Lord's on Sunday. title: Mnangagwa, Zimbabwe, Not Fit to Lead SADC
creator: Vitalio Angula
content: President Emmerson Mnangagwa will head the 16-member regional bloc notwithstanding reports of repression, assaults and crackdowns on members of the opposition and civil society organisations in the country. According to a ZimLive news report of 17 June, “Citizens for Coalition for Change faction leader Jameson Timba, his 19-year-old son and close to 70 other party activists were arrested on Sunday while gathered at his residence”. Ironically, the event at Timba’s home was to commemorate the Day of the African Child. The day is observed annually to mark the death of hundreds of schoolgoing youth killed by South Africa’s apartheid government while protesting plans to impose Afrikaans as a medium of instruction for black pupils. It is unthinkable that less than 50 years since the Soweto uprisings, the commemoration of that day would become a crime in Zimbabwe for those who oppose the leadership of Mnanganwa and his ruling Zanu-PF Party. On Wednesday, 24 July, 10 members of the Zimbabwe National Students’ Union (Zinasu) were injured and 44 others arrested after anti-riot police raided a private meeting at the Zesa Training Centre in the capital, Harare. Injuries included cracked bones and deep lacerations. A week later, on 31 July, “four human rights activists, Namatai Kwekweza, Robson Chere, Samuel Gwenzi and Vusumuzi Moyo were forced off a departing plane at the Harare Airport...

title: Huawei’s Upcoming Tri-Fold Smartphone Tipped to Carry a Hefty Price Tag at Launch
content: Huawei is expected to be developing a tri-fold smartphone and a prototype of the purported device was recently spotted in the hands of a top official at the company. While there is no timeline regarding its launch or information about what it could offer, a claim on social media has suggested its exorbitant price. As per the claims, the development prototype of the handset costs about $4,900 (roughly Rs. 4, 11,000) and the Chinese company is said to be looking for ways to bring its price down. The information comes from a post on X (formerly Twitter) by user @jasonwill101 who suggested that while the prototype of Huawei's tri-fold smartphone commands an exorbitant price, the production model may not be much cheaper in comparison. The mass-market handset is speculated to cost CNY 29,000 or about $4,000 (roughly Rs. 3,35,000). Currently, the cost of Huawei's tri-fold engineering prototype is over 35,000 RMB, and the company is continuously working on reducing costs. The anticipated retail price for the mass-produced model is set at 29,000 RMB($4000) pic.twitter.com/2JBvtx9IIN If this pricing turns out to be true, it would make the tri-fold smartphone the most expensive mass-market handset. It could cost more than twice what other foldable smartphones, such as the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 cost. Despite this high price, it may not offer the internals to back it up. The purported...

title: Foreign woman ‘raped’ in Islamabad
creator: Web Desk
content: ISLAMABAD: A man has been arrested for allegedly raping a foreign woman for five days in Islamabad, ARY News reported citing police. The police have taken one accused namely Tamizuddin into custody and shifted him to Poly Clinic for medical checkup. According to police, the accused was arrested from his residence on the identification of the rape victim. The accused; however, refuted the allegation and termed that the foreign woman as ‘mentally ill’. The Islamabad police said that the 28-year-old foreign woman belongs to Belgium, who has been shifted to Poly Clinic Hospital for a medical checkup. According to the police, the foreign woman does not have identification or travel documents. The investigators said that they will search the woman’s documents at Tamizuddin’s residence. Read More: WOMAN ‘GANG-RAPED’ ON BOARD KARACHI-BOUND TRAIN BY RAILWAY STAFFERS In her initial statement, the affected woman said that she was subjected to sexual abuse for five days. Earlier in a similar incident reported on June 8, another foreign woman was allegedly raped by a security guard, deployed for her security, in Islamabad’s G-6/4 area. The incident occurred within the limits of Abbpara police station. Santa Cruz recula y suspende el carril bus para acceder a Las Teresitas
creator: Eloísa Reverón
content: Aunque la intención del Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz de era, en un principio, mantener el carril bus para acceder a la , finalmente éste ha reculado y ha decidido . El anuncio de los vecinos y de las empresas del pueblo de sobre la , a partir del lunes 19 de agosto, para exigir al Consistorio que pusiera fin a la misma ha surtido efecto. La , tal y como adelantó , ha recibido numerosas quejas debido a la habilitación de un carril exclusivo para guaguas para llegar a la playa chicharrera, "porque se siguen formando y porque se elimina una importante cantidad de plazas de aparcamiento en el pueblo". Los vecinos y los empresarios han reclamado "medidas reales" al Ayuntamiento. Este miércoles, 14 de agosto, tras varias horas de reunión, el área de Movilidad ha optado por dar por concluida la prueba piloto del carril bus a Las Teresitas. El área de Movilidad en el Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz, que dirige la edil Evelyn Alonso (CC), argumenta que , al tiempo que anuncia que se seguirá trabajando para implementar alternativas que" garanticen la accesibilidad de los vecinos de San Andrés y del tránsito de los residentes en los pueblos y caseríos de Anaga". El área de Movilidad del Consistorio empezó a probar esta nueva medida a principios de julio, durante los fines de semana. Según la Corporación local, la para guaguas para acceder a la playa de Las Teresitas estaba...

title: דיווח: מתקפת סייבר גדולה על בנקים באיראן
content: הערוץ "איראן אינטרנשיונל", המזוהה עם האופוזיציה ופועל מלונדון, דיווח כי "בוצעה מתקפת סייבר משמעותית נגד הבנק המרכזי של איראן ונגד בנקים נוספים במדינה, מה שגרם לשיבושים במערכת הבנקאות במדינה". לפי הדיווח, "ייתכן שזו מתקפת הסייבר הגדולה ביותר שכוונה לטהרן עד כה".

title: 白營假帳疑雲連環爆!1筆96萬餐費 陳智菡夫妻被抓包澄清說法不一
content: 14日又爆出柯文哲競總在大選前申報一筆高達96萬的餐費,而且支出對象竟然是一家早就在去年歇業的便當店,許甫趕忙貼出發票單據,聲稱這其實是2筆錢,一筆960元,一筆110元,但申報時誤登成960110元。(圖翻攝自林延鳳、許甫臉書,本報合成) 祝蘭蕙/核稿編輯 〔即時新聞/綜合報導〕民眾黨主席柯文哲總統大選經費爭議持續延燒,如今又有「支線」被爆出來!獨立網路平台「沃草」、民進黨台北市議員林延鳳今天(14日)先後披露柯文哲競總在今年1月13日總統大選登場前申報了一筆高達96萬的餐費,支出對象竟然是一家早就在去年歇業的便當店。該消息曝光後,民眾黨副秘書長許甫、時任柯競總發言人陳智菡這對夫妻火速跳出來澄清,結果被抓包2人說法有所出入,且都沒有回答到為何要向一家早就關門的便當店下單,引發網路又一波熱議。 沃草平台和林延鳳今晚先後分別在Threads和臉書上發文指出,經查政治獻金平台資料,柯文哲於今年1月7日,也就是選前最後一個週日,在「大愛素食天地」支出了一筆96萬110元的的餐費,從店家統編「48776781」可以找到這間「大愛素食天地」的營業地址是「台北市中正區濟南路2段」,但Google上的資訊顯示該店已經永久歇業。沃草平台還特別詢問周邊商家,初步得到的答案是約莫1、2年前歇業,另外撥打店家電話也已經是空號。 請繼續往下閱讀... 林延鳳則翻到該便當店的Google評論,可以看到約1年前就有消費者留言,表示店家似乎已經暫停營業。查看街景進行比對,可以看到原本是「大愛素食天地」的店址於2023年3月似乎變成一家咖啡廳。林延鳳質疑,「高達96萬的餐費,如果一杯100元,那天要訂9600杯,有可能嗎?如果有,是給誰喝?超過30元就是賄選。規模不大的店家,96萬可能是一個月的營業額,為什麼柯文哲一天就在那間咖啡廳花96萬?」 林延鳳進一步表示,「賴清德總統的申報紀錄也有這家店,三筆加總才5100元。我合理懷疑,柯文哲你們不是只有大額發票有問題,連小額的都不堪檢驗、臭不堪聞!希望檢調單位真的要好好把他們的帳務一筆筆查清楚。」 對此,許甫火速透過臉書公開「96萬便當的真相」,繼續將鍋推給會計師,「單據都有留存,結果又是誤登!監察院的申報系統,接連輸入2筆帳目,上一欄輸入110(元),下一欄應該輸入為960(元),但因為沒有清除,就成了960110元。為何如此荒唐的錯誤,卻發生在委任外包的會計事務所『記帳登打至監院申報系統』!會計應該是很專業的事,這回競總所託付的對象,一再讓人感受到天下沒有不可能的事。」 陳智菡今日上資深媒體人黃光芹於名嘴朱學恒YT「萬事通事務所」主持的節目「阿姐反抗軍」,也針對96萬便當給出回應,但明顯和老公許甫的說詞有出入,「我看到96萬餐費我就想說,天哪!怎麼會有96萬,一天是幾個人的便當?結果後來一查,又是誤報!其實是好像9萬多,打成96萬。」黃光芹則搭腔:「被這個端木正害死了,被這個會計事務所害死!」 網友紛紛搖頭,「要不要先對一下辯詞阿,說法都不一樣耶」、「這對夫妻真的被人看破手腳,笑死人了」、「重點是人家都歇業了,怎麼開得出發票?」、「哪家公司可以拿9萬的發票報成96萬的帳,會計還會閉著眼睛付錢的?不要再扯了啦!」、「小草們真的相信會計師會犯這種錯誤?」、「為什麼他們講這些都不會笑場?」、「夫妻倆要不要聽聽看自己在講什麼!」...

title: The Best Japanese Sunscreens For All-Day Sun Protection
creator: Iman Balagam
content: The beauty community may be abuzz right now over the latest in K-beauty, but Japan is just as much a hub of skincare innovation as its neighbour. Japanese sunscreens, in particular, shine, with many travellers stocking up on their trips to the island – or going as far as asking friends to bring these coveted cosmetic staples back as souvenirs. The best Japanese sunscreens at a glance Japan has strict sunscreen regulations to ensure high standards and qualities for safety and effectiveness. “Many brands in Japan use advanced UV filters and innovative technology to make sunscreen hypoallergenic and multifunctional, meaning it can nourish your skin, moisturise, protect your skin from pollution, and even work like a primer,” explains licensed aesthetician Kyoko Getz. Japanese sunscreens also offer a sensorial experience, often featuring a milky, lightweight texture that effortlessly melts into the skin. Similar to Korean sunscreens , they frequently incorporate skin-nourishing ingredients like hyaluronic acid and antioxidants. “These additives bolster sun protection and contribute to overall skin health, providing hydration and combating signs of ageing,” says licensed aesthetician Erica Choi. Keep reading for ten of our favourite Japanese sunscreens. In this story Best overall: Shiseido Urban Environment Oil-Free SPF 30 Best hybrid: Anessa Perfect UV Sunscreen Best for layering:...

title: Gazze'de korkunç insanlık dramı: Can kaybı 40 bine dayandı
content: , Şeridi'nde 313 gündür katliamlarına devam ediyor. Sağlık Bakanlığından yapılan açıklamada, İsrail'in 24 saatte gerçekleştirdiği 2 saldırıda 36 Filistinlinin daha hayatını kaybettiği, 54 Filistinlinin de yaralandığı bildirildi. Saldırıların başladığı 7 Ekim'den bu yana toplam can kaybının 39 bin 965'e, yaralı sayısının ise 92 bin 294'e yükseldiği ifade edildi. Siyonizm karşıtı örgüt Jewish Voice for Peace (Barış için Yahudi Sesi), BM uydu verilerini kullanarak İsrail'in 7 Ekim'den bu yana Gazze Şeridi'ne attığı 70 binden fazla bombanın haritasını çıkardı. Yapılan paylaşımda, "İsrail ordusu Gazze'nin neredeyse her santimetresini ABD yapımı bombalarla vurdu. İsrail güçleri son 10 ayda Gazze'ye 70 binden fazla bomba attı. Gazze'de İsrail bombardımanının dokunmadığı yer neredeyse kalmadı. Bu harita, İsrail'in Gazze'deki yıkımının büyük boyutunu ortaya koyuyor. Her kırmızı nokta, İsrail kuvvetlerinin 7 Ekim 2023-6 Temmuz 2024 arasında bombaladığı bir binayı gösteriyor. Geçtiğimiz 10 ayda İsrail ordusunun okullar, mülteci kampları, hastaneler, camiler, kiliseler ve belirlenmiş insani yardım bölgeleri dahil olmak üzere Gazze'deki tüm yaşamı kasıtlı olarak hedef aldığına tanık olduk" denildi. Paylaşımda ayrıca, "İsrail ordusu, ABD'nin iş birlikçisi olarak siyonizmin hedefini gerçekleştiriyor: Filistinlilerin topraklarından tamamen...

title: Ortadoğu'da beklenti ve taleplerin odak noktası
content: Washington yönetimi Ankara'nın diplomasi yeteneğini bir kez daha ortaya koymasını beklemektedir. İsrail Haaretz Gazetesinde Zvi Barel imzalı analizin başlığından da anlaşılacağı üzere Türkiye'den beklenti ve taleplerin odak noktası açıktır: “Erdoğan'ın tehditlerine rağmen ABD, Ortadoğu savaşını önlemek için Türkiye'nin arabuluculuğuna güveniyor.” Faruk Önalan/ Yazar Türkiye'nin arabuluculuk gücü, etkin lobi faaliyetleri tarihsel bağları, diplomatik tecrübesi ve çok yönlü dış politikası sayesinde önemli bir yere sahiptir. Osmanlı İmparatorluğu'ndan kalma zengin miras ciddi bir tarihsel alt yapı sunarken, özellikle son yıllarda geliştirilen diplomasi anlayışı bu gücü daha da pekiştirmiştir. Günümüzde Balkanlardan Ortadoğu'ya, Kafkaslardan Afrika'ya birçok bölgede çatışmaların veya anlaşmazlıkların çözüme kavuşturulması ve taraflar arasında diyaloğun sağlanmasında Türkiye aktif bir rol üstlenmiştir. Türk dış politikasında Ortadoğu her zaman merkezi konumda yer almıştır. Tarihsel bağlar, jeopolitik önem ve enerji kaynakları, Türkiye'nin bu bölgede etkin bir rol üstlenmesini zorunlu kılmıştır. Ankara uzun yıllardır devam eden çatışmaları sonlandırmak adına arabuluculuk faaliyetlerinde bulunurken, aynı zamanda bölge ülkeleriyle ikili ilişkilerini de ilerletmiştir. 7 Ekim'den itibaren İsrail'in Gazze'ye...

title: Türkiye ile Azerbaycan ortaklığında kuruldu! Amrullayev: Öğrencilerini karşılamaya tam hazırdır
content: Azerbaycan Bilim ve Eğitim Bakanı Emin Amrullayev, Türkiye-Azerbaycan Üniversitesinin (TAÜ) yeni eğitim-öğretim yılında öğrencilerini karşılamaya hazır olduğunu açıkladı. Amrullayev, Facebook hesabından Bakü'de kurulan TAÜ'ye ilişkin paylaşımda bulundu. TAÜ'nün Azerbaycan Teknik Üniversitesi ile Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi (ODTÜ), İstanbul Teknik Üniversitesi (İTÜ) ve Hacettepe Üniversitesinin paydaşlığıyla faaliyet göstereceğini bildiren Amrullayev, "Kardeş Türkiye ile Azerbaycan arasındaki eğitim işbirliğine yeni katkı sağlayacak TAÜ, yeni eğitim-öğretim yılında öğrencilerini karşılamaya tam hazırdır." ifadelerini kullandı. Amrullayev, TAÜ'de, ODTÜ'nün desteğiyle bilgisayar mühendisliği, İTÜ'nün desteğiyle endüstri mühendisliği, Hacettepe Üniversitesinin desteğiyle gıda mühendisliği eğitimleri verileceğini aktararak, şunları kaydetti: "Gençlerimizi yükseköğretim alanında uygulanan bu önemli projeden aktif şekilde yararlanmaya çağırıyorum. Ülkemize ve eğitimimize hayırlı olsun." 19 Şubat 2024'te Ankara'da, Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ve Azerbaycan Cumhurbaşkanı İlham Aliyev'in huzurunda Azerbaycan Bilim ve Eğitim Bakanlığı ile Türkiye Cumhuriyeti Yükseköğretim Kurulu (YÖK) arasında Türkiye-Azerbaycan Üniversitesinin (TAÜ) Kurulmasına İlişkin Mutabakat Zaptı imzalanmıştı.

title: ABD'de enflasyon beklentilerin altında geldi
content: ABD Çalışma Bakanlığı, temmuz ayına ilişkin tüketici enflasyonu verilerini açıkladı. Buna göre, Amerikalı tüketicilerin yaşam maliyeti, temmuzda bir önceki aya kıyasla yüzde 0,2 ile beklentiler doğrultusunda artış kaydetti. TÜFE, haziranda ise yüzde 0,1 azalmıştı. YILLIK ENFLASYON EN DÜŞÜK SEVİYEDE Ülkede TÜFE, temmuzda yıllık bazda yüzde 2,9 arttı. Piyasa beklentileri yıllık enflasyonun yüzde 3 olması yönündeydi. Mart 2021'den bu yana en düşük yıllık artışını kaydeden TÜFE, haziranda yıllık bazda yüzde 3 yükselmişti. Söz konusu dönemde benzin fiyatları aylık bazda değişim göstermezken, yıllık yüzde 2,2 azaldı. Barınma fiyatları aynı dönemde aylık yüzde 0,4 ve yıllık yüzde 5,1'lik artış kaydetti. Gıda fiyatları ise temmuzda aylık yüzde 0,2, yıllık yüzde 2,2 arttı. ÇEKİRDEK ENFLASYON EN DÜŞÜK SEVİYEDE Değişken enerji ve gıda fiyatlarını içermeyen çekirdek TÜFE de temmuzda aylık yüzde 0,2 ve yıllık 3,2 ile beklentiler dahilinde arttı. Yıllık bazda Nisan 2021'den bu yana en düşük seviyesini kaydeden çekirdek enflasyon, haziranda aylık yüzde 0,1 ve yıllık yüzde 3,3 olmuştu.

title: Öğrenci kayıtlarında ücret alınacak mı? MEB'den tüm illere yeni genelge
content: Milli Eğitim Bakanı Yusuf Tekin imzasıyla yayımlanan "2024-2025 eğitim ve öğretim yılına ilişkin iş ve işlemler" konulu genelgeye göre, 2024-2025 eğitim öğretim yılı 9 Eylül 2024 Pazartesi günü başlayacak. Öğretmenlerin mazeret ve isteğe bağlı yer değişikliği işlemleri bu ay içerisinde gerçekleştirilecek. Böylece eğitim öğretim yılının başlangıcıyla idareci ve öğretmenlerin yer değişikliği süreci tamamlanacak. Ayrıca karar alma mekanizmaların odağına yerleştirilen kurul/zümre toplantılarının yapılması için gerekli tüm hazırlıklar önceden planlanarak süreç titizlikle yürütülecek. Türkiye Yüzyılı Maarif Modeli öğretim programları 2024-2025 eğitim öğretim yılında, okul öncesi, ilkokul 1, ortaokul 5, ortaöğretim hazırlık ve 9. sınıf düzeylerinde uygulanacak. Türkiye Yüzyılı Maarif Modeli kapsamında öğretim programları, eğitici eğitimleri, öğretmen eğitimleri, ders kitapları, öğretim materyalleri, ölçme, izleme ve değerlendirme süreçleri gibi konuları içeren ek genelge ayrıca yayımlanacak. Modelle ilgili iş ve işlemler ilgili genelge kapsamında yürütülecek. Türkiye'nin kalkınması ve refahına katkı sunması amacıyla hazırlanan, 10 Ağustos'ta Cumhurbaşkanlığı Genelgesi'yle yürürlüğü giren Mesleki ve Teknik Eğitim Politika Belgesi'yle ilgili valiliklerce gerekli tedbirler alınacak. - ÖĞRENCİ...

title: Sokak köpeklerine mama götürüyordu! Kütahya'da feci kaza
content: Kaza, Tavşanlı-Harmancık kara yolu 5'inci kilometresindeki Sorkun mevkisinde meydana geldi. M.P. (46) kullandığı 35 AEF 380 plakalı minibüsle, önünde giden Aysun Köse'nin kullandığı 43 AFT 698 plakalı üç tekerlekli elektrikli bisiklete çarptı. Kazada ağır yaralanan Köse, ihbar üzerine gelen sağlık ekiplerinin ilk müdahalesinin ardından ambulansla Tavşanlı Doç. Dr. Mustafa Kalemli Devlet Hastanesi'ne kaldırıldı ancak müdahalelere rağmen kurtarılamadı. Kazada ayrıca Köse'nin bisiklet sepetinde bulunan köpeği de öldü. Hayvansever Aysun Köse'nin bisikletine mamaları yükleyip, bölgedeki sokak köpek köpeklerini beslemeye gittiği öğrenildi. Kazanın ardından minibüs sürücüsü M.P. gözaltına alındı. Soruşturma sürüyor.

title: Şanlıurfa'da otomobil şarampole devrildi! 2 ölü, 2 yaralı
content: Berat Ergin (34) idaresindeki 34 JT 0236 plakalı otomobil, Siverek-Viranşehir kara yolu Yücelen Mahallesi yakınlarında kontrolden çıkarak şarampole devrildi. Kazada, otomobildeki Reşit Baskın (84) olay yerinde hayatını kaybetti, sürücü ile Zeri Ergin (64) ve Civan Ergin (1) yaralandı. İhbar üzerine bölgeye itfaiye, sağlık ve jandarma ekipleri sevk edildi. Araçta sıkışan yaralılar, itfaiye ekiplerince kurtarılarak Siverek Devlet Hastanesine kaldırıldı. Yaralılardan Zeri Ergin, kurtarılamadı.

title: Manisa'da orman yangını! Havadan ve karadan müdahale ediliyor

Yangına, 2 uçak, 3 helikopter, 8 arazöz, 2 su ikmal, 1 dozer ve 1 yer ekibi ile havadan ve karadan müdahale ediliyor.

Centre Invites Applications To Fill Eight Vacant Posts Of Information Commissioners In CIC
creator: Daily Excelsior
content: NEW DELHI, Aug 14: The Centre on Wednesday sought applications from eligible candidates to fill eight vacant posts of Information Commissioners in transparency watchdog CIC. The Central Information Commission (CIC), mandated to decide appeals and complaints under the Right to Information (RTI) Act, is headed by a Chief Information Commissioner and can have a maximum of 10 Information Commissioners (ICs). At present, besides the Chief Information Commissioner, two ICs are working in the Commission. “It is proposed to appoint Information Commissioners, not exceeding eight, as may be deemed necessary in the Central Information Commission,” said an order by the Personnel Ministry. The RTI Act provides that the Information Commissioner “shall be a person of eminence in public life with wide knowledge and experience in law, science and technology, social service, management, journalism, mass-media or administration and governance”, it said. People who have attained the age of 65 years shall not be eligible for appointment, the ministry said and shared other eligibility conditions. Those fulfilling the criteria and interested in appointment to the post of Information Commissioner may send their particulars in a proforma by September 10, the order said. (Agencies)

content: Trendyol Süper Lig ekiplerinden Samsunspor, 18 Ağustos Pazar günü deplasmanda oynayacağı Gaziantep FK maçının hazıklıklarına başladı. Antrenman pas ve sonuçlandırma çalışması ile sona erdi. Samsun ekibi hazırlıklarına yarın yapacağı antrenmanla devam edecek.

title: সাত দাবিতে শহীদ মিনারে মানববন্ধন করেছে স্বজনহারাদের পরিবার
creator: বাংলা ট্রিবিউন রিপোর্ট
content: শেখ হাসিনাকে দেশে ফিরিয়ে এনে ট্রাইব্যুনালের মাধ্যমে দ্রুত বিচারসহ সাত দফা দাবিতে মানববন্ধন করেছে জুলাই-আগস্ট ঘটনার নিহতদের পরিবার। বুধবার (১৪ আগস্ট) কেন্দ্রীয় শহীদ মিনারে সাত দফা দাবিতে মানববন্ধন করেন তারা। যেখানে শহীদ পরিবারের সদস্য ও নিপীড়িত ছাত্র-জনতা উপস্থিত ছিলেন। আন্দোলনে গুলিবিদ্ধ হয়ে মৃত্যুবরণ করা আব্দুল্লাহ আল মামুনের বোন তাসলিমা বলেন, ‘আমার ভাই ছিল আমাদের দুই বোনের একমাত্র ভাই। আমার বাবা একজন রেমিট্যান্সযোদ্ধা। ৫ আগস্ট আমার ভাইকে গাজীপুর আনসার একাডেমির সামনে গুলি করে বুক ঝাঁঝরা করে হত্যা করা হয়। আমার মা পাগলপ্রায়। মা দুপুরে ভাত বেড়ে রেখেছিল, আবদুল্লাহ এসে ভাত খাবে। কিন্তু তার কাছে পৌঁছালো তার ছেলের লাশ। আমার বাবা মাসে মাসে রেমিট্যান্স পাঠায় কিন্তু এই দেশ তাকে উপহার দিয়েছে আমার ভাইয়ের লাশ।’ jwARI.fetch( $( "#ari-image-jw66bcc7a75db80" ) ); মানববন্ধনে বক্তব্য রাখেন শহীদ সাংবাদিক তাহির জামান প্রিয়’র মা। তিনি বলেন, আমার ছেলে যখন গুলি খেয়েছে তখন আমি রংপুরে আন্দোলনকারীদের সাহায্য করছি। মারা যাওয়া লোকদের জন্যে আমি কেঁদেছি। কিন্তু যখন শুনলাম আমার ছেলে গুলি খেয়েছে কিন্তু তার লাশ খুঁজে পাওয়া যাচ্ছে না এবং পরে যখন তার লাশ পাওয়া গেলো, তখন থেকে আমি আর কাঁদতে পারিনি। যারা মারা গিয়েছে তাদের জন্যে আমরা দোয়া করবো কিন্তু এখন যেটা সবথেকে বেশি জরুরি সেটা হলো যারা হাসপাতালের বেডে কাতরাচ্ছে তাদের জন্য এগিয়ে যাওয়া। আমার যদি সামর্থ্য থাকতো, আমার এই অসুস্থ সন্তানদের আমি চিকিৎসার ভার নিতাম। মানববন্ধন থেকে শহীদ পরিবারের সদস্যরা ৭টি দাবি জানান। দাবিগুলো হলো-...

title: US envoy visits Lebanon and warns that regional tensions could easily slip ‘out of control’
creator: KAREEM CHEHAYEB
content: BEIRUT (AP) — A senior adviser to U.S. President Joe Biden said Wednesday it’s critical to take advantage of “this window for diplomatic action” to end the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza and ongoing hostilities along the Lebanon-Israel border, fearing that escalations could spiral “out of control.” Amos Hochstein, tasked with shuttle diplomacy between Lebanon and Israel, spoke to journalists after meeting Lebanese Parliament Speaker Nabih Berri, as the region anxiously anticipates retaliatory attacks from Iran and the allied Lebanese Hezbollah group on Israel. Hochstein met with Israeli officials Tuesday. Cease-fire talks between Hamas and Israel are expected to resume in Qatar on Thursday with Qatari, Egyptian, and U.S. mediators. Hezbollah and Israel have traded strikes since Oct. 8, a day after Palestinian Hamas militants' surprise attack into southern Israel that sparked the war in Gaza. Advertisement “The more time goes by of escalated tensions, the more time goes by of daily conflict, the more the odds and the chances go up for accidents, for mistakes, for inadvertent targets to be hit that could easily cause escalation that goes out of control,” Hochstein said. An Israeli strike last month in southern Beirut killed Hezbollah's top commander, whom Israel accused of leading a rocket attack on the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights that killed 12 youths. Hours later, an explosion...

title: ممنوعیت ورود هرگونه بوق و شیپور به ورزشگاه‌های کشور
content: یکی از پدیده‌های جام جهانی ۲۰۱۰ در آفریقای جنوبی، باب شدن شیپور معروف به ووزلا بود. شیپوری که با صدای کر‌ کننده و گوش‌خراشش، باعث اعتراض بسیاری از هواداران سایر کشورها و بازیکنان تیم‌ها شده بود. این بوق و شیپورها که پیش از این نیز در لیگ‌های ایران وجود داشت، از آن سال به بعد به بخش جدایی‌ناپذیر استادیوم‌های کشور تبدیل شد که البته همواره و طی این مدت، با اعتراض بسیاری از هواداران و بازیکنان همراه بوده است. این بوق‌های گوش‌خراش و آزاردهنده سبب می‌شد که خیل عظیمی از تماشاگران در هنگام برگزاری مسابقات، نتوانند به تشویق تیم مورد علاقه خود بپردازند و حتی تمرکز برای مشاهده جریان بازی نیز از دست می رفت. حالا نیز سازمان لیگ با انتشار اطلاعیه‌ای رسمی، از ممنوعیت ورود هرگونه بوق و شیپور به ورزشگاه‌های کشور خبر داده است. در متن این اطلاعیه آمده است: از ابتدای فصل ۱۴۰۴-۱۴۰۳ و با توجه به قوانین مصوب afc و fifa، استفاده از بوق و شیپورهای هواداری (فلزی و پلاستیکی) در استادیوم‌های ورزشی به جهت امکان صدمه به شنوایی، از بین بردن تمرکز داوران، بازیکنان و مربیان و همچنین ایجاد حس ناخوشایند در تمامی ورزشگاه‌ها ممنوع است.

title: У Словенији измерено 38 степени, данас најтоплији дан овог љета
creator: Tанјуг
content: Ово премашује претходни рекорд од 37,8 степени Целзијуса, забиљежен у уторак, а топлотни талас ће трајати до краја недеље, преноси СТА. Високе температуре су забиљежене и на већим надморским висинама, а ермометар је показао 32,5 степени у сјеверозападном селу Крн, које се налази на надморској висини од 918 метара. Топлотни талас који је у току трајаће најмање до краја ове недеље, рекла је за СТА метеоролога Вероника Хладник Закотник. Нови рекорд за ово љето би бити постављен у петак, када ће бити посебно вруће на истоку, сјевероистоку и југоистоку земље. Агенција не очекује нови топлотни талас крајем августа, а Хладник Закотник каже да ће се температуре вјероватно задржати на око 30 степени до краја следеће недеље. Највиша температура у Словенији измерена је 8. августа 2013. године, када је метеоролошка станица у Церкљу об Крки на истоку забиљежила 40,8 степени. и .

title: QAU Alumni, faculty, employees, students celebrate Independence Day with fruit tree plantation
content: ISLAMABAD, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) In a vibrant display of patriotism and commitment to environmental sustainability, the Quaid-i-Azam University (QAU) Alumni, alongside faculty, employees, and PhD scholars, marked the 77th Day of with a significant tree plantation drive at the QAU Botanical Garden. The , aimed at contributing to a greener and more sustainable campus, saw the enthusiastic participation of the university community, who planted a variety of fruit trees across the garden. It was part of a countrywide plantation drive through which ten thousand trees are being planted by the QAU alumni in collaboration with its partners. The celebration was not only an ode to 's but also a pledge by the participants to make QAU an even greener and environmentally friendly institution. The initiative reflects the university's ongoing efforts to promote environmental conservation and enhance the natural beauty of the campus. Adding to the significance of the day, four fruit orchards were also inaugurated at the QAU Botanical Garden. These orchards, which will feature a diverse range of fruit-bearing trees, symbolize the university's dedication to sustainability and the provision of fresh produce for the university community in the future. Speaking on the occasion, representatives of the QAU alumni emphasized the importance of environmental stewardship and...

title: হাড়হিম করা তথ্য, আরজি কর কাণ্ডে তরুণীর শরীরে মিলেছে ১৫০ মিলিগ্রাম বীর্য?
Pedro Almodóvar, Premio Donostia del 72 Festival de Cine de San Sebastián
creator: aday
content: Pedro Almodóvar, el director, guionista y productor más internacional del cine español, recibirá unos de los premios Donostia del 72 Festival de Cine de San Sebastián, que se celebrará del 20 a 28 de septiembre. El director será homenajeado el jueves 26, recién cumplidos los 75 años y antes de la proyección de su última película, ‘La habitación de al lado’ ('The Room Next Door '), protagonizada por Tilda Swinton, Julianne Moore, John Turturro, que es su primer largometraje rodado en inglés y competirá por el León de Oro en Venecia. De esta forma, el Festival reconocerá "la aportación extraordinaria del homenajeado al mundo del cine", en un acto en el que será precisamente Swinton quien le entregue el premio sobre el escenario, informó este miércoles el certamen. "Además de su talento artístico y su reconocible estilo visual (...), el cine de Pedro Almodóvar sobresale por la escritura de los personajes femeninos, la dirección actoral, la audacia en la aproximación a temas como el universo LGTBIQ+, la religión, el sexo, las adicciones o la memoria histórica", subraya la fuente, que también señala "su compromiso político", con posicionamientos contra conflictos bélicos o los discursos de la extrema derecha. Destaca que la trayectoria de Almodóvar, con casi una treintena de largometrajes, está avalada por más de 200 nominaciones y más de 170...

title: Paris Olympics singe CAE profits as demand for pilot training drops
creator: News Staff
content: MONTREAL — The head of CAE Inc. says demand for its pilot training services dropped last quarter, due in part to lower travel volumes to Europe because of the Paris Olympics, coupled with a drop in hiring at some major airlines. The Olympic Games as well as the Euro Cup “altered normal travel behaviour” to and from the Continent, said CEO Marc Parent. A smaller need for aviator training in Europe stemmed from “aircraft supply side constraints and special events, namely the Euro Cup and the Paris Olympics,” he told analysts on a conference call Wednesday. Carriers including Air Canada, Delta Air Lines and Air France have all reported that the summer games hurt their seasonal sales, as travellers opted to steer clear of France, where parts of central Paris were closed off for the duration of the event. Sports competitions weren’t the only culprits. CAE, which makes flight simulators and trains commercial pilots, said a broader decrease in short-term demand yielded a 26 per cent year-over-year profit drop in the quarter ended June 30. Large airlines in the U.S. reduced hiring by 80 per cent year over year in June, Parent said. He pointed to delays at plane manufacturers such as Boeing Co., where production problems have pushed back fleet expansion and pilot training at some carriers. Others have at last filled the hiring gap caused by the travel rebound after the COVID-19...

title: Nitish Kumar के मंत्री का लालू यादव को दो टूक जवाब, कहा- CM के होते हकमारी नहीं हो सकती
content: Bihar News जदयू बिहार में अगले साल होने वाले विधानसभा चुनाव को लेकर काफी एक्टिव है। पार्टी ने आम जनता से रूबरू होने और समस्याओं को सुनने के लिए जनसुनवाई कार्यक्रम शुरू किया है। इसमें हर रोज मंत्री हिस्सा ले रहे हैं। इस बीच लालू यादव पर पलटवार करते हुए मंत्री श्रवण कुमार ने कहा कि नीतीश कुमार के होते हुए कभी बिहार की हकमारी नहीं हो सकती। प्रदेश जदयू कार्यालय में बुधवार को आयोजित जनसुनवाई कार्यक्रम में ग्रामीण विकास मंत्री श्रवण कुमार एवं भवन निर्माण मंत्री जयंत राज शामिल हुए। इन मंत्रियों ने विभिन्न जिलों से आए लोगों की समस्याओं को सुना और उनके निष्पादन हेतु संबंधित अधिकारियों को निर्देश दिया। इस अवसर पर पत्रकारों से बातचीत में मंत्री श्रवण कुमार ने कहा कि मुख्यमंत्री नीतीश कुमार 19 वर्षों से जनता की सेवा कर रहे हैं। उनके होते हुए कभी बिहार की हकमारी नहीं हो सकती है। राजधानी पटना में भाजपा नेता अजय शाह की हत्या पर श्रवण कुमार ने दुख प्रकट करते हुए कहा कि इस घटना को अंजाम देने वाले अपराधी किसी भी सूरत में बख्शे नहीं जाएंगे। प्रशासन अपना काम कर रही है, अपराधी बहुत जल्द सलाखों के पीछे होंगे। विकासशील इंसान पार्टी के प्रमुख मुकेश सहनी की एनडीए में वापसी की चर्चा पर मंत्री जयंत राज ने कहा कि बिहार में बहुत सारे राजनीतिक दल एनडीए में शामिल होकर मुख्यमंत्री नीतीश कुमार के नेतृत्व में काम करना चाहते हैं। इस मौके पर पार्टी के प्रदेश महासचिव अरुण कुमार सिंह, लोक प्रकाश सिंह, नवीन आर्या चंद्रवंशी एवं हुलेश मांझी मौजूद थे। लालू यादव ने सरकार पर बोला हमला लालू यादव ने बुधवार को सारण के रेल...

title: Paris Olympics singe CAE profits as demand for pilot training drops
creator: The Canadian Press
content: MONTREAL — The head of CAE Inc. says demand for its pilot training services dropped last quarter, due in part to lower travel volumes to Europe because of the Paris Olympics, coupled with a drop in hiring at some major airlines. The Olympic Games as well as the Euro Cup "altered normal travel behaviour" to and from the Continent, said CEO Marc Parent. A smaller need for aviator training in Europe stemmed from "aircraft supply side constraints and special events, namely the Euro Cup and the Paris Olympics," he told analysts on a conference call Wednesday. Carriers including Air Canada, Delta Air Lines and Air France have all reported that the summer games hurt their seasonal sales, as travellers opted to steer clear of France, where parts of central Paris were closed off for the duration of the event. Sports competitions weren't the only culprits. CAE, which makes flight simulators and trains commercial pilots, said a broader decrease in short-term demand yielded a 26 per cent year-over-year profit drop in the quarter ended June 30. Large airlines in the U.S. reduced hiring by 80 per cent year over year in June, Parent said. He pointed to delays at plane manufacturers such as Boeing Co., where production problems have pushed back fleet expansion and pilot training at some carriers. Others have at last filled the hiring gap caused by the travel rebound after the COVID-19...

title: Bennacer emozionato: "San Siro, che gioia ritrovarti"
content: Nonostante le voci di mercato e un'ultima stagione condizionata dagli infortuni, Ismael Bennacer continua a giocare e a farlo bene in questo precampionato. Per l'algerino minuti in campo dopo l'intervallo, per tutto il secondo tempo, nella partita contro il Monza vinta per 3-1 e ultimo test prima dell'inizio ufficiale del campionato. Bennacer ha poi dimostrato sempre grande attaccamento sia alla maglia che al pubblico di San Siro. Questo è emerso anche ieri sera, quando al triplice fischio Bennacer ha pubblicato un post su Instagram scrivendo: "San Siro, che gioia ritrovarti". Ieri era la prima nello stadio di casa da maggio. Un post condiviso da Ismaël Bennacer (@ismaelbennacer)
