title: توم بيرييلو يحاور نفسه في جنيف !!
creator: النيلين
content: توم بيرييلو يحاور نفسه في جنيف !! أعلن المبعوث الأمريكي الخاص للسودان، توم بيرييلو، في تغريدة على حسابه في منصة “إكس” عن وصول وفد “قوات الدعم السريع” إلى مدينة جنيف السويسرية للمشاركة فى جولة مفاوضات مقرر انطلاقها يوم غد الخميس، كما أعلن ايضاً عن وصول وفد الحكومة الأمريكية المشارك فى المفاوضات ووفد مجموعة الشركاء الدوليين كذلك. وأضاف فى تغريدته أن المجتمع المدنى السودانى ينتظر وصول وفد الجيش السوداني وأن العالم يراقب !! الحكومة السودانية – من جهتها – أعلنت على لسان كل من رئيس وفدها الذي عاد من جدة بعد أن فاوض الوفد الأمريكي (سيد الجِلد والراس)، ثم على لسان وزير إعلامها والناطق باسمها، أنها لن ترسل وفداً إلى جنيف منقوص التمثيل، ومن دون أن ينفذ متمردو الدعم السريع ما سبق وأن وقعوا عليه في جدة وهو إخلاء الأعيان المدنية ومنازل المواطنين التي احتلوها. والجيش السوداني جدد الإعلان أمس على لسان قائده العام، ورئيس مجلس السيادة الإنتقالي عن نفس الشروط، وزاد عليها بتمسكه بحقه في عدم مشاركة من يشعلون نيران الحرب ويصرون على تدمير السودان ضمن مَن أسموا أنفسهم ب “المسهلين”، وهم مَن يعتبرهم الشعب السوداني “مستهبلين”، ومع هذا يصر السيد المبعوث على القول بأن المفاوضات قائمة بمن حضر !! لم يعد سراً أن المتمردين والمسهلين، وحتى بعض منظمات المجتمع المدني التي أعلنت أنها ستذهب إلى جنيف، هم جميعاً أصدقاء وحلفاء الولايات المتحدة، هذا إذا تجاوزنا استخدام وصف آخر .. والحال هكذا، فما هي الأطراف المتحاورة في جنيف وما هو وجه الخلاف بين أجندتها حتى تجتهد في تسويته ؟؟...

title: Athens Kallithea: Απέκτησε τον Μερκάτι από τη Σασουόλο
content: Ποδοσφαιριστής της είναι και επίσημα ο Αλεσάντρο Μερκάτι. «Η Athens Kallithea FC ανακοινώνει την απόκτηση του Ιταλού μέσου Alessandro Mercati από τη Sassuolo της ιταλικής Serie B. Ο Mercati, 22, θεωρείται ένα αξιόλογο ταλέντο που αναδείχθηκε από την ακαδημία της Sassuolo και μετράει ήδη 98 συνολικά συμμετοχές κατά τη διάρκεια δανεισμών του στη Serie C τις τελευταίες τρεις σεζόν. Γεννημένος στο Castelnovo ne' Monti στην περιοχή Reggio Emilia, ο Mercati αναδείχθηκε από την ακαδημία της γειτονικής Sassuolo, περνώντας από τις ομάδες Κ-15, Κ-17, Κ-19 και Primavera. Ο Mercati υπέγραψε το πρώτο του επαγγελματικό συμβόλαιο τον Μάιο 2020, και επιλέχθηκε από τον Roberto De Zerbi για την πρώτη του συμμετοχή στην αποστολή της πρώτης ομάδας για έναν αγώνα στη Serie A κόντρα στη Fiorentina τον Ιούλιο 2020 σε ηλικία 18 ετών. Μετά από μία εξαιρετική σεζόν με την Primavera της ομάδας το 2020/21, ο Mercati απέκτησε την πρώτη του επαγγελματική εμπειρία ως δανεικός στη Montevarchi, σημειώνοντας 37 συμμετοχές με ένα τέρμα και έξι ασίστ στη Serie C στα 19 του. Ακολούθησαν άλλοι δυο επιτυχημένοι δανεισμοί για τον Mercati στη Serie C τις τελευταίες δύο σεζόν, όπου μέτρησε 25 συμμετοχές με δύο ασίστ στην Carrerese τη σεζόν 2022/23 και 36 συμμετοχές με δύο τέρματα και τρεις ασίστ στην Gubbio τη σεζόν 2023/24,...

title: Украинские войска разрушили храм в Курской области
creator: Газета.Ru
content: Украинские войска разрушили храм в Курской области Военнослужащие Вооруженных сил Украины (ВСУ) разрушили Вознесенский храм-часовню, который располагался в поселке Краснооктябрьский Глушковского района Курской области. Об этом сообщили в пресс-службе Русской православной церкви (РПЦ). РПЦ привела рапорт митрополита Курского и Рыльского Германа, который был адресован патриарху Московскому и всея Руси Кириллу. В нем священнослужитель сообщил, что ситуация в регионе остается сложной и тревожной. Бои в приграничных районах Курской области идут уже больше недели. По данным Минобороны РФ, утром 6 августа украинские военные пересекли границу и попытались зайти вглубь региона. 8 августа в оборонном ведомстве заявили о сражениях в Суджанском и Кореневском районах. На следующий день в трех российских областях — Курской, Белгородской и Брянской — ввели режим контртеррористической операции. 9 августа в РПЦ сообщили , что обстрелы ВСУ повредили здания Горнальского Николаевского Белогорского мужского монастыря, а также три сельских храма в Курской епархии. Ранее на Украине допустили создание военных комендатур в Курской области.

title: Some Fingers Are Starting To Point At Blake Lively As More It Ends With Us Insiders Talk About The Behind The Scenes Drama
content: Most of the fingers have been pointing at director and co-lead Justin Baldoni since news of the behind the scenes drama on It Ends With Us first went public, but the story is apparently a whole lot more complicated than just a few actors not getting along with their director. More insiders who worked on the movie are starting to drop off the record quotes, and they’re not all super flattering to star Blake Lively . In fact, some are claiming Baldoni was “well-liked” by many members of the crew, and she was the one who tried to “seize creative control.” Like most alleged on-set Hollywood feuds, this It Ends With Us mess has been fueled by a lot of rumors, speculation and alleged sources speaking off the record. What it hasn’t had is a ton of people involved actually putting their own name to quotes. So, let’s back up and talk about how we got here. Following the movie’s premiere, several people on TikTok created videos talking about how weird it was that the cast didn’t take pictures with director Justin Baldoni on the red carpet. They all took pictures with each other and with the book’s author Colleen Hoover, but he seemed to just take pictures with his wife and some friends. Other TikTokers did their own sleuthing and discovered he follows most of the cast on Instagram, but none of the major players seem to follow him. Eventually, the noise got loud enough that major outlets...

title: Nation needs to promote faith, unity, discipline: Dr. Zill-i-Huma Nazli
content: FAISALABAD, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) College University (GCWUF) Vice Chancellor (VC) Prof Dr Zill-i-Huma Nazli has said that the nation needs to promote Quaid-e-Azam’s clarion call of faith, and discipline in order to emerge an ideal state across the globe. She was addressing the Youm-e-Azadi ( Day) ceremony arranged at GCUWF to celebrate 77th Day with zeal and enthusiasm. Dr Zill-i-Huma Nazli flanked by former MNA Mian Abdul Mannan and MPA Uzma Raja unfurled the national flag while university guards presented salute to the flag in addition to demonstrating Past. Speaking on the occasion, Dr Nazli stressed the need to iron out differences among the society, ending prejudice, and to promote the message of peace. She said, "We got a country after the great sacrifices. Now, it is our duty to work hard for its ." She also saluted the sacrifices of freedom fighters, who devoted their lives to get a country for the of the subcontinent. She hoped that the country would be counted in the list of developed countries one day. She further said that is the prerequisite to make development. "Keeping in view, we have to expedite the efforts to raise the awareness among the people and increase literacy rate with quality ," she added. Later, she also planted a sapling in the university lawn while Arts and Design Department arranged poster competition under the title...

title: भाजयुमो, विधायक फिर पुलिस की तिरंगा यात्रा:शहर में एक दिन पहले आजादी का जश्न, पुश्तैनी गड्ढें नहीं भर पाया नगर निगम
content: स्वतंत्रता दिवस से एक दिन पूर्व में शहर में तिरंगा यात्राएं निकाली गई है। सुबह भारतीय जनता युवा मोर्चा ने बाइक रैली निकाली, दोपहर में विधायक के नेतृत्व में वाहन रैली निकाली गई। इसके बाद शाम को पुलिसकर्मियों ने बाइक रैली निकाली। हर्षोल्लास के साथ आजाद स्वतंत्रता दिवस का मुख्य आयोजन पुलिस लाइन परेड ग्राउंड पर होगा। जिले के प्रभारी मंत्री धर्मेंद्रसिंह लोधी भी खंडवा पहुंच गए है। वे कार्यक्रम के मुख्य अतिथि होंगे तथा ध्वजारोहण कर परेड की सलामी लेंगे। कार्यक्रम की शुरूआत सुबह 9 बजे से होगी। इधर, शहर की सड़कें खस्ताहाल हो गई है, मुख्य मार्ग तक गड्ढों से पटे हुए हैं। बावजूद नगर निगम ने गड्ढे भरने की सुध नहीं ली। पुश्तैनी गड्ढों के बीच शहर में आजादी का जश्न मनाया रहा है।

title: গুলিবিদ্ধ জবি শিক্ষার্থীর মৃত্যু
creator: বাংলা ট্রিবিউন রিপোর্ট
content: বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলন চলাকালে গত ৪ আগস্ট রাজধানীর মিরপুরে পুলিশের গুলিতে আহত জগন্নাথ বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের (জবি) শিক্ষার্থী একরামুল হক সাজিদ মারা গেছেন। তিনি বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের অ্যাকাউন্টটিং অ্যান্ড ইনফরমেশন সিস্টেমস বিভাগের ১৪তম ব্যাচের শিক্ষার্থী ছিলেন। বুধবার (১৪ আগস্ট) বেলা ২টা ১৫ মিনিটের দিকে ঢাকার সম্মিলিত সামরিক হাসপাতালে (সিএমএইচ) চিকিৎসাধীন অবস্থায় তিনি মারা যান। জগন্নাথ বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের অ্যাকাউন্টিং অ্যান্ড ইনফরমেশন সিস্টেমস বিভাগের অধ্যাপক শফিকুল ইসলাম মৃত্যুর বিষয়টি নিশ্চিত করেছেন। বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের কোষাধ্যক্ষ অধ্যাপক ড. হুমায়ুন কবির চৌধুরী শোক প্রকাশ করে বলেন, ‘৪ আগস্ট থেকে সাজিদ সিএমএইচে চিকিৎসাধীন ছিলেন। আজ দুপুরে মৃত্যুবরণ করেছেন। জগন্নাথ বিশ্ববিদ্যালয় পরিবার তার মৃত্যুতে শোকাহত।’ এর আগে সাজিদের বন্ধু মো. মাহমুদুল হাসান সামাজিক যোগাযোগমাধ্যমে একটি পোস্টে লেখেন, ‘সাজিদ আর বেঁচে নেই, কেউ কল দেবেন না প্লিজ। ২টা ১৫ মিনিটে সাজিদ আল্লাহর কাছে চলে গিয়েছে। সবাই দোয়া করেন প্লিজ।’ মো. মাহমুদুল হাসান জানান, গ্রামের বাড়ি টাঙ্গাইলে সাজিদের দাফন অনুষ্ঠিত হবে।’ জানা যায়, গত ৪ আগস্ট মিরপুর এলাকায় বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের সময় জবির ২০১৮-১৯ সেশনের শিক্ষার্থী সাজিদ মাথায় গুলিবিদ্ধ হন। একটি গুলি তার মাথার পেছনে লাগে।

title: Oxford announces its Graduate Scholarships for 2024-25 on Pakistan's 78th Independence Day
content: ISLAMABAD, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) On the occasion of 's 78th Day, the Programme (OPP) announced its graduate scholarships for the 2024-25 academic year. According to the details, the OPP will support twelve exceptional scholars diverse disciplinary backgrounds, ranging law and social sciences to engineering and medicine. Founded just four years ago by academics and alumni of the University of , the OPP has rapidly become the fastest-growing academic platform in any major western university that is dedicated to creating scholarship opportunities for talented origin students. This year, the OPP received around 100 applications outstanding students who had received admission offers University but lacked the financial means to pursue their dream. Among the scholarship recipients are two exceptionally talented students . Junaid Memon will pursue a DPhil in Engineering, while Anum Khan , will read for an M.Sc. in Surgical Science and Practice. The former will be supported by the Hamid Ismail Foundation in and the latter by renowned businessman and entrepreneur Suleman Raza. The OPP is also proud to announce Ms. Zainab Aziz as the recipient of the prestigious Scholarship. A self-made professional with a public schooling background, Ms. Aziz currently serves as an Assistant Director at the National Counter Terrorism Authority (NACTA). The Tareen...

title: India News | Heavy Rainfall to Continue in Odisha for Another Three Days: IMD
content: Bhubaneswar, Aug 14 (PTI) The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has forecast heavy rainfall inseveral districts in Odisha over the next three days. According to IMD's Bhubaneswar regional centre, districts including Mayurbhanj, Keonjhar, Sundargarh, Deogarh, Sambalpur, and Jharsuguda are expected to receive 7 to 11 cm of rainfall on Thursday and Friday. A yellow warning (be updated) has been issued for these areas. On Saturday, heavy rainfall warnings (yellow) have been extended to Sundargarh, Jharsuguda, Sambalpur, and Bargarh districts, weather officials said. The state has been experiencing moderate to heavy rainfall due to consecutive low-pressure areas and active monsoon conditions. From June 1 to August 14, Odisha has received an average of 648.3 mm of rainfall, compared to the normal of 724.8 mm. During this period, Malkangiri, Boudh, and Nuapada districts have experienced excess rainfall, 16 districts have received normal rainfall, and 11 districts are categorized as deficient.

title: A7 bei Neumünster nach Lkw-Unfall voll gesperrt
creator: Tanita Averes
content: Nachdem sich ein Lkw ins Schleudern geriet und verunfallte, ist die A7 auf Höhe Neumünster in südliche Richtung gesperrt. Bis zur Freigabe wird es laut Polizei noch dauern. (Symbolbild) Quelle: Axel Heimken/dpa Lkw gerät ins Schleudern: Wegen eines Unfalls auf der Autobahn 7 Richtung Hamburg ist die Strecke auf Höhe Neumünster gesperrt - und wird es laut Polizei noch einige Zeit bleiben. Neumünster. Ursache unklar: Ein Sattelzug ist am Mittwoch, gegen 14 Uhr, auf der A7 auf Höhe Neumünster verunglückt. Die Strecke ist gen Süden Richtung Hamburg seitdem komplett gesperrt. Bis die Sperrung aufgehoben wird, kann es nach Polizeiangaben noch dauern. Kurz vor der Anschlussstelle Neumünster-Süd sei der Lkw ins Schleudern geraten und in die Mittelschutzplanke gefahren, berichtet die Polizeistelle Neumünster . Anschließend bleib der Sattelzug quer auf allen drei Fahrstreifen stehen. Der Fahrer des Lkws wurde bei dem Unfall schwer verletzt und mit dem Rettungswagen ins Krankenhaus nach Neumünster gebracht. Mehr zum Thema Der Verkehr staue sich bis zur Anschlussstelle Neumünster Nord zurück, berichtet die Polizei am Mittwochnachmittag und bittet, den Bereich großräumig zu umfahren. Weil das Fahrzeug bei dem Unfall Dieselöl verloren hat, kann es bis zur Freigabe der Autobahn noch einige Zeit dauern. KN

title: റെക്കോഡുകളുമായി 'തങ്കലാൻ' എത്തുന്നു; അഡ്വാൻസ് കളക്ഷനിൽ എത്ര നേടിയെന്നറിയാം...
content: പ്രേക്ഷകർ ആകാംഷയോടെ കാത്തിരിക്കുന്ന വിക്രം ചിത്രം തങ്കലാൻ തിയേറ്ററുകളിലെത്താൻ മണിക്കൂറുകൾ മാത്രമാണ് ബാക്കിയുള്ളത്. ഒരിടവേളയ്ക്ക് ശേഷമുള്ള വിക്രമിന്റെ വേറിട്ട പ്രകടനത്തിനായി കാത്തിരിക്കുകയാണ് ആരാധകർ. ചിത്രത്തിന്റെ അഡ്വാൻസ് ബുക്കിം​ഗ് കളക്ഷനും പ്രതീക്ഷ നൽകുന്നതാണ്. അഡ്വാൻസ് ബുക്കിം​ഗിലൂടെ ചിത്രം 5 കോടി നേടിയെന്നാണ് റിപ്പോർട്ടുകൾ. തമിഴ്നാട്ടിൽ ഈ വർഷം ഇറങ്ങിയ ചിത്രങ്ങളൊന്നും വലിയൊരു നേട്ടം കൈവരിച്ചിരുന്നില്ല. തങ്കലാൻ വമ്പൻ വിജയം നേടുമെന്ന പ്രതീക്ഷയിലാണ് ചിത്രത്തിന്റെ അണിയറപ്രവർത്തകരും. പാ രഞ്ജിത്ത് സംവിധാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന ചിത്രം പ്രഖ്യാപനം മുതൽ തന്നെ ആരാധകർക്കിടയിൽ ശ്രദ്ധ ആകർഷിച്ചിരുന്നു. ഇന്ത്യയിലെ ബ്രിട്ടീഷ് ഭരണകാലഘട്ടത്തെ അടിസ്ഥാനമാക്കി ഒരുങ്ങുന്ന ചിത്രത്തിന്റെ പശ്ചാത്തലം കോലാർ ​ഗോൾഡ് ഫീൽഡാണ്. തന്റെ ഭൂമിയിൽ സ്വർണ്ണ ഖനനം നടത്താൻ വരുന്നവരിൽ നിന്നും ഭൂമിയെ സംരക്ഷിക്കുന്ന ആദിവാസ നേതാവായാണ് വിക്രമെത്തുന്നത്. ചിത്രത്തിന്റെ ട്രെയിലർ അടക്കം ആരാധകർക്കിടയിൽ വൻ ചർച്ചാ വിഷയമായിരുന്നു.

title: Business News | Domestic Passenger Vehicles Sales Shrink 2.5 Pc in July, SIAM Expects Festive Season to Boost Demands
content: New Delhi [India], August 14 (ANI): The total domestic Passenger Vehicles (PVs) sales have witnessed a decline of 2.5 per cent in July 2024, as compared to the same period last year 2023, according to the data released by Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) on Wednesday. As per the data, the sales of total passenger vehicles stood at 3,41,510 units in July, compared to 3,50,355 units, in the same period last year. The passenger cars segment witnessed a similar trend with the sales declining 12 per cent at 96,652 units, compared to 1,09,859 units in July of 2023. The vans segment also saw a decline of 1 per cent in July current year compared to the same period a year ago. The decline in sales can be attributed to the moderation in demand. Commenting on July-2024 performance, Mr Rajesh Menon, Director General, SIAM said, "Three Wheelers posted a growth of 5.1 per cent compared to July last year, with sales of 0.59 Lakh units in July 2024, which is close to the peak of 2018-19. The two-wheeler segment also posted a decent growth of 12.5 per cent in July 2024 as compared to July 2023, with sales of 14.42 Lakh units". Commenting on sales data of July 2024, Vinod Aggarwal, President, SIAM said, "Though Three-Wheeler and Two-Wheeler segments are performing well, there has been some degrowth of Passenger Vehicles and Commercial Vehicles in July 2024, compared to July...

title: Justin Baldoni Reportedly Hires Crises PR Manager Amid ‘It Ends With Us’ Feud Rumors
creator: Elisabeth McGowan
content: Justin Baldoni has reportedly hired a crisis PR manager in the wake of the It Ends With Us cast feud rumors . Just days after the film held its New York City premiere, a new report surfaced over the 40-year-old actor and director’s alleged decision to seek help about the situation. The PR manager whom Justin hired is Melissa Nathan, according to The Hollywood Reporter . Previously, the PR specialist worked with Johnny Depp during his highly publicized trial against ex-wife Amber Heard , the outlet reported. Melissa’s company, The Agency Group PR , focuses on “crisis communications and management,” per its website. Multiple outlets have reported that Justin had a falling out with co-star Blake Lively over creative differences. Though neither he nor Blake, 36, has publicly commented on the feud rumors, fans noticed that she and other cast members do not follow him back on Instagram. Additionally, the director was noticeably absent from press and promotional events. While he attended the New York City August 6 premiere, Justin and Blake did not pose together for photos. Some social media users have likened the alleged tension with the Don’t Worry Darling cast’s alleged drama. title: UNRWA: Mbi 625.000 fëmijë në Rripin e Gazës kanë humbur një vit akademik për shkak të sulmeve izraelite
content: Komisioneri i përgjithshëm i Agjencisë së Kombeve të Bashkuara për Ndihmë dhe Punë për Refugjatët Palestinezë (UNRWA), Philippe Lazzarini, ka bërë të ditur se 625 mijë fëmijë në Rripin e Gazës, prej të cilëve 300 mijë nxënës të shkollave të UNRWA-së, kanë humbur një vit akademik për shkak të sulmeve izraelite, transmeton Anadolu. Lazzarini foli për institucionin "Arsimi nuk mund të presë" (Education Cannot Wait), në kuadër të Fondit Global për Arsimin në Emergjenca dhe Kriza Afatgjata të menaxhuar nga Fondi i Kombeve të Bashkuara për Fëmijët (UNICEF). Duke theksuar se sulmet izraelite prekin rëndë fëmijët në Rripin e Gazës, ku një në çdo dy persona është fëmijë, Lazzarini theksoi se mijëra fëmijë janë vrarë si rezultat i sulmeve dhe mijëra prej tyre kanë humbur gjymtyrët e tyre dhe janë bërë të paaftë. "625 mijë fëmijë në Gaza, përfshirë 300 mijë nxënës të UNRWA-së, nuk kanë mundur të shkojnë në shkollë gjatë vitit akademik për shkak të sulmeve izraelite", u shpreh Lazzarini. Lazzarini njoftoi se pothuajse 70 për qind e shkollave të UNRWA-së janë bombarduar dhe se kjo situatë është provë se ligji ndërkombëtar humanitar është injoruar në mënyrë të hapur. Në sulmet e Izraelit në Rripin e Gazës që nga 7 tetori i vitit 2023 janë vrarë 39.965 palestinezë, përfshirë të...

title: Punjab grab Independence Day Basketball titles
content: ISLAMABAD, (APP - UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) emerged victorious in both men's and 's categories of the Day Inter-Provincial Basketball Championship, organized by the Basketball Federation (PBBF) here at the Liaquat Gymnasium of Complex on Wednesday. title: Maxime Jean-Baptiste Bows Feature Debut ‘Listen to the Voices,’ About Grief, Forgiveness, the Persisting Consequences of Colonialism
creator: John Hopewell
content: French Guiana is, to put it mildly, rarely shown in cinema – perhaps we might see its beautiful landscapes, its jungle, its shoreline, maybe even its gold mines. These backdrops and adornments are those that Maxime Jean-Baptiste , director of “Listen to the Voices”(“Kouté vwa”)– showing in the Filmmakers of the Present section at the Locarno Film Festival and sold by MoreThan Films – wanted to avoid at all costs. When asked by Variety about how he aimed to depict Guiana, Jean-Baptiste mentions, as a counter example, “Jean Galmot, Aventurier,” a French ‘70s adventure film, in which his father was an extra – something essential in his shorts “Nou Voix” (2018) and “Moune Ô” (2021). In fact, most of Jean-Baptiste’s work is a family matter – besides those titles, he co-directed “Listen to the Bear of Our Images” (2021) with Audrey Jean-Baptiste, his sister, who also co-wrote “Listen to the Voices.” What makes “Listen to the Voices” a family matter is not only this collaboration, but the personal tragedy that set it in motion. The director’s cousin, Lucas Diomar, was brutally killed in 2012, plunging his family into an abyss of grief from which they have not yet emerged. 13-year old Melrick, Lucas’ nephew, is spending his summer vacation at his grandma’s place in French Guiana to get away from his “lame” life in Stains, Paris. While Nicole – Melrick’s attentive grandmother – seems...

Becky Lynch Has Seth Rollins on Mt. Rushmore; WWE Rumors on CM Punk, Stephanie Vaquer
creator: Mike  Chiari
content: Bleacher Report catches you up on the latest news from the WWE Universe. Lynch Names Her Pro Wrestling Mt. Rushmore Becky Lynch made it a family affair when asked this week to name her Mt. Rushmore of professional wrestling. During an appearance on Games With Names , hosted by former New England Patriots wide receiver Julian Edelman, Lynch was asked to name her wrestling Mt. Rushmore, and she included both herself and her husband, Seth Rollins, on her list (beginning at the 1:22:00 mark ): The Man also chose John Cena for her Mt. Rushmore, but she did not give a definitive answer for her fourth and final spot. Lynch named both The Rock and "Stone Cold" Steve Austin, though, and there is little doubt that both Attitude Era megastars are deserving of the distinction. As of now, Lynch is a free agent, and she has not been on WWE programming since losing a steel cage match for the Women's World Championship to Liv Morgan on the May 27 episode of Raw. Fightful Select (h/t Subhojeet Mukherjee of Ringside News) reported that her WWE contract expired a few days later, meaning she is technically free to sign with any company. As of now, it appears Lynch is taking time off and enjoying it with her family, which consists of Rollins and their daughter. It is difficult to envision Lynch going elsewhere since Rollins is entrenched in WWE, so most fans seem to anticipate her returning to WWE...

title: Tablets y enfados: un estudio descubre relación entre el uso de este dispositivo y los berrinches continuos en los niños
content: La tecnología ha llegado a todos los aspectos de nuestra vida, lo que significa que incluso los más pequeños también usan o están cerca de ella de una manera u otra. Aunque la exposición a los dispositivos entre los niños debería ser mínima o incluso inexistente, hoy en día es muy complicado lograrlo por cómo funciona este mundo. Entre todos los dispositivos que hay, las tablets han sido elegidas por la mayoría de padres como el que se les da a los niño s, ya que de esta manera los adultos siguen teniendo su smartphone encima y los pequeños están entretenidos. Pero los descubrimientos de un estudio publicado en 'JAMA Pediatrics' ha concluido que el uso de tabletas por parte de los niños contribuye a los arrebatos de ira y frustración en edades de 3,5 a 5,5 años. Estas son las conclusiones obtenidas por el equipo de investigación a través de encuestas realizadas a los progenitores de 315 niños a lo largo de tres años en Canadá. En concreto, el estudio hizo un seguimiento de 171 niños (54 por ciento) y 144 niñas (46 por ciento) a las edades de 3,5 (en el año 2020), 4,5 (2021) y 5,5 años (2022). Los niños incrementaron su tiempo de uso de tabletas a medida que fueron creciendo, al mismo tiempo que aprendieron a manejar dispositivos móviles por sí solos. Todo ello ha llevado a que el uso de pantallas está cada vez más presente en la vida de los...

title: Ադրբեջանը ոչնչից չի հրաժարվել, պատրանքներով ապրել պետք չէ. Տաթեւիկ Հայրապետյան
creator: Առավոտ
content: ՔՊ նախկին պատգամավոր, ԵԽԽՎ – ում Հայաստանի պատվիրակության նախկին անդամ , ադրբեջանագետ Տաթեւիկ Հայրապետյանի տելեգրամյան գրառումը «Վերադառնանք Զանգեզուրի հարցին. այստեղ, առաջին հերթին, հարկ է հիշել. Արեւմտյան Զանգեզուրի հողերը Հայաստանին հանձնելը բացահայտ անարդարություն էր եւ՛ Ադրբեջանի՝ որպես պետության, եւ՛ ադրբեջանցի ժողովրդի նկատմամբ։ Եվ այս անարդարությունը պետք է շտկվի։ Եվ դա կարվի։ Ադրբեջանի նախագահ Իլհամ Ալիեւը բազմիցս ընդգծել է, որ մենք կվերադառնանք Զանգեզուր։ Ե՞րբ եւ ինչպե՞ս։ Պետության ղեկավարը դա լավ գիտի եւ իր քաղաքականության մեջ շատ կարեւոր տեղ է հատկացնում այդ ռազմավարությանը։ Նախագահ Իլհամ Ալիեւն ինքը կորոշի այս հարցը, ուստի խառնվելու կարիք չկա». սա հատված է Ադրբեջանի պետական գերատեսչությունների կողմից կառավարվող կայքերից մեկի այսօրվա հրապարակումից, որը գալիս է փաստելու, որ Ադրբեջանը ոչնչից չի հրաժարվել եւ պատրանքներով ապրել պետք չէ, այլ պետք է հստակ հասկանալ հակառակորդի ծրագրերի ու աշխատել դրանք խափանելու ուղղությամբ։ Իսկ թե ինչու է Ադրբեջանն ասել, որ ապաշրջափակման հարցերը դուրս են թողնվում այսպես կոչված «խաղաղության պայմանագրից», ապա դրա պատասխանը պարզ է։ Նախ, Ադրբեջանի համար այդ թուղթը կարեւոր չէ, իրենք հստակ ցույց են տվել, որ իրենց պետք է գործընթաց, որից շահում են առավելագույնը։ Ինչ վերաբերում է ապաշրջափակմանը, ապա այստեղ բարդ աշխարհաքաղաքական պայքար է. Ադրբեջանն էլ վաղուց հասկացել է դա եւ փորձում է այդ ամենից մաքսիմալ օգուտ քաղել՝ չգնալով առճակատման այն...

title: Utiliza o MB WAY? Deco alerta para risco de aumento das comissões
creator: Ana Sofia Neto
content: Esta quarta-feira, a Deco alertou para o risco de aumento de comissões no serviço MB WAY, na sequência do novo regime de transferências entre contas de pagamentos. Atualmente, este é um dos métodos mais práticos para fazer transferências bancárias, em Portugal. Conforme está a ser avançado pela imprensa nacional, a Associação Portuguesa para a Defesa do Consumidor (Deco) alertou para o risco de aumento de comissões no serviço MB WAY na sequência do novo regime de transferências entre contas de pagamentos. Em causa estão notícias recentes segundo as quais a SIBS , que é a gestora da rede Multibanco e do serviço MB WAY, pretende permitir que este último possa ser associado a contas de pagamento, além da solução que já existe de associar a cartões de pagamento. Em comunicado, a Deco manifesta "a sua preocupação, uma vez que poderá haver um aumento de comissões neste novo regime de transferências entre contas de pagamentos". A associação do MB WAY a contas irá significar que as transferências entre utilizadores serão consideradas transferências imediatas [pelo que] poderão estar sujeitas ao preçário aplicável a essas transferências e não sujeitas aos limites aplicáveis a transferências entre cartões, como acontece presentemente, e em caso de ultrapassar as transações gratuitas, de 0,2% em caso de cartão de débito e 0,3% em caso de...

title: CM attends flag hoisting ceremony on 77th Independence Day
content: LAHORE, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) hoisted the national flag at the Alamgiri Gate of Fort on the occasion of Day. National anthem was presented on the occasion. The participated in a special ceremony being held at the Hazuri . The CM paid a to the Mazar-e-Iqbal, laid a floral wreath and offered Fateha at the Mazar-e-Iqbal. She prayed for the integrity, , prosperity and stability of the country and paid homage to the of the East in glowing words. CM was presented a salute by the smartly turned out contingent of scouts standing on the stairs of Badshahi and the bands presented beautiful tunes. The female students clad in Sindhi, Balochi, Kalash, Kashmiri, Punjabi, and other regional dresses accorded a warm reception to the CM by clapping. The excerpts the speech of Quaid-e-Azam were also presented in the ceremony. The differently-abled children presented the national anthem in connection with the Day. The CM left her seat and sat among the differently-abled children and appreciated their presenting the national anthem. Ambassadors various countries and prominent personalities different walks of life participated in the Day ceremony being held at Hazuri . Senior Provincial Minister , Provincial Minister for Information Azma Bokhari, Provincial Ministers Mujtaba Shuja-ur-Rehman, Rana Sikandar Hayat, Zeeshan Sikandar, Sohail Shoukat Butt, , Sher Ali...

title: Kamala Harris' campaign re-wrote news headlines so major publishers appear to be on HER side
content: Kamala Harris' campaign re-wrote news headlines so major publishers appear to be on HER side It's unclear whether users can distinguish the ads from real news articles Follow along with DailyMail.com's live political news coverage By Katelyn Caralle, Senior U.S. Political Reporter For Dailymail.Com Published: 14:24, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 14:40, 14 August 2024 e-mail 39 shares 87 View comments Kamala Harris ' campaign wants Americans to think major news outlets are publishing overwhelming positive articles about her relatively new candidacy. The vice president's team is manipulating headlines and article descriptions within Google search ads that make it appear outlets like Reuters, CBS News and CNN back her presidency, an analysis by Axios reveals. Donald Trump 's campaign isn't running these types of ads, according to Google's ad transparency center. While it doesn't technically violate the search engine's policies and are marked as 'sponsored,' some platforms have questioned whether this format can spread misinformation. The move is an apparent effort to stoke even more positive headlines and continue the 'honeymoon' phase Republicans claim Harris is seeing after taking over President Joe Biden 's bid. Meanwhile, since entering the race 24 days ago, Harris has still not participated in an interview or held a press conference. Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign is...

title: Where the Seattle Seahawks rank in fantasy football heading into the 2024 NFL season | Sporting News
creator: Tim Weaver
content: The Seattle Seahawks have been subjected to a lot of disrespect this offseason when it comes to the national media and their expectations for this team in 2024. Power rankings, positional rankings, and projections for this young and hungry team all seem to be on the negative side compared with what we're expecting from them. Pro Football Focus has been one of the worst offenders all year, as they have consistently underrated this Seattle team and what it's capable of. Their fantasy rankings for the regular season to come are another example. Here's where PFF has every fantasy-relevant Seahawks player placed heading into the 2024 according to their top 400 rankings. Seahawks 2024 PFF fantasy rankings - WR DK Metcalf: 34 - RB Ken Walker: 53 - WR Jaxon Smith-Njigba: 82 - WR Tyler Lockett: 108 - RB Zach Charbonnet: 116 - QB Geno Smith: 158 - TE Noah Fant: 190 - K Jason Myers: 240 - Seahawks D/ST: 307 - QB Sam Howell: 336 - RB Kenny McIntosh: 357 - WR Jake Bobo: 378 Tough scene. As far as sleeper potential goes, our best estimate is quarterback Geno Smith and the defense/special teams unit are your best bets. The projections for both look a little bit low on paper and if the new coaching staff - namely offensive coordinator Ryan Grubb and head coach Mike Macdonald - are as good as advertised they should have no trouble outperforming them.

title: India News | Odisha to Bring Five Royal Bengal Tigers from Maharashtra, MP by September
content: Bhubaneswar, Aug 14 (PTI) To bolster big cat population in Odisha, forest officials have begun the process of relocating five Royal Bengal Tigers from Maharashtra and Madhya Pradesh, with the transfer scheduled to be completed in September. According to Principal Chief Conservator of Forests (PCCF)-Wildlife, Susanta Nanda, three of these tigers will be released into the Debrigarh Wildlife Sanctuary in Sambalpur, while the remaining two will be introduced into the Similipal Tiger Reserve in Mayurbhanj. “On our request, both Maharashtra and Madhya Pradesh have given their consent for relocation of their tigers to Odisha. They have also identified the tigers from core areas of their forests,” Nanda told media persons on Wednesday. Two teams of Odisha forest officials will visit the two states very soon, within a week, to see the tigers, he said. In its latest tiger estimation conducted for the first time during 2023-24 in 47 forest divisions of Odisha, 30 tigers and eight cubs were found.Out of the 30 Royal Bengal Tigers, 27 were found in the Similipal Tiger Reserve (STR), while Keonjhar territorial and Keonjhar wildlife, Paralakhemundi territorial, and Hirakud wildlife had one tiger each. The PCCF also said that the Nandankanan Zoological Park is all set to welcome two giraffes by the end of this month. The pair of giraffes will be brought to the zoo from Alipore Zoological...

title: How Does UCAS Clearing Help With Unexpected A-Level Results?
creator: Amy Glover
uk
content: Stefan Rousseau/PA Images via Getty Images A-level results are due out tomorrow (the 15th of August) in the UK. In fact, universities and some headteachers can already see the results of the exams. That’s how you can see if you’ve got your choice of course the morning of results day. But what happens if your A-level results aren’t what you thought they would be ― for better or worse? Are you stuck without access to your UCAS choices, or unable to apply to a different uni you didn’t expect to be able to apply to? Advertisement Not necessarily. UCAS’ “clearing” process, which matches students who didn’t sign up for certain courses on their first try to institutions with free spots after taking in the first round of applicants, may be able to help. How does it work? Per Gov.uk’s Education Hub , “Clearing is when UCAS provides students with the chance to apply for university places which haven’t yet been filled.” “It’s available to anyone who has made a UCAS Undergraduate application and doesn’t hold any offers,” they add . It may be a good option for those who didn’t get into any of the choices they initially picked, or those who didn’t think they’d get high enough results to apply for another course or college. title: Hindustan Zinc announces date, floor price for offer for sale; check details here
content: Hindustan Zinc Limited (HZL) announced on Wednesday that its offer for sale will start on August 16 and end on August 19, with a floor price set at ₹ 486 per share. Earlier on the same day, its parent company, Vedanta, updated its stake sale in HZL to 3.31 per cent through the OFS route, up from the previously planned 2.60 per cent. "This is in supersession of the earlier approval of the Committee of Directors and the intimation filed by the Company dated August 13, 2024," the company said in an exchange filing on Wednesday. Hindustan Zinc OFS details Only non-retail investors shall be allowed to place their bids on T day, i.e., August 16, 2024, the company added. The metal and mining major will now offer 14 crore shares of HZL instead of the previously announced 11 crore shares, as disclosed on Tuesday. The floor price for the Hindustan Zinc offer for sale is set at a 16 per cent discount to Wednesday's closing price of ₹ 576. The stock closed down 0.7 per cent on Wednesday compared to Tuesday's closing price. Vedanta's stake sale will be conducted in two phases. On August 16, it will sell over 5.14 crore equity shares, representing 1.22 per cent of HZL’s total equity, exclusively to non-retail investors. On August 19, the issue will be open to retail investors and non-retail investors who wish to carry forward their unallocated bids. Additionally, the OFS includes an option...

title: Cae en Chile el cabecilla de ‘Los Pulpos’ de Trujillo
content: Cuatro peruanos, que se encontraban con Jhordy Rojas Seguil, también fueron detenidos Los Carabineros de Chile capturaron a Jhordy Rojas Seguil , presunto líder de la peligrosa banda criminal ‘Los Pulpos’ de Trujillo , junto a otros siete integrantes de la organización en el barrio Recoleta de Santiago. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); El operativo fue el resultado de un minucioso seguimiento e interceptaciones telefónicas a uno de los miembros del grupo delictivo. La banda, conformada por cinco ciudadanos peruanos y tres venezolanos , se encontraba en la capital chilena. Según información recogida por un medio local de ese país, Rojas Seguil, de 31 años, se encontraba en el país sureño utilizando la identidad de su propio tío para evitar ser reconocido por las autoridades. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Lee también: González-Olaechea fue condecorado con Medalla Fernando Belaunde Terry Datos ofrecidos por los Carabineros de Chile indican que el líder de ‘Los Pulpos’ tenía una orden de extradición de Perú desde el 14 de septiembre del año 2023 por el presunto delito de sicariato. title: احتجاز مواطن أمريكي في موسكو لاعتدائه على شرطي
content: وقال البيان: ""تم رفع قضية جنائية لارتكاب الجريمة المنصوص عليها في الجزء الأول من المادة 318 من القانون الجنائي الروسي (استخدام العنف ضد ممثل السلطات).. ويجري تنفيذ إجراءات التحقيق بحق المدعى عليه وسيتم توجيه لائحة الاتهام إليه في أقرب وقت". وحسب التحقيق، فإنه في ليلة 12 أغسطس تم إحضار مواطن أمريكي إلى قسم الشرطة على خلفية حادث إخلال بالنظام العام، حيث رفض الرجل تقديم الوثائق الثبوتية، وبعد ذلك اعتدى على أحد ضباط الشرطة. وفي التفاصيل، نقلت وكالة "نوفوستي" عن مصدر أمني إن الأمريكي جوزيف تاغر أثار شجارا في فندق "راديسون" برفضه تقديم وثائق حول مكان إقامته السابق. وأدى ذلك إلى اقتياده إلى مركز شرطة حيث اعتدى بالضرب على أحد الضباط. المصدر: "نوفوستي"

title: Sahibi polise hibe etmişti: Zehir tacirlerinin korkulu rüyası oldu
content: İzmir'de sahibinin yaşlılığa bağlı nedenlerle bakımını yapamadığından 8 aylıkken emniyete hibe edilen Belçika malinois cinsi 'Layka', aldığı eğitimlerin ardından narkotik köpeği olarak göreve başladı. Layka, 5 yılda çok sayıda uyuşturucu operasyonunda tonlarca narkotik madde buldu. Eğitmen polis memuru Gökhan Keçeçioğlu, "Hibe edilince inceledik ve görev için uygun olduğunu gördük. Çünkü her can dostu, narkotik köpeği olamıyor. Layka, yavruyken geldiği için aramızda duygusal bağ var" dedi. Urla ilçesinde yaşayan bir kişi, sahiplendiği 8 aylık Belçika malinois cinsi dişi köpek 'Layka'ya yaşlılığa bağlı nedenlerden bakamadı. Köpeği sahiplendirmek isteyen kişiye bir yakını polise hibe etmesini tavsiye edince Layka'yı polis ekiplerine teslim etti. Emniyetin köpek eğitim merkezi uzmanları tarafından Layka'ya 3 ay boyunca ön eğitim verildi. Eğitimde aktarılanları kısa sürede öğrenen Layka, Ankara'da düzenlenen kursa gönderildi. Kursta da başarılı olan Layka, 5 yıl önce polis narkotik köpeği olarak hizmete başladı. Hassas burunlu narkotik köpeği, çok sayıda uyuşturucu operasyonunda yer alırken, yakalanmamak için farklı noktalara gizlenen uyuşturucuları buldu. Narkotik Suçlarla Mücadele Şube Müdürlüğü'nde görevli komiser Kasım Alirızaoğlu, henüz 8 aylıkken 'Layka'nın aralarına katıldığını belirterek, "Layka...

title: Заборона УПЦ МП. Нардеп попереджає: лобісти Московської церкви вигадали новий фейк
content: Микита Потураєв вважає, що розмовами про перехід УПЦ МП «під крило Константинополя» адепти Російської церкви в Україні зривають прийняття багатостраждального законопроєкту No8371 Чутки про те, що Московська церква , яка працює в Україні під брендом УПЦ МП, отримає у найближчому майбутньому екзархат Вселенського патріархату Константинополя, розповсюджують лобісти «московських попів». Про це заявив голова комітету Верховної Ради з питань гуманітарної та інформаційної політики Микита Потураєв у коментарі «Главкому». На його думку, мета таких розмов – відкласти розгляд законопроєкту No8371 щодо заборони церков, пов’язаних з духовним центром у Москві. Цей проєкт стоїть першим у порядку денному наступного пленарного тижня. «Фахівці пояснюють, що такий екзархат – абсолютно висмоктана з пальця брехня, – пояснює Потураєв. – Коли зайшла розмова про Томос для новоствореної Православної церкви України, то РПЦ розірвала канонічні стосунки з Фанаром і синхронно це зробила УПЦ (МП). Більше того, на Соборі УПЦ (МП) в травні 2022 року, вже після початку великої війни, це рішення про розрив стосунків було ще раз підтверджено. То як тепер вони можуть просити у Фанара екзархат, якщо вони не знаходяться з ним у стосунках?» Потураєв також зауважує, що Томос надається церкві, народу і державі – тобто має бути триєдине звернення. «Тому коли надавався Томос ПЦУ, збиралися підписи...

title: Judge rejects Donald Trump’s latest demand to step aside from hush-money criminal case
creator: MICHAEL R. SISAK and JENNIFER PELTZ
content: NEW YORK (AP) — Donald Trump has lost his latest bid for a new judge in his hush money case as it heads toward a key ruling and potential sentencing next month. Judge Juan M. Merchan on Wednesday declined to step aside, rejecting the third such request from lawyers for the Republican presidential nominee. All three times, they argued that Merchan has a conflict of interest because of his daughter's work as a political consultant for prominent Democrats and campaigns. Among them was Vice President Kamala Harris' 2020 presidential run. A state court ethics panel said last year that Merchan could continue on the case, writing that a relative’s independent political activities are not “a reasonable basis to question the judge’s impartiality." Merchan has repeatedly said he is certain he can handle the case fairly and impartially. Advertisement But with Harris now Trump’s Democratic opponent in this year’s White House election, Trump lawyer Todd Blanche wrote in a letter to the judge last month that the defense’s concerns have become “even more concrete.” Prosecutors called the claims “a vexatious and frivolous attempt to relitigate” the issue.

title: Kashif Ashfaq hoists national flag at PFC HQ
content: LAHORE, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 14th Aug, 2024) was carved out as an independent homeland after immense sacrifices and bloodshed to their lives according to the tenets of . Pakistan Furniture Council (PFC) Chief Executive Officer Mian Kashif Ashfaq expressed these views after hoisting national flag at PFC Headquarter on Wednesday. He said the journey to was marked by relentless struggles, hardships, and unwavering faith in the vision of a separate homeland for . The founders of , led by Quaid-i-Azam , struggled for a separate land where could practice their religion freely, govern themselves according to Islamic principles, and protect their cultural and religious identity. He said the sacrifices made during the struggle for were colossal. The large number of families were lost, and many endured unimaginable suffering. However, these sacrifices were not in vain. emerged as a beacon of hope for in the subcontinent, offering them the opportunity to their lives according to their religious belief. He said the creation of was not just a political victory but a profound spiritual achievement, fulfilling the aspirations of who yearned for a society governed by justice, equality, and Islamic values. Later participants were entertained with refreshments, sweets were distributed and Chenone gave special gifts to .

title: Το δέντρο, το δάσος και η κέτσαπ
creator: ΑΝΔΡΕΑΣ ΨΑΛΤΗΣ
content: Στα καθαρά ποδοσφαιρικά ή και όχι μόνο, δυσκολευόμαστε πολύ να δούμε το δάσος μετά από μία ήττα κι έναν αποκλεισμό. Είναι η ο οπαδική σχέση τόσο δυνατή με την εκάστοτε ομάδα, ικανή να μπλοκάρει κάθε μακρινή ματιά. Εν ολίγοις βλέπουμε μόνο το δέντρο κι αυτό μερικές φορές μοιάζει με μικρό θάμνο. Στη περίπτωση του ΑΠΟΕΛ, ο Νταβίντ Γκαγιέγο επιχείρησε να περιγράψει την αποτυχία με την Σλόβαν με... κέτσαπ. Βασικά αντί να πει, δείτε το δάσος και όχι το δέντρο, είπε ότι τα γκολ - αυτό που στη τελική έλειψε από την χθεσινή παρουσία της ομάδας του στο ΓΣΠ - είναι σαν την κέτσαπ που όταν αρχίσει να έχει ροή, δεν σταματά. Ο Ισπανός προπονητής έμεινε ικανοποιημένος από την εικόνα της ομάδας του. Ουσιαστικά είδε έναν ΑΠΟΕΛ να πιέζει, να γυροφέρνει την περιοχή των Σλοβάκων, ενίοτε να μπαίνει σ ́αυτήν, αλλά να μην βρίσκει τον τρόπο να στείλει την μπάλα στα δίκτυα . Ήταν δεδομένο ότι με τον ρυθμό που επιχείρησε και έδωσε ο ΑΠΟΕΛ στο παιχνίδι, θα ερχόταν η κούραση. Όταν αυτή ήρθε και το παιχνίδι ήταν ακόμα στο 0-0, πολύ, μα πολύ δύσκολα θα ανατρέπονταν τα δεδομένα. Γιατί θα ρίσκαρε κι άλλο (το έκανε) ο αντίπαλος όντας πιο φρέσκος όχι μόνο στο χθεσινό ματς, αλλά και γενικά, θα έβρισκε χώρους (που βρήκε) για να «σκοτώσει» κάθε «γαλαζοκίτρινη» ελπίδα μίας μεγάλης...

title: जरुरी जानकारी | स्निकर्स निर्माता मार्स 30 अरब डॉलर में केलानोवा को खरीदेगी
content: केलानोवा का गठन पिछले साल केलॉग कंपनी को तीन इकाइयों में बांटे जाने के समय किया गया था। केलानोवा चीज़-इट, प्रिंगल्स, एगो, टाउन हाउस, मॉर्निंगस्टार फार्म्स जैसे लाभ में चल रहे कई ब्रांड की बिक्री करती है। मार्स इंक ने बुधवार को इस खरीद योजना की घोषणा करते हुए कहा कि वह सौदे के तहत नकद में 83.50 डॉलर प्रति शेयर का भुगतान करेगी। पूरे लेनदेन का कुल मूल्य 35.9 अरब डॉलर रहने का अनुमान है जिसमें कर्ज भी शामिल हैं। मार्स स्नैकिंग के वैश्विक अध्यक्ष एंड्रयू क्लार्क ने बयान में कहा, ‘‘केलानोवा के ब्रांड साथ आने से हमारे उत्पादों का विस्तार होगा और उपभोक्ताओं की जरूरतों को बेहतर ढंग से पूरा कर पाएंगे।’’ केलानोवा की खरीद का सौदा अगले साल की पहली छमाही में पूरा होने की संभावना है। सौदा पूरा होने पर केलानोवा अमेरिका में निजी स्वामित्व वाली सबसे बड़ी कंपनियों में शुमार मार्क स्नैकिंग की इकाई बन जाएगी। यह पिछले साल जे एम स्मकर के हाथों होस्टेस की 5.6 अरब डॉलर में खरीद के बाद इस क्षेत्र का सबसे बड़ा सौदा होगा।

title: Rescatan a siete menores de edad que estaban mendigando en El Poblado de Medellín: así fue el operativo
creator: Jhon Bernal
content: En horas de la madrugada del martes 13 de agosto de 2024, la Policía Metropolitana de Medellín, junto con funcionarios de la Administración distrital, rescataron de la calle a siete menores de edad que estaban siendo utilizados para pedir dinero en el barrio El Poblado. El operativo se desarrolló en la comuna 14 de la capital antioqueña, y contó con la participación de las secretarías de Inclusión Social y Familia, Seguridad y Convivencia, las gerencias del Centro y Territorios Estratégicos y la de Etnias, el Instituto Colombiano de Bienestar Familiar y la Policía de Infancia y Adolescencia (Icbf), en la que desarrollaban una actividad de sensibilización a la ciudadanía sobre la mendicidad y la utilización de niños y adolescentes para esta práctica. “ Estaban siendo instrumentalizados por fuera del contexto de protección y de sus familias . Estos niños iniciaron todo el proceso de restablecimiento de derechos de la mano del Instituto Colombiano de Bienestar Familiar”, dijo Sandra Sánchez Álvarez, secretaria de Inclusión Social de Medellín. Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . Los siete menores de edad quedaron bajo la protección del Icbf donde se realizó el restablecimiento de derechos, y se desconoce la ubicación de los padres de familia de los infantes. Igualmente, la funcionaria señaló que estas intervenciones...

title: Eva Mendes and Kate McKinnon will be among guests this fall at 92nd Street Y in Manhattan
creator: Via AP news wire
content: Kate McKinnon , Malcolm Gladwell and Eva Mendes will be among the featured speakers this fall at the 92nd Street Y i n Manhattan, a leading venue for arts events. McKinnon will be promoting her expansively titled children's story, “The Millicent Quibb School of Etiquette for Young Ladies of Mad Science," and Gladwell his new book, ”Revenge of the Tipping Point." Mendes will discuss her picture book, “Desi, Mami, and the Never-Ending Worries,” a family-friendly version of life with the two children she has with husband Ryan Gosling. Other guests at the Y will include Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer , whose “True Gretch” came out this summer; Josh Brolin, who has written the memoir “From Under the Truck"; and designer Bob Mackie , who will be discussing a documentary about him, ”Naked Illusion."

title: Caldo killer, i senzatetto muoiono come in inverno: «Importante evitare la disidratazione»
content: Il caldo record ed estremo di quest'estate infernale uccide . Le vittime , oltre ad anziani e fragili , sono i senza fissa dimora , come succede durante l'inverno a causa del freddo. Ogni giorno, molti senzatetto vengono ricoverati per colpi di calore e rischiano la vita. Caldo e afa, città d'arte prese d'assedio dai turisti: «È boom di ricoveri in pronto soccorso per colpi di calore e insolazioni» La situazione a Milano Alberto Sinigallia , presidente della Fondazione Progetto Arca , spiega all' Adnkronos la drammatica situazione di circa 2mila senzatetto a Milano: «Durante l'estate distribuiamo beni rinfrescanti e ricchi di acqua, come meloni, anguria, gelati e ghiaccioli. Abbassare anche solo di pochi gradi la temperatura corporea è fondamentale . Inoltre, è essenziale idratarsi : chi vive in strada deve bere almeno un litro e mezzo o due litri di acqua al giorno per evitare la disidratazione». Sinigallia aggiunge: «Abbiamo implementato un'app e un portale per segnalare le esigenze quotidiane dei senzatetto. Se c'è bisogno di un paio di scarpe, ad esempio, il giorno dopo chi è di turno nella zona le fornisce con il numero richiesto. Inoltre, abbiamo mantenuto aperta la nostra mensa per permettere alle persone senza fissa dimora di rinfrescarsi al mattino, giocare a carte e utilizzare le docce. Con il caldo, lavarsi diventa ancora più importante ». Proprio martedì 13...

title: Lesen
creator: Judith von Sternburg
content: Lesen In den USA ist beleibe nicht jede und jeder dafür - dabei rät sogar der Papst dazu, es zu machen, ganz ohne Vorgaben. Das berüchtigte Gesetz „Iowa Senate File 496“ hat eine weitere Hürde genommen, ein Gericht hat die einstweilige Verfügung gegen ein groß angelegtes Bücherverbot in Schulbibliotheken des US-Bundesstaates gekippt. Aus den Regalen müssen demnach alle Bücher, in denen es ausdrücklich um Sexualität geht. Das klingt jetzt ein bisschen lapidar, eine Liste konkretisiert das aber. Man bekommt einen roten Kopf, wenn man sie studiert, wie es stets zu den kuriosen Seiten von Verboten gehört, wenn das ab jetzt Verbotene erst einmal ausführlich aufgezählt und ausgestellt werden muss. Damit es keine Missverständnisse gibt. Unter den berühmtesten betroffenen Titeln sind Margaret Atwoods „Report der Magd“, Alice Walkers „Die Farbe Lila“ (beide unter den Top-Ten der bisher verbannten Bücher), George Orwells „1984“ (seltener auch „Farm der Tiere“), James Joyce’ „Ulysses“, William Faulkners „Als ich im Sterben lag“, Stephen Kings „It“. Das wird also alles ein bisschen unterschiedlich gehandhabt. Wenn Sie jetzt hoffen oder es voll lustig fänden, in der Bibel delikate Stellen ausfindig machen zu können: Nein, religiöse Schriften sind ausdrücklich ausgenommen (so ausdrücklich wie der Sex sein muss, sozusagen). Fromme Menschen wollen keine frommen Werke...

title: نگرانی اتباع از مشکل ثبت نام کلاس اولی‌ها در سایت مای مدیو
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: اتباع جهت ثبت نام دانش آموزان کلاس اولی باید به سایت مای مدیو مراجعه کنند، اما با وجود اینکه مدارک کامل و کد سرشماری دارند، اما هنگام ثبت کد سرشماری سامانه خطا می‌دهند و آنها امکان ثبت نام دانش آموزان کلاس اولی را ندارند. شهروند خبرنگار‌ها با ارسال پیام از مسئولان درخواست رسیدگی کردند تا قبل از پایان زمان ثبت نام این مشکل برطرف شود. متن پیام شهروند خبرنگار‌ها باسلام؛ اتباع در ثبت نام دانش آموزان ویژه کلاس اولی‌ها مشکل داریم: ۱- شکل ورود به پنجره خدمات دولت هوشمند جهت ثبت‌نام سنجش پیش ثبت‌نام مدارس، با اینکه سیم‌کارت به نام والدین هست، اما غالبا بین سیم‌کارت و کد اتباع عدم مطابقت میزند و وارد سایت نمی‌شود و هیچ کجا هم پاسخگو نیست. ۲- مشکل نوبت گیری سنجش که مشکل فعلی در عکس‌هایی که فرستادم نمایش داده شده. ۳- مشکل پیش ثبت‌نام در سایت مای مادیو؛ وقتی گزینه پیش ثبت‌نام را کلیک میکنیم، به روشنی نوشته: اگر اتباع هستید به مدرسه مراجعه کنید، اما مدارس بدون برگه پیش ثبت‌نام سایت، ثبت نام نمی‌کند و مردم را به کافی‌نت‌ها ارجاع می‌دهد و کافی‌نت هم به دلیل بسته بودن سایت هیچ کاری نمی‌تواند. خانواده‌های زیادی را می‌شناسم که از اول تابستان درگیر هستند، اما هنوز نتوانسته اند فرزندانشان را ثبت‌نام کند در حالیکه مدارک کامل دارند. خواهش مندم این مشکل گزارش کنید و به مسئولان برسانید. سلام؛ سایت مای مدیو خراب است و برای اتباعی که سرشماری دارند خطا می‌زند و اصلا پاسخ نمی‌دهد. حالا ما برای ثبت نام سنجش چیکار کنیم این یه اختلال سیستمی هست که باید درست شود وگرنه بچه‌های ما از تحصیل امسال جا...

title: Благотворители Окленда случайно разослали детям конфеты с метамфетамином
creator: RT на русском
content: Сотрудники благотворительной организации в Новой Зеландии случайно раздали детям из бедных семей партию конфет с метамфетамином, причём уровень содержания наркотика в сладостях был смертелен, пишет Metro. Всего семьям с низким уровнем достатка было отправлено около 400 посылок, теперь же организация Auckland City Mission пытается связаться со всеми получателями партии. Изначально сладости были получены от неназванного мецената, по предварительным данным, конфеты с ананасовым вкусом произвела малайзийская компания Rinda. Власти Окленда отметили, что восемь семей сообщили об «отвратительном» вкусе сладостей. Полиция выясняет обстоятельства происшедшего.

title: Carceri: avvocati e politici visitano San Vittore, affollamento record
content: Milano, 14 ago. Il carcere più affollato d’Italia. Le celle di San Vittore ospitano 1.007 detenuti, a fronte di una capienza effettiva di 450, con una percentuale di detenuti stranieri che tocca il 75%. Più della metà dei detenuti, circa 650, ha dipendenze da droghe o farmaci, mentre circa 200 detenuti soffrono di un disagio psichico certificato. L’indice di sovraffollamento è di circa il 231% contro una media nazionale del 130%. Numeri che nascondono storie di persone che combattono il caldo con cartoni alle sbarre – ieri sera la temperatura interna superava i 33 gradi – o curano (sul davanzale) una piantina di peperoncino per coltivare la speranza. Donne e uomini che soffrono l’eterna emergenza del sovraffollamento e che oggi hanno ricevuto in visita una delegazione di avvocati, composta tra gli altri dal presidente dell’Ordine degli avvocati di Milano Antonino La Lumia e dalla presidente della Camera penale di Milano Valentina Alberta, da Stefania Amato dell’Osservatorio Carcere Ucpi e dall’avvocato Alessandro Giungi, insieme ai parlamentari Sandro Sisler (FdI), Antonella Forattini (Pd) Celestino Magni (Avs) e alla consigliera di Regione Lombardia Paola Pollini (5 Stelle). Invitati, ma assenti, i magistrati della Sorveglianza. Tra celle chiuse, assenza di ventilatori e carenza di personale, meno 150 rispetto alla pianta organica, il direttore Giacinto Siciliano fa gli...

title: Anza Launches Solar Software Platform for Developers
creator: Michael Bates
content: has launched a product and subscription offering that aims to provide solar developers, IPPs, EPCs, utilities, investors and independent engineers with access to industry real-time data and software. The company’s software and subscription offering enables developers and module buyers to access supplier pricing, product and counterparty data, technical specs and downloadable documentation from its platform. “Anza’s subscription offering sets a new standard in the industry,” says Mike Hall, CEO of Anza. “Developers and those in charge of solar procurement no longer have to make assumptions based on outdated market pricing or unreliable forecasts. Instead, they gain access to the most robust and accurate pricing, comprehensive product information and detailed supply chain data all in one place, whenever they need. The long-tail impact is increased project profits and, ultimately, more solar projects getting funded and online.” Anza will offer tiered subscription packages for access to the platform.

title: Sougé-le-Ganelon. Tout savoir sur le programme du comice agricole
content: Par Rédaction Sillé-le-Guillaume Publié le 14 août 2024 à 15h40 Voir mon actu Suivre Les Alpes Mancelles « Pour ce comice de Sougé-le-Ganelon ( Sarthe ), nous avons choisi le thème des insectes qui jouent un rôle crucial dans notre écosystème. Sans eux, notre agriculture et notre alimentation seraient gravement menacées. Aussi, plusieurs activités ont été pensées pour sensibiliser le public, l’informer et l’inspirer à agir en faveur de la biodiversité », détaille Bruno Depaifve , président du comice qui aura lieu les 23 et 24 août à Sougé-le-Ganelon. Steve Fanouillet , photographe animalier du Mans, spécialiste en macro-photographie, exposera ses œuvres. Un bar à insectes Un bar à insectes gratuit sera ouvert pour les amateurs en expérimentation gustative. À lire aussi À Sougé-le-Ganelon, le comice agricole et le bar à insectes se préparent Yannick Chevreau, chargé de mission Bio-diversité Pays de la Loire, tiendra un stand pour en informer. Il s’agit d’impliquer le public de l’état des lieux dans quatre communes tests : Sougé-le-Ganelon, Saint-Paul-le-Gaultier, Saint-Georges-le-Gaultier et Moulin-le-Carbonnel et de mettre en place un atlas de la bio-diversité communale. Deux jours de fête Le comice, c’est aussi une fête. Avec le vendredi 23 août un Méga Loto , animé par Annick Dutertre, dans la salle polyvalente. Ouverture des portes...

Patates suyu yüze sürülür mü?
content: Mutfaklarda en çok kullanılan sebzelerin başında yer alan patates bilindiği gibi hem yemeklerde hem de salatalarda yer alıyor. Kızartması, yemeği, kavurması, salatası ve püresi yapılabilen patatesin genel sağlık sistemi üzerinde son derece olumlu etkileri bulunur. Peki patates suyunun cilt sağlığı üzerinde herhangi bir etkisi var mıdır? Son yıllarda doğal yöntemler ile cilt bakımlarının yapılmaya başlanması, farklı kürlerin de araştırılmasını beraberinde getirdi. Bu yazımızda sizlere, patates suyunun yüz bakımı için kullanılıp kullanılamayacağından bahsedeceğiz. Cilt bakımı ve cilt güzelliğinin devamlılığı için özellikle kadınlar, evlerinde bulunan malzemeler ile hangi cilt maskelerini yapabileceklerini araştırmaya devam ediyor. Kimyasal içerikli cilt bakım ürünlerinin yerinde doğal içeriklere sahip maskeleri kullanmayı tercih edenler, patates suyu maskesinin ne olduğunu araştırıyor. Patates suyu maskesi, patatesin içerisinde yer alan nişasta ve potasyumun kullanılması ile cildin ihtiyacını karşılamak için kullanılmaktadır. Cildin daha genç bir görünüme sahip olmasını sağlayan bu maske evde kolaylıkla hazırlanarak yüz bölgesine uygulanabilir. Cildin son derece pürüzsüz bir hale gelmesini sağlayacak patates suyu maskesi için sadece bir adet orta boy patatese ihtiyacınız olacak. Bu maskenin hazırlanması ve uygulanması için...

title: Ministar potvrdio: Ubijen Srbin
content: "Potvrđeno nam je od strane Nacionalne policije Španije da je 12. avgusta u gradu Estepona ubijen srpski državljanin S. M. (36) iz Beograda. Ubistvo je izvršeno iz vatrenog oružja, a S. M. je preminuo na licu mesta", rekao je Dačić. Dodao je da je S. M. imao lažni identitet belgijskog državljanina i da, prema informacijama španske policije, za sada ne postoji veza između tog događaja i trgovine drogom i organizovanog kriminala, saopštio je MUP. "Za licem je raspisana od strane Interpola Beograd međunarodna poternica, jer je bio član organizovane kriminalne grupe koja se bavila neovlašćenom proizvodnjom i stavljanjem u promet opojnih droga, radi neposrednog sticanja finansijske koristi", rekao je Dačić. Lice je, kako je objasnio, imalo zadatak kod utovara kokaina na brod, tako i za praćenje droge, njeno vađenje iz evropskih luka i dalju distribuciju, što je sve zabeleženo u komunikaciji preko aplikacije "SkyEcc". title: JAHTU TURSKOG MILIJARDERA GUTAO PLAMEN! Požar potopio plovilo vredno 15 miliona evra, sumnja se da je i ON bio među putnicima! (VIDEO)
content: Blizu obale Sardinije snimljena je dramatična scena kada je luksuznu jahtu u vlasništvu turskog milijardera Serkana Borančilija zahvatio požar . Ova jahta, duga 47 metara, procenjena je na najmanje 15 miliona evra. U video-snimku objavljenom na društvenim mrežama vidi se kako jahta tone. Sa broda nazvanog "Atina", koje se nalazi u Olbijskom zalivu, spašeno je ukupno 16 putnika i članova posade. Vatrogasci i Obalska straža brzo su reagovali, a povređenih nije bilo. Pretpostavlja se da je među putnicima bio i sam turski milijarder. Prema britanskom portalu "Dailymailu", jahta je potonula na dno mora u zalivu gde je dubina oko osam metara. Na jahti se nalazilo oko 50.000 litara goriva, zbog čega se planira njeno izvlačenje iz vode. Obalska straža je saopštila da nije bilo zagađenja naftom. Uzrok požara je pod istragom. "Atina" je kupljena 2021. godine za više od 15 miliona evra i nagrađena je na "World Superyacht Awards 2009". Prošla je kroz osmomesečnu rekonstrukciju, tokom koje su renovirani njenih pet kabina, dnevni boravak i sistemi za zabavu. Nedeljno iznajmljivanje jahte koštalo je 220.000 evra. title: Meta's Instagram failed to curtail hate speech against women politicians, report says
content: (Reuters) -Meta Platforms' Instagram failed to remove abusive comments aimed at female politicians who are potential candidates for the 2024 U.S. elections, according to a report by the non-profit Center for Countering Digital Hate on Wednesday. The report analyzed over half a million comments on Instagram posts by five Democratic and five Republican women politicians, including Senator Elizabeth Warren, former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Vice President and presidential candidate Kamala Harris, Senator Marsha Blackburn and Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene. CCDH flagged over 20,000 comments as "toxic," with 1,000 of these comments containing sexist and racist abuse, as well as death and rape threats. Instagram left up 93% of the harmful comments even after breaching the platform's standards. In response to the report, Meta said it has tools in place for users to control comments on their posts, including filtering out offensive comments, phrases or emojis. "We will review the CCDH report and take action on any content that violates our policies," said Cindy Southworth, head of women's safety at Meta. In its analysis of the 2020 U.S. election, the CCDH report found that women of color were more likely to be targets of sexist and racist abuse. The rise of online abuse against women politicians has drawn criticism from advocacy groups. It also highlighted how social media...

content: Este día será inolvidable para ti. Marcará un antes y un después, pues hoy conocerás qué emoción domina tu vida. Sí, en serio. Lo podrás saber cuando elijas uno de los árboles que aparecen en la imagen de abajo. Todo esto corresponde a un que, de verdad, me ha encantado. Participar en el mismo es muy fácil. Además, no te quitará bastante tiempo. Simplemente, asegúrate de seleccionar el que más te haya llamado la atención para que acabes leyendo el resultado correcto. Hay usuarios que escogieron al azar y terminaron recibiendo una información completamente ajena a la realidad. Estoy seguro que tú no quieres perder tu tiempo así como lo ellos. Entonces, actúa bien. En la imagen del test visual se puede apreciar cuatro árboles. Ninguno es igual a otro. Todos son diferentes y parece que fueron sacados de algún dibujo animado. Míralos bien porque te tienes que quedar con uno. Ya sabes. Tómate el tiempo que necesites para decidir. Nadie te apura. Si elegiste este árbol, la melancolía es la emoción que domina tu vida. A veces, dices: . No puedes evitar sentir nostalgia cuando ves hacia atrás. El futuro te abruma un poco. Si escogiste este árbol, el entusiasmo es la emoción que domina tu vida. title: European Film Awards 2024 unveils first contenders
content: European Film Awards 2024 has unveiled the first line-ups of film that have been selected its nominations. As per the Hollywood Reporter , the selection was announced on Wednesday in which the EFA has selected the first 29 productions in the running for this year. Among the line-ups, films such as Kinds of Kindness, Emilia Pérez, The Substance, Kneecap; and The Devil’s Bath have been selected as the initial films that members can consider for nominations. By far the most commercially successful title in the selection is Italian dramedy There’s Still Tomorrow , which topped the local box office last year, selling more tickets in Italy than Barbie did globally. As per the publication, the selection, picked by the EFA board, represents all 26 European countries, including members of the European Union and non-EU nations. The board has put forward the titles to the 5,000 voting members of the European Academy as potential nominees for this year’s awards. The second selection of titles will be announced in September. The nominees for the 2024 European Film Awards will be announced on November 5. The 37th European Film Awards will be held in Lucerne, Switzerland on December 7.

ANITIN I MATORIN BRAK BIO LAŽAN Otkriveni novi detalji u emisiji uživo!
content: Legitimnost venčanja Anite Stanojlović i Jovane Tomić Matore već mesecima je glavna priča u javnosti, a sada su otkriveni novi detalji. Naime, Lepi Mića je u emisiji "Narod pita" progovorio je o matičarki koja je venčala Anitu Stanojlović i Jovanu Tomić Matoru, te je šokirao ljude kada je izneo informaciju da svadba nije bila prava. Voditelj Darko Tanasijević pročitao je pitanje sa Tvitera koje je stiglo za Miću. - Do kad ćeš, Mićo, podržavati fejk ljubavi, mene to zanima iskreno? - pitao je voditelj, na šta je on odgovorio: - Pa nekada dobra veza nije garancija za dobar brak, kako neko može da zna da je fejk veza? Može neko da vidi drugačije od mene. Teodorina i Bebicina veza je skalamerija - naveo je on, pa se Tanasijević nadovezao: - Mića kaže da je učio Anitu da ne treba da vređa ljude koji je vređaju, zar ne bi bilo logično da on sam poštuje to što uči druge? - pročitao je Darko, a Lepi Mića je odgovorom iznenadio sve. - Nikada prvi nikog ne vređam, kada mene uvrede, onda dobiju nazad. Ja učim Anitu pravim vrednostima. Nikada nisam slagao, evo za ovu ženu što je Matorina i Anitina matičarka, tvrdi da brak nije zaveden. Kako je moguće da matičar dva puta pogreši prezime Aniti? - rekao je Mića. BONUS VIDEO: PROČITAJTE KLIKOM OVDE NAJVAŽNIJE AKTUELNE VESTI

title: 'सर आपको इसने गाली दी', छात्र की शिकायत पर टीचर ने बच्चे को पीटा, बाद में मांगी माफी
content: Feedback दरभंगा में टीचर ने छठी क्लास के छात्र को बेरहमी से पीटा. पिटाई के बाद छात्र के शरीर पर चोट के गहरे निशान पड़ गए. इसके बाद पीड़ित छात्र के परिजन गांव के सरपंच और कुछ ग्रमीणों के साथ स्कूल पहुंचे और प्रिंसिपल से इसकी शिकायत दर्ज कराई. हंगामा मचता देख टीचर ने अपनी गलती मानकर माफी मांगी. बिहार के दरभंगा में एक सरकारी स्कूल के टीचर का अमानवीय चेहरा सामने आया है. जहां टीचर ने छठी क्लास के छात्र को बेरहमी से पीटा. पिटाई के बाद छात्र के शरीर पर चोट के गहरे निशान पड़ गए. घर पहुंचकर छात्र ने अपने माता-पिता को घटना की जानकारी दी. इसके बाद पीड़ित परिजन गांव के सरपंच और कुछ ग्रमीणों के साथ स्कूल पहुंचे और प्रिंसिपल से इसकी शिकायत दर्ज कराई. हंगामा मचता देख टीचर ने अपनी गलती मानकर माफी मांगी. पीड़ित छात्र कृष्ण के पिता और ग्रामीणों ने टीचर को माफ करते बच्चे को अच्छी शिक्षा देने की सलाह दी और मामले को तत्काल वहीं पर खत्म कर दिया. टीचर ने छठी क्लास के छात्र को बेरहमी से पीटा सम्बंधित ख़बरें यह पूरा मामला दरभंगा जिला के बहादुरपुर प्रखंड के देकुली गांव स्थित राजकीयकृत मध्य विद्यालय का है. बताया जा रहा है कि क्लास में कुछ छात्र शोर मचा रहे थे. मौके पर पहुंचकर टीचर ने बच्चों को चुप कराया, इसी दौरान एक छात्र ने गाली दी, जिसे टीचर ने अनसुना कर दिया. जब इसकी शिकायत दूसरे छात्र ने टीचर से की तब उन्हें गुस्सा आ गया और उन्होंने गाली देने वाले छात्र कृष्ण कुमार की बेरहमी से पिटाई कर दी. इस मामले में स्कूल प्रिंसिपल ने बताया कि घटना के समय वो कहीं बाहर थीं. मामले के संज्ञान में आने के बाद समाजिक...

title: EN IMAGES ET VIDEO. Le Festival d’Aurillac est officiellement lancé
content: Par Florian Olivieri Publié le 14 août 2024 à 15h39 ; mis à jour le 14 août 2024 à 15h41 Voir mon actu Suivre Actu Cantal C’est un moment attendu de chaque édition. Aux alentours de midi, la place de l’Hôtel de Ville se remplit progressivement . À 12h30, un chariot fait son entrée au milieu de la foule. Un homme, au visage peint de blanc, nez rose et moustache courte, monte sur scène, accompagné de sa troupe. Ainsi s’ouvre le festival dans une atmosphère décalée. Ascension poétique La scène a ensuite été marquée par la prestation impressionnante de Seo, de la compagnie sud-coréenne A Perso ; n, qui a gravi une corde jusqu’à une hauteur vertigineuse pour délivrer un message poignant : « Ce n’est pas la fin du monde, c’est la fin d’un monde ». Cliquez ici pour visualiser le contenu À lire aussi Festival d’Aurillac. Ascension poétique de 30 mètres de haut avec une compagnie La clef de la ville Puis, comme à son habitude, le maire d’Aurillac, Pierre Mathonier, a procédé à la remise symbolique de la clef de la ville aux artistes présents sur scène. « J’ai officiellement confié les clefs aux arts de la rue », a-t-il déclaré, soulignant l’importance de cet événement pour la ville qui se transforme en un immense théâtre en plein air durant quatre jours. « Ce festival propose des performances éphémères, riches en messages, émotions et...

title: El mejor día para Javier Altamirano: recibe el alta y vuelve a entrenar para jugar en Estudiantes de La Plata
content: La imagen sigue fresca, por el impacto que produjo. En pleno partido frente a Boca Juniors, Javier Altamirano se desplomó . Había protagonizado un choque con un jugador xeneize, pero la intensidad del impacto no justificaba tal reacción. En ese momento, se temió por su vida. El transcurso de los días dio, al menos, tranquilidad en ese sentido. Tuvieron que pasar meses, eso sí, para que el jugador formado en Huachipato, quien fue considerado en la Selección en el ciclo de Eduardo Berizzo, retomara la actividad física . Siempre en situaciones controladas, evitando el contacto físico y cualquier situación que pueda traducirse en un retroceso o, peor aún, en un potencial riesgo. Recién a comienzos de mayo se le vio trotando. En julio volvió a relacionarse con su implemento favorito: el balón de fútbol . Las dudas por su futuro en el fútbol eran concretas. Esa sensación y la espera terminaron. El propio club argentino entrega la información que Altamirano, su familia, sus compañeros en Argentina y hasta Huachipato, el propietario de la mitad de su pase, esperaba: el volante volverá a entrenarse normalmente. Su retorno al balompié empieza a verse como algo concreto. “ Javier Altamirano recibió el alta médica y a partir del día de hoy se suma al grupo de manera normal ”, comunica el club. No hace falta agregar nada más. La espera Eduardo Domínguez, el...

title: This Photo From Andrew Garfield And Florence Pugh's New Rom-Com Has People Howling For 1 Distracting Reason
creator: Daniel Welsh
uk
content: A new still from Andrew Garfield and Florence Pugh ’s new romantic drama has led to a whole lot of horseplay on social media. The two British actors are set to share the screen in the much-anticipated We Live In Time , which tells the story of a pair of strangers who hit it off after one runs over the other with her car. Advertisement After the pair fall in love, the movie is set to chart the highs and lows of their love story over the course of several decades. Earlier this week, a new international trailer for the film was posted online , and with it came a new photo from the set, depicting Andrew and Florence looking loved up while riding on a carousel. title: Alicia Kirchner criticó al gobierno nacional: “El ajuste es hambre”
content: A la espera de que hoy el Indec publique el dato sobre la inflación de julio a nivel nacional , y luego de que el Observatorio de Deuda Social de la UCA informara que el 55% de la población es pobre , de acuerdo a su último estudio, la senadora Alicia Kirchner volvió a criticar las políticas que lleva adelante el Gobierno del presidente Javier Milei. “El ajuste es hambre” , subrayó la ex gobernadora de Santa Cruz, al considerar que “hasta aquí, la motosierra sólo apunta a los más vulnerables”. Tal como lo viene advirtiendo desde su banca en la Cámara Alta del Congreso de la Nación, la senadora Alicia Kirchner remarcó que las políticas de Javier Milei afectan a las familias trabajadoras y los sectores más vulnerables del país, sobre quienes impacta la retracción del Estado. En este sentido, la ex mandataria santacruceña sostuvo que la disminución real del 35 por ciento de los gastos totales del Estado impacta en las jubilaciones, los subsidios, los programas sociales y se refleja directamente en el aumento de la pobreza y especialmente, en más de un millón de niños y niñas que se van a dormir sin cenar , según los datos que arrojó una reciente encuesta de UNICEF. Para respaldar sus consideraciones, la cuñada de la ex presidenta Cristina Kirchner realizó un análisis del avance del presupuesto remitido por el Ejecutivo Nacional al Congreso Nacional el...

title: Россия потребовала от МАГАТЭ назвать напавшую на Запорожскую и Курскую АЭС сторону
content: Россия потребовала от МАГАТЭ в течении 48 часов конкретно назвать напавшую на Запорожскую и Курскую АЭС сторону. Гросси пока не отвечает на ультиматум, консультируется. Россия готовится провести заседания Совбеза ООН по теме ударов ВСУ по АЭС и попытках Киева развязать атомную авантюру на европейском континенте. Удавка на шее киевского режима стягивается.

title: 358 empleados de comercio de Río Grande fueron despedidos en lo que va del año
creator: Ana Pazos
content: Se trata de casi un 30% del total de empleados de comercio que hay en la ciudad. Advierten que en la medida que no se vuelva a vender en los comercios, la situación empeorará. En diálogo con Radio Provincia, Daniel Rivarola del Centro de Empleados de Comercio de Río Grande explicó que, “acá somos dependientes de la producción industrial y es el sector más golpeado” y aseguró que, “las fábricas en su totalidad están con sus mínimos y nosotros también estamos con nuestros mínimos”. “En el sector comercial con una baja importante, hemos perdido muchos puestos de trabajo en lo que va del año” dijo y confirmó que desde el 2 de febrero a la fecha “hemos tenido 358 despidos registrados, lo que representa un 30% del padrón que tenemos” Por ultimo indicó que, “han cerrado muchos comercios que en este proceso han recibido indemnizaciones y ha intentado en el rubro y no han podido” además comercios que estaban en la zona céntrica y se mudaron a la periferia para tener alquileres más económicos.

title: AP News Summary at 9:39 a.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Arizona and Missouri will join 5 other states with abortion on the ballot. Who are the others? Voters in at least seven states will decide referendums on abortion rights this year, with potentially more to come. Arizona, Colorado, Florida, Maryland, Missouri, Nevada and South Dakota will hold referendums on enshrining protection for abortion rights. The U.S. Supreme Court removed the nationwide right to abortion with a 2022 ruling, which sparked a national push to have voters decide. Voters have sided with abortion rights supporters every time the issue has been directly on the ballot since the Supreme Court ruling. A new round of Gaza cease-fire talks is starting. Why is a deal so elusive? JERUSALEM (AP) — International mediators are hoping to kickstart stalled cease-fire negotiations between Israel and Hamas with a new round of talks meant to finally clinch a deal between the sides. But the chances of a breakthrough appear slim. Israel and Hamas are set to resume discussions on Thursday, but they’ve been mulling an internationally-backed proposal for more than two months that would wind down the 10-month-long war and free the roughly 110 hostages still held in Gaza. The indirect talks haven't advanced substantively during that time and new proposed terms have complicated progress. Meanwhile, the fighting in Gaza rages on, the hostages languish in captivity, and fears of an...
